The Book of Genesis

1 in to·¬beginning did the ⁼God °the ⁼heaven and °the ⁼earth

2 then the ⁼earth was ¬invisible and ¬unready and ¬darkness ¬above of·the ⁼abyss and breath of·God ¬inflicted·himself ¬above of·the ⁼water

3 and told the ⁼God ꜝlet·them·be·been·generated light and was·generated·himself light

4 and ¬saw the ⁼God °the ⁼light ¬that beautiful and ¬was·separated the ⁼God ¬each °¬midst of·the ⁼light and ¬each °¬midst of·the ⁼¬darkness

5 and called the ⁼God °the ⁼light °day and °the ⁼¬darkness called °night and was·generated·himself ¬evening and was·generated·himself ¬early day ⁼one

6 and told the ⁼God ꜝlet·them·be·been·generated ¬firmness in to·¬midst of·the ⁼water and ꜝlet·them·be ¬·separated ¬each °¬midst of·water and of·water and was·generated·himself thus

7 and did the ⁼God °the ⁼¬firmness and ¬was·separated the ⁼God ¬each °¬midst of·the ⁼water which was ¬under of·the ⁼¬firmness and ¬each °¬midst of·the ⁼water ⁼the·one ¬above of·the ⁼¬firmness

8 and called the ⁼God °the ⁼¬firmness °heaven and ¬saw the ⁼God ¬that beautiful and was·generated·himself ¬evening and was·generated·himself ¬early day ⁼second

9 and told the ⁼God ꜝlet·them·be·¬assembled the ⁼water ⁼the·one ¬under of·the ⁼heaven to °¬synagogue ⁼one and ꜝlet·them·be·¬seen the ⁼¬dried·up and was·generated·himself thus and was·¬assembled the ⁼water ⁼the·one ¬under of·the ⁼heaven to °the⁺ ⁼¬synagogues⁺ of·them and was·¬seen the ⁼¬dried·up

10 and called the ⁼God °the ⁼¬dried·up ⁼earth and °the⁺ ⁼¬collections⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼waters⁺ called °seas⁺ and ¬saw the ⁼God ¬that beautiful

11 and told the ⁼God ꜝlet·them·¬sprout the ⁼earth °¬crop of·¬grass seeding °seed ¬according·to °¬gens and ¬according·to °¬likeness and °¬wood ⁼¬fruitful ⁼doing °fruit ¬whither the ⁼seed of·it in to·him ¬according·to °¬gens upon of·the ⁼earth and was·generated·himself thus

12 and ¬brought the ⁼earth °¬crop of·¬grass seeding °seed ¬according·to °¬gens and ¬according·to °¬likeness and °¬wood ⁼¬fruitful ⁼doing °fruit ¬whither the ⁼seed of·it in to·him ¬according·to °¬gens upon of·the ⁼earth and ¬saw the ⁼God ¬that beautiful

13 and was·generated·himself ¬evening and was·generated·himself ¬early day ⁼third

14 and told the ⁼God ꜝlet·be⁺·been·generated lights⁺ in to·the ⁼¬firmness of·the ⁼heaven to °¬giving·light of·the ⁼earth of·the·one to·¬be·separated ¬each °¬midst of·the ⁼day and ¬each °¬midst of·the ⁼night and ꜝlet·be⁺ to °signs⁺ and to °¬times⁺ and to °days⁺ and to °¬years⁺

15 and ꜝlet·be⁺ to °¬giving·light in to·the ⁼¬firmness of·the ⁼heaven ¬so to·¬shine upon of·the ⁼earth and was·generated·himself thus

16 and did the ⁼God °the·ones⁺ two °lights⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼great⁺ °the ⁼light ⁼the ⁼great to °¬beginnings⁺ of·the ⁼day and °the ⁼light ⁼the ⁼¬lesser to °¬beginnings⁺ of·the ⁼night and °the⁺ ⁼stars⁺

17 and ¬placed·himself °them the ⁼God in to·the ⁼¬firmness of·the ⁼heaven ¬so to·¬shine upon of·the ⁼earth

18 and to·¬be·first of·the ⁼day and of·the ⁼night and to·¬be·separated ¬each °¬midst of·the ⁼light and ¬each °¬midst of·the ⁼¬darkness and ¬saw the ⁼God ¬that beautiful

19 and was·generated·himself ¬evening and was·generated·himself ¬early day ⁼fourth

20 and told the ⁼God ꜝlet·them·¬lead·out the⁺ ⁼waters⁺ °¬reptiles⁺ of·souls⁺ ⁼living and °winglings⁺ ⁼self-winging upon of·the ⁼earth ¬according·to °the ⁼¬firmness of·the ⁼heaven and was·generated·himself thus

21 and did the ⁼God °the⁺ ⁼whales⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼great⁺ and °all ⁼soul of·¬living·things⁺ ⁼¬reptiles⁺ °which⁺ ¬led·out °the⁺ ⁼waters⁺ ¬according·to °¬genses⁺ of·them and °all ⁼wingling ⁼¬feathered ¬according·to °¬gens and ¬saw the ⁼God ¬that °beautiful⁺

22 and ¬praised °them the ⁼God ⁼saying ꜝ¬grow⁺·yourselves⁺ and ꜝ¬multiply⁺·yourselves⁺ and ꜝ¬fulfill⁺ °the⁺ ⁼waters⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼seas⁺ and the⁺ ⁼winglings⁺ ꜝlet·¬multiply⁺·themselves upon of·the ⁼earth

23 and was·generated·himself ¬evening and was·generated·himself ¬early day ⁼fifth

24 and told the ⁼God ꜝlet·them·¬lead·out the ⁼earth °soul ⁼living ¬according·to °¬gens °four-footed⁺ and °¬reptiles⁺ and °¬wild·animals⁺ of·the ⁼earth ¬according·to °¬gens and was·generated·himself thus

25 and did the ⁼God °the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ of·the ⁼earth ¬according·to °¬gens and °the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ ¬according·to °¬gens and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬reptiles⁺ of·the ⁼earth ¬according·to °¬gens of·them and ¬saw the ⁼God ¬that °beautiful⁺

26 and told the ⁼God we·should·do °human ¬according·to °¬image ourˊ and ¬according·to °¬likeness and ꜝlet·¬be·first⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼fishes⁺ of·the ⁼sea and of·the⁺ ⁼winglings⁺ of·the ⁼heaven and of·the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ and of·all ⁼the ⁼earth and of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬reptiles⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬crawling upon of·the ⁼earth

27 and did the ⁼God °the ⁼human ¬according·to °¬image of·God did °him °virulent and °suckler did °them

28 and ¬praised °them the ⁼God ⁼saying ꜝ¬grow⁺·yourselves⁺ and ꜝ¬multiply⁺·yourselves⁺ and ꜝ¬fulfill⁺ °the ⁼earth and ꜝ¬master⁺ of·her and you⁺·¬are·first of·the⁺ ⁼fishes⁺ of·the ⁼sea and of·the⁺ ⁼winglings⁺ of·the ⁼heaven and of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ and of·all ⁼the ⁼earth and of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬reptiles⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬crawling upon of·the ⁼earth

29 and told the ⁼God ¬¡see! I·have·given to·you⁺ °all °¬grass ⁼¬grainfield °seeding ⁼seed which is ¬above of·all ⁼the ⁼earth and °all ⁼¬wood which has in to·himself °fruit of·seed ⁼¬grainfield to·you⁺ will·be·himself to °¬eating

30 and to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ of·the ⁼earth and to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼winglings⁺ of·the ⁼heaven and to·all ⁼¬reptile ⁼the ⁼¬crawling upon of·the ⁼earth which has in to·himself °soul of·life °all ⁼¬grass ⁼green to °¬eating and was·generated·himself thus

31 and ¬saw the ⁼God °the⁺ ⁼all⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ did and ¬¡see! °beautiful⁺ ¬greatly and was·generated·himself ¬evening and was·generated·himself ¬early day ⁼sixth

2 and they·were·¬completed the ⁼heaven and the ⁼earth and all ⁼the ⁼cosmos of·them

2 and ¬completed the ⁼God in to·the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼sixth °the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·him °which⁺ did and ¬kept·from to·the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼seventh off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·him of·which⁺ did

3 and ¬praised the ⁼God °the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼seventh and made·holy °her ¬that in to·her ¬kept·from off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·him of·which⁺ ¬was·first·himself the ⁼God to·do

4 this ⁼the ⁼¬book of·genesis of·heaven and of·earth when was·generated·himself to·which ⁼day did the ⁼God °the ⁼heaven and °the ⁼earth

5 and °all ⁼green of·field ¬before of·the·one to·self-be·generated upon of·the ⁼earth and °all ⁼¬grass of·field ¬before of·the·one to·¬rise not for ¬rained·down the ⁼God upon °the ⁼earth and human not was to·self-work °the ⁼earth

6 ¬flow then ¬ascended out of·the ⁼earth and ¬watered °all ⁼the ⁼¬face of·the ⁼earth

7 and ¬molded the ⁼God °the ⁼human ⁼¬dust off of·the ⁼earth and ¬breathed·into to °the ⁼¬face of·him °breath of·life and was·generated·himself the ⁼human to °soul ⁼living

8 and ¬planted lord ⁼the ⁼God °¬paradise in Edem ¬according·to °¬easts⁺ and ¬placed·himself there °the ⁼human ⁼which ¬molded

9 and ¬sprouted·up the ⁼God ¬still out of·the ⁼earth °all ⁼¬wood ⁼¬Beautiful to °¬appearance and °beautiful to °¬eating and the ⁼¬wood of·the ⁼life in to·¬midst ⁼the ⁼¬paradise and °the ⁼¬wood of·the·one to·have·¬seen °known of·beautiful and of·¬evil

10 ¬river then ¬departs·himself out Edem to·¬water °the ⁼¬paradise ¬from·there ¬separates·himself to °four⁺ ⁼¬beginnings⁺

11 name to·the ⁼one Fisōn this ⁼the ⁼¬surrounding °all ⁼the ⁼earth Euilat there ¬whither is the ⁼gold

12 then °the ⁼gold of·the ⁼earth ⁼that °beautiful and there is the ⁼¬charcoal and the ⁼stone ⁼the ⁼¬leek·colored

13 and °name to·the ⁼¬river ⁼the ⁼second Gēōn this ⁼the ⁼¬surrounding °all ⁼the ⁼earth of·Ethiopian

14 and the ⁼¬river ⁼the ⁼third Tigris this ⁼the ⁼self-¬travelling ¬before Assuriōn then the ⁼¬river ⁼the ⁼fourth ⁼this ⁼¬Euphrates

15 and took lord ⁼the ⁼God °the ⁼human ⁼which ¬molded and ¬placed·himself °him in to·the ⁼¬paradise to·self-work °him and to·¬keep

16 and ¬ordered·himself lord ⁼the ⁼God to·the ⁼Adam saying off of·all ⁼¬wood ⁼the·one in to·the ⁼¬paradise to·¬eating you·will·¬eat·yourself

17 off then of·the ⁼¬wood ⁼the·one to·know °beautiful and °¬evil not you⁺·will·¬eat·yourselves⁺ off of·him to·which then iᵮ to·day you⁺·should·¬eat off of·him to·death you⁺·will·die·off·yourselves⁺

18 and told lord ⁼the ⁼God not °beautiful to·be °the ⁼human ¬only we·should·do to·him °¬helper ¬according·to °him

19 and ¬molded the ⁼God ¬still out of·the ⁼earth °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ of·the ⁼field and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼winglings⁺ of·the ⁼heaven and ¬brought °them unto °the ⁼Adam to·¬see °what will·call °them and all °which ifᵮ called °it Adam °soul ⁼living °this ⁼name of·him

20 and called Adam °names⁺ to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ and to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼winglings⁺ of·the ⁼heaven and to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ of·the ⁼field then to·the ⁼Adam not was·found ¬helper ⁼¬like to·him

21 and ¬put·on the ⁼God °¬amazement upon °the·one Adam and ¬slept and took °one of·the⁺ ⁼¬sides⁺ of·him and ¬fulfilled °flesh anti of·her

22 and ¬built lord ⁼the ⁼God °the ⁼¬side ⁼which took off of·the ⁼Adam to °woman and ¬brought °her unto °the ⁼Adam

23 and told Adam this now bone out of·the⁺ ⁼bones⁺ of·me and flesh out of·the ⁼flesh of·me this will·be·called woman ¬that out of·the ⁼man of·her was·taken this

24 ¬because·of of·this will·¬leave·behind human °the ⁼father of·him and °the ⁼mother of·him and will·be·¬joined unto °the ⁼woman of·him and they·will·be·themselves the·ones⁺ two to °flesh ⁼one

25 and they·were the·ones⁺ two naked⁺ which also Adam and the ⁼woman of·him and not they·¬were·ashamed·themselves

3 then the ⁼¬snake was ¬thoughtful of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ upon of·the ⁼earth of·which⁺ did lord ⁼the ⁼God and told the ⁼¬snake to·the ⁼woman °what ¬that told the ⁼God not ńot you⁺·should·¬eat off of·all ⁼¬wood ⁼the·one in to·the ⁼¬paradise

2 and told the ⁼woman to·the ⁼¬snake off of·fruit of·¬wood of·the ⁼¬paradise we·will·¬eat·ourselves

3 off then of·fruit of·the ⁼¬wood which is in to·¬midst of·the ⁼¬paradise told the ⁼God not you⁺·will·¬eat·yourselves⁺ off of·him not·then ńot you⁺·should·touch·yourselves⁺ of·him so·that ńot you⁺·should·die·off

4 and told the ⁼¬snake to·the ⁼woman not to·death you⁺·will·die·off·yourselves⁺

5 had·¬seen for the ⁼God ¬that in to·which iᵮ to·day you⁺·should·¬eat off of·him they·will·be·¬opened·up of·you⁺ the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ and you⁺·will·be·yourselves⁺ as Gods⁺ ⁼knowing °beautiful and °¬evil

6 and ¬saw the ⁼woman ¬that beautiful ⁼the ⁼¬wood to °¬eating and ¬that ¬pleasing to·the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ to·¬see and ¬Beautiful is of·the·one to·¬observe and taking of·the ⁼fruit of·it ¬ate and gave and to·the ⁼man of·her with of·her and they·¬ate

7 and they·were·¬opened·up the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ of·the·ones⁺ two and they·knew ¬that naked⁺ they·were and they·¬sewed °¬leafs⁺ of·¬fig·tree and they·did to·¬selves⁺ °¬loincloths⁺

8 and they·heard °the ⁼voice of·lord ⁼the ⁼God ⁼¬walking in to·the ⁼¬paradise °the ⁼¬dusk and they·¬hid which also Adam and the ⁼woman of·him off of·¬face of·lord ⁼the ⁼God in to·¬midst of·the ⁼¬wood of·the ⁼¬paradise

9 and called lord ⁼the ⁼God °the ⁼Adam and told to·him Adam ¬where? you·are

10 and told to·him °the ⁼voice of·you I·heard of·¬walking in to·the ⁼¬paradise and I·was·¬feared ¬that naked I·am and I·was·¬hidden

11 and told to·him what ¬announced to·you ¬that naked you·are ńot off of·the ⁼¬wood ¬whither I·¬ordered·myself to·you of·this ⁼¬alone ńot to·¬eat off of·it you·¬ate

12 and told the ⁼Adam the ⁼woman °which you·gave with myˊ this to·me gave off of·the ⁼¬wood and they·¬ate

13 and told lord ⁼the ⁼God to·the ⁼woman °what ⁼this you·did and told the ⁼woman the ⁼¬snake ¬tricked °me and they·¬ate

14 and told lord ⁼the ⁼God to·the ⁼¬snake ¬that you·did °this ¬cursed you off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ and off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ of·the ⁼earth upon to·the ⁼¬chest of·you and to·the ⁼¬belly you·will·¬travel·yourself and °earth you·will·¬eat·yourself °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·the ⁼life of·you

15 and °¬hostility I·will·¬place ¬each °¬midst of·you and ¬each °¬midst of·the ⁼woman and ¬each °¬midst of·the ⁼seed of·you and ¬each °¬midst of·the ⁼seed of·her he of·you will·¬keep °head and you you·will·¬keep of·him °¬heel

16 and to·the ⁼woman told ¬multiplying I·will·¬multiply °the⁺ ⁼¬griefs⁺ of·you and °the ⁼¬groan of·you in to·¬griefs⁺ you·will·¬give·birth·to·yourself °¬children⁺ and unto °the ⁼man of·you the ⁼¬rejection of·you and he of·you will·be·lord

17 then to·the ⁼Adam told ¬that you·heard of·the ⁼voice ⁼the ⁼woman of·you and you·¬ate off of·the ⁼¬wood ¬whither I·¬ordered·myself to·you of·this ⁼¬alone ńot to·¬eat off of·it ¬cursed the ⁼earth in to·the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·you in to·¬griefs⁺ you·will·¬eat·yourself °her °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·the ⁼life of·you

18 °¬thorns⁺ and °¬thistles⁺ will·¬rise to·you and you·will·¬eat·yourself °the ⁼¬grass of·the ⁼field

19 in to·¬sweat of·the ⁼¬face of·you you·will·¬eat·yourself °the ⁼bread of·you ¬until of·the·one to·¬turn·away °you to °the ⁼earth out of·which you·were·taken ¬that earth you·are and to °earth you·will·come·off·yourself

20 and called Adam °the ⁼name of·the ⁼woman of·him life ¬that this ⁼mother of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼living

21 and did lord ⁼the ⁼God to·the ⁼Adam and to·the ⁼woman of·him °tunics⁺ ⁼leather⁺ and ¬put·on °them

22 and told the ⁼God ¬¡see! Adam has·been·generated as one out of·us of·the·one to·know °beautiful and °¬evil and now ¬lest should·¬stretch·out °the ⁼hand and should·take of·the ⁼¬wood of·the ⁼life and you·will·¬eat·yourself and will·live·himself to °the ⁼eternity

23 and ¬sended·out °him lord ⁼the ⁼God out of·the ⁼¬paradise of·the ⁼¬self-indulgence to·self-work °the ⁼earth out of·which was·taken

24 and threw·out °the ⁼Adam and ¬dwelled °him ¬opposite of·the ⁼¬paradise of·the ⁼¬self-indulgence and ¬appointed °the⁺ ⁼¬Cherubs⁺ and °the ⁼¬flaming ⁼¬sword ⁼the ⁼self-¬turning to·¬keep °the ⁼¬road of·the ⁼¬wood of·the ⁼life

4 Adam then knew °¬Eve ⁼the ⁼woman of·him and ¬seizing ¬gave·birth·to °the ⁼¬Cain and told I·¬possessed·myself °human through of·the ⁼God

2 and ¬added to·¬give·birth·to °the ⁼brother of·him °the ⁼¬Abel and was·generated·himself ¬Abel ⁼¬flocksman of·sheep⁺ ¬Cain then was self-working °the ⁼earth

3 and was·generated·himself with °days⁺ ¬bore ¬Cain off of·the⁺ ⁼fruits⁺ of·the ⁼earth °¬sacrifice to·the ⁼lord

4 and ¬Abel ¬bore and he off of·the⁺ ⁼¬firstborn⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ of·him and off of·the⁺ ⁼¬fats⁺ of·them and ¬looked·upon the ⁼God upon to·¬Abel and upon to·the⁺ ⁼¬gifts⁺ of·him

5 upon then to·¬Cain and upon to·the⁺ ⁼¬sacrifices⁺ of·him not ¬watched·out and ¬grieved °the ⁼¬Cain ¬greatly and ¬was·downcast to·the ⁼¬face

6 and told lord ⁼the ⁼God to·the ⁼¬Cain so·that °what ¬sorrowful you·were·generated·yourself and so·that °what ¬was·downcast °the ⁼¬face of·you

7 not ifᵮ ¬correctly you·should·¬bring·to ¬correctly then ńot you·should·¬distribute you·sinned ꜝ¬be·quiet unto °you the ⁼¬rejection of·him and you you·will·¬be·first of·him

8 and told ¬Cain unto °¬Abel ⁼the ⁼brother of·him we·should·¬pass·through to °the ⁼¬plain and was·generated·himself in to·the·one to·be °them in to·the ⁼¬plain and ¬arose ¬Cain upon to·¬Abel °the ⁼brother of·him and killed·off °him

9 and told the ⁼God unto °¬Cain ¬where? is ¬Abel ⁼the ⁼brother of·you the·one then told not I·know ńot ¬guard of·the ⁼brother of·me I·am I*

10 and told the ⁼God °what you·did voice of·blood of·the ⁼brother of·you ¬cries·out unto °me out of·the ⁼earth

11 and now ¬cursed you off of·the ⁼earth which ¬gaped·wide °the ⁼mouth of·her to·self-¬receive °the ⁼blood of·the ⁼brother of·you out of·the ⁼hand of·you

12 ¬that you·will·work·yourself °the ⁼earth and not will·¬add °the ⁼¬strength of·her to·give to·you ¬moaning and ¬trembling you·will·be·yourself upon of·the ⁼earth

13 and told ¬Cain unto °the ⁼lord ¬greater ⁼the ⁼¬charge of·me of·the·one to·be·¬released °me

14 if you·throw·out °me today off of·¬face of·the ⁼earth and off of·the ⁼¬face of·you I·will·be·¬hidden and I·will·be·myself ¬moaning and ¬trembling upon of·the ⁼earth and will·be·himself all ⁼the ⁼finding °me will·kill·off °me

15 and told to·him lord ⁼the ⁼God not thus all ⁼the ⁼killing·off °¬Cain seven °self-¬avenging will·¬paralyze and ¬placed·himself lord ⁼the ⁼God °sign to·the ⁼¬Cain of·the·one ńot to·¬kill °him ⁼all ⁼the ⁼finding °him

16 came·out then ¬Cain off of·¬face of·the ⁼God and ¬dwelled in to·earth Naid ¬before Edem

17 and knew ¬Cain °the ⁼woman of·him and ¬seizing ¬gave·birth·to °the ⁼¬Enoch and was ¬building °city and ¬named °the ⁼city upon to·the ⁼name of·the ⁼son of·him ⁼¬Enoch

18 was·been·generated then to·the ⁼¬Enoch Gaidad and Gaidad engendered °the Maiēl and Maiēl engendered °the ⁼¬Methuselah and ¬Methuselah engendered °the ⁼¬Lamech

19 and took to·himself ¬Lamech two °women⁺ °name to·the ⁼one Ada and °name to·the ⁼second Sella

20 and ¬gave·birth·to Ada °the Iōbel this was the ⁼father of·¬dwelling in to·¬tents⁺ of·¬grazing·cattle⁺

21 and °name to·the ⁼brother of·him Ioubal ⁼this was the ⁼¬introducing °¬psaltery and °guitar

22 Sella then ¬gave·birth·to and she °the Thobel and was ¬hammer-smith ⁼¬coppersmith of·copper and of·iron sister then Thobel Noema

23 told then ¬Lamech to·the·ones⁺ of·himself to·women⁺ Ada and Sella ꜝhear⁺ of·me of·the ⁼voice women⁺ of·¬Lamech ꜝ¬listen·to⁺·yourselves⁺ of·me °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ ¬that °man I·killed·off to °trauma to·me* and °youth to °¬wound to·me*

24 ¬that seven·times has·¬avenged·himself out of·¬Cain out then of·¬Lamech seventy·times seven

25 knew then Adam °¬Eve ⁼the ⁼woman of·him and ¬seizing ¬gave·birth·to °son and ¬named °the ⁼name of·him °¬Seth saying ¬raised·up for to·me the ⁼God °seed ⁼óther anti of·¬Abel °which killed·off ¬Cain

26 and to·the ⁼¬Seth was·generated·himself son ¬named then °the ⁼name of·him °¬Enos this ¬hoped to·self-¬call °the ⁼name of·lord ⁼the ⁼God

5 this ⁼the ⁼¬book of·genesis of·humans⁺ to·which ⁼day did the ⁼God °the ⁼Adam ¬according·to °¬image of·God did °him

2 °virulent and °suckler did °them and ¬praised °them and ¬named °the ⁼name of·them °Adam to·which ⁼day did °them

3 lived then Adam °two·hundred⁺ and thirty °years⁺ and engendered ¬according·to °the ⁼¬appearance of·him and ¬according·to °the ⁼¬image of·him and ¬named °the ⁼name of·him °¬Seth

4 they·were·generated·themselves then the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·Adam with °the·one to·engender °him ⁼the ⁼¬Seth °¬seven·hundred⁺ ⁼years⁺ and engendered °sons⁺ and °daughters⁺

5 and they·were·generated·themselves all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·Adam °which⁺ lived °¬nine·hundred⁺ and thirty °years⁺ and died·off

6 lived then ¬Seth °two·hundred⁺ and five °years⁺ and engendered °the ⁼¬Enos

7 and lived ¬Seth with °the·one to·engender °him ⁼the ⁼¬Enos °¬seven·hundred⁺ and seven °years⁺ and engendered °sons⁺ and °daughters⁺

8 and they·were·generated·themselves all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·¬Seth °¬nine·hundred⁺ and twelve °years⁺ and died·off

9 and lived ¬Enos hundred ¬ninety °years⁺ and engendered °the ⁼¬Cainan

10 and lived ¬Enos with °the·one to·engender °him ⁼the ⁼¬Cainan °¬seven·hundred⁺ and ten five °years⁺ and engendered °sons⁺ and °daughters⁺

11 and they·were·generated·themselves all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·¬Enos °¬nine·hundred⁺ and five °years⁺ and died·off

12 and lived ¬Cainan hundred seventy °years⁺ and engendered °the ⁼¬Mahalaleel

13 and lived ¬Cainan with °the·one to·engender °him ⁼the ⁼¬Mahalaleel °¬seven·hundred⁺ and forty °years⁺ and engendered °sons⁺ and °daughters⁺

14 and they·were·generated·themselves all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·¬Cainan °¬nine·hundred⁺ and ten °years⁺ and died·off

15 and lived ¬Mahalaleel hundred and sixty five °years⁺ and engendered °the ⁼¬Jared

16 and lived ¬Mahalaleel with °the·one to·engender °him ⁼the ⁼¬Jared °¬seven·hundred⁺ and thirty °years⁺ and engendered °sons⁺ and °daughters⁺

17 and they·were·generated·themselves all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·¬Mahalaleel °¬eight·hundred⁺ and ¬ninety five °years⁺ and died·off

18 and lived ¬Jared hundred and sixty two °years⁺ and engendered °the ⁼¬Enoch

19 and lived ¬Jared with °the·one to·engender °him ⁼the ⁼¬Enoch °¬eight·hundred⁺ ⁼years⁺ and engendered °sons⁺ and °daughters⁺

20 and they·were·generated·themselves all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·¬Jared °¬nine·hundred⁺ and sixty two °years⁺ and died·off

21 and lived ¬Enoch hundred and sixty five °years⁺ and engendered °the ⁼¬Methuselah

22 ¬pleased then ¬Enoch to·the ⁼God with °the·one to·engender °him ⁼the ⁼¬Methuselah °two·hundred⁺ ⁼years⁺ and engendered °sons⁺ and °daughters⁺

23 and they·were·generated·themselves all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·¬Enoch °three·hundred⁺ sixty five °years⁺

24 and ¬pleased ¬Enoch to·the ⁼God and not found·himself ¬that ¬transported °him the ⁼God

25 and lived ¬Methuselah hundred and sixty seven °years⁺ and engendered °the ⁼¬Lamech

26 and lived ¬Methuselah with °the·one to·engender °him ⁼the ⁼¬Lamech °¬eight·hundred⁺ two °years⁺ and engendered °sons⁺ and °daughters⁺

27 and they·were·generated·themselves all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·¬Methuselah °which⁺ lived °¬nine·hundred⁺ and sixty nine °years⁺ and died·off

28 and lived ¬Lamech hundred eighty eight °years⁺ and engendered °son

29 and ¬named °the ⁼name of·him °¬Noah saying ⁼this will·¬give·rest °us off of·the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·us and off of·the⁺ ⁼¬griefs⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·us and off of·the ⁼earth ⁼which ¬cursed·himself lord ⁼the ⁼God

30 and lived ¬Lamech with °the·one to·engender °him ⁼the ⁼¬Noah °five·hundred⁺ and sixty five °years⁺ and engendered °sons⁺ and °daughters⁺

31 and they·were·generated·themselves all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·¬Lamech ¬seven·hundred⁺ and fifty three⁺ years⁺ and died·off

32 and was ¬Noah of·years⁺ ⁼five·hundred⁺ and engendered ¬Noah °three⁺ ⁼sons⁺ °the ⁼¬Shem ⁼the Cham ⁼the Iafeth

6 and was·generated·himself ¬when they·¬were·first·themselves the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ ⁼many⁺ to·self-be·generated upon of·the ⁼earth and daughters⁺ they·were·been·generated to·them

2 ¬seeing then the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·the ⁼God °the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ ¬that beautiful⁺ they·are they·took to·¬selves⁺ °women⁺ off of·all⁺ ⁼which⁺ they·¬selected·themselves

3 and told lord ⁼the ⁼God not ńot should·¬stay °the ⁼breath of·me in to·the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ ⁼these⁺ to °the ⁼eternity through °the·one to·be °them °fleshes⁺ they·will·be·themselves then the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·them hundred twenty °years⁺

4 then the⁺ ⁼¬giants⁺ they·were upon of·the ⁼earth in to·the⁺ ⁼days⁺ ⁼those⁺ and with °that as iᵮ they·¬entered·themselves the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·the ⁼God unto °the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ and they·engendered to·¬selves⁺ those⁺ they·were the⁺ ⁼¬giants⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ off of·eternity the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬famous⁺

5 ¬seeing then lord ⁼the ⁼God ¬that they·were·¬multiplied the⁺ ⁼evils⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ upon of·the ⁼earth and all ⁼whatever ¬considers·himself in to·the ⁼heart of·him ¬carefully upon °the⁺ ⁼¬evil⁺ °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼days⁺

6 and was·¬reflected·on the ⁼God ¬that did °the ⁼human upon of·the ⁼earth and was·¬considered

7 and told the ⁼God I·will·¬wipe·away °the ⁼human ⁼which I·did off of·¬face of·the ⁼earth off of·human ¬until of·¬animal and off of·¬reptiles⁺ ¬until of·the⁺ ⁼winglings⁺ of·the ⁼heaven ¬that I·was·¬angered ¬that I·did °them

8 ¬Noah then found °¬grace ¬in·front·of of·lord ⁼the ⁼God

9 these⁺ then the⁺ ⁼genesiss⁺ of·¬Noah ¬Noah ⁼human ⁼¬just ⁼¬perfect ⁼being in to·the ⁼generation of·him to·the ⁼God ¬pleased ¬Noah

10 engendered then ¬Noah °three⁺ ⁼sons⁺ °the ⁼¬Shem ⁼the Cham ⁼the Iafeth

11 was·¬destroyed then the ⁼earth ¬in·front·of of·the ⁼God and was·¬filled the ⁼earth of·¬unrighteousness

12 and ¬saw lord ⁼the ⁼God °the ⁼earth and was having·self-¬depraved ¬that ¬depraved all ⁼flesh °the ⁼¬road of·him upon of·the ⁼earth

13 and told the ⁼God unto °¬Noah ¬time of·all ⁼human ¬comes ¬in·front·of of·me ¬that was·¬filled the ⁼earth of·¬unrighteousness off of·them and ¬¡see! I* I·¬deprave °them and °the ⁼earth

14 ꜝdo therefore to·yourself °¬ark out of·¬woods⁺ ⁼¬square⁺ °¬chicks⁺ you·will·do °the ⁼¬ark and you·will·¬apply·tar °her ¬inwardly and ¬outside to·the ⁼¬tar

15 and thus you·will·do °the ⁼¬ark of·three·hundred⁺ ⁼¬cubits⁺ °the ⁼¬length of·the ⁼¬ark and fifty of·¬cubits⁺ °the ⁼¬width and thirty of·¬cubits⁺ °the ⁼¬height of·her

16 ¬gathering you·will·do °the ⁼¬ark and to °¬cubit you·will·¬complete °her ¬from·above then °the ⁼¬door of·the ⁼¬ark you·will·do out of·¬sideways⁺ °¬on·the·ground⁺ ⁼¬second·story⁺ and °¬third·story⁺ you·will·do °her

17 I* then ¬¡see! I·¬bring·upon °the ⁼¬flood °water upon °the ⁼earth to·¬deprave °all ⁼flesh in to·which is breath of·life ¬under of·the ⁼heaven and °whatever⁺ ifᵮ should·be upon of·the ⁼earth will·¬decease

18 and I·will·stand °the ⁼¬covenant of·me unto °you you·will·come·to·yourself then to °the ⁼¬ark you and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·you and the ⁼woman of·you and the⁺ ⁼women⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·you with of·you

19 and off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ and off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬reptiles⁺ and off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ and off of·all ⁼flesh two two off of·all⁺ you·will·¬bring·in to °the ⁼¬ark so·that you·should·¬feed with of·yourself virulent and suckler they·will·be·themselves

20 off of·all⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬birds⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼winglings⁺ ¬according·to °¬gens and off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ ¬according·to °¬gens and off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬reptiles⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬crawling upon of·the ⁼earth ¬according·to °¬gens of·them two two off of·all⁺ they·will·come·to·themselves unto °you to·self-¬feed with of·you °virulent and °suckler

21 you then you·will·take·yourself to·yourself off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬foods⁺ °which⁺ you⁺·will·¬eat·yourselves⁺ and you·will·¬assemble unto °yourself and will·be·himself to·you and to·those⁺ to·¬eat

22 and did ¬Noah °all⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ ¬ordered·himself to·him lord ⁼the ⁼God thus did

7 and told lord ⁼the ⁼God unto °¬Noah ꜝcome·to you and all ⁼the ⁼house of·you to °the ⁼¬ark ¬that °you they·¬saw °¬just ¬in·front·of of·me in to·the ⁼generation ⁼this

2 off then of·the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬clean⁺ ꜝ¬bring·in unto °you seven seven °virulent and °suckler off then of·the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ ńot of·¬clean⁺ two two °virulent and °suckler

3 and off of·the⁺ ⁼winglings⁺ of·the ⁼heaven of·the⁺ ⁼¬clean⁺ seven seven °virulent and °suckler and off of·the⁺ ⁼winglings⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ ńot of·¬clean⁺ two two °virulent and °suckler to·¬maintain °seed upon °all ⁼the ⁼earth

4 ¬still for of·days⁺ seven I* I·¬bring·upon °¬rain upon °the ⁼earth forty °days⁺ and forty °nights⁺ and I·should·¬blot·out °all ⁼the ⁼¬resurrection ⁼which I·did off of·¬face of·the ⁼earth

5 and did ¬Noah °all⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ ¬ordered·himself to·him lord ⁼the ⁼God

6 ⁼¬Noah then was of·years⁺ ⁼six·hundred⁺ and the ⁼¬flood was·generated·himself of·water upon of·the ⁼earth

7 came·to then ¬Noah and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him and the ⁼woman of·him and the⁺ ⁼women⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him with of·him to °the ⁼¬ark through °the ⁼water of·the ⁼¬flood

8 and off of·the⁺ ⁼winglings⁺ and off of·the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬clean⁺ and off of·the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ ńot of·¬clean⁺ and off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬reptiles⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ upon of·the ⁼earth

9 two two they·came·to unto °¬Noah to °the ⁼¬ark °virulent and °suckler ¬as ¬ordered·himself to·him the ⁼God

10 and was·generated·himself with °the·ones⁺ seven °days⁺ and the ⁼water of·the ⁼¬flood was·generated·himself upon of·the ⁼earth

11 in to·the ⁼¬six·hundredth ⁼year in to·the ⁼life of·the ⁼¬Noah ⁼the ⁼second ⁼month to·seventh and to·¬twentieth·day of·the ⁼month to·the ⁼day ⁼this they·¬threw·violently all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬flows⁺ of·the ⁼abyss and the⁺ ⁼¬dungeons⁺ of·the ⁼heaven they·were·¬opened

12 and was·generated·himself the ⁼¬rain upon of·the ⁼earth forty °days⁺ and forty °nights⁺

13 in to·the ⁼day ⁼this came·to ¬Noah ⁼¬Shem Cham Iafeth sons⁺ of·¬Noah and the ⁼woman of·¬Noah and the⁺ ⁼three⁺ ⁼women⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him with of·him to °the ⁼¬ark

14 and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ ¬according·to °¬gens and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ ¬according·to °¬gens and all ⁼¬reptile ⁼self-¬moving upon of·the ⁼earth ¬according·to °¬gens and all ⁼wingling ¬according·to °¬gens

15 they·came·to unto °¬Noah to °the ⁼¬ark two two off of·all ⁼flesh in to·which is breath of·life

16 and the⁺ ⁼self-¬entering °virulent and °suckler off of·all ⁼flesh came·to ¬as ¬ordered·himself the ⁼God to·the ⁼¬Noah and ¬shut lord ⁼the ⁼God ¬outside of·him °the ⁼¬ark

17 and was·generated·himself the ⁼¬flood forty °days⁺ and forty °nights⁺ upon of·the ⁼earth and was·¬multiplied the ⁼water and ¬lifted·up °the ⁼¬ark and was·¬lifted·up off of·the ⁼earth

18 and ¬prevailed the ⁼water and ¬multiplied·himself ¬very upon of·the ⁼earth and ¬inflicted·himself the ⁼¬ark ¬above of·the ⁼water

19 then the ⁼water ¬prevailed ¬very ¬violently upon of·the ⁼earth and ¬covered °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼mountains⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬high⁺ ⁼which⁺ was ¬under of·the ⁼heaven

20 ten five °¬cubits⁺ ¬above was·¬lifted·up the ⁼water and ¬covered °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼mountains⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬high⁺

21 and died·off all ⁼flesh ⁼self-¬moving upon of·the ⁼earth of·the⁺ ⁼winglings⁺ and of·the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ and of·the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ and all ⁼¬reptile °self-¬moving upon of·the ⁼earth and all ⁼human

22 and °all⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ has °breath of·life and all ⁼which was upon of·the ⁼¬dried·up died·off

23 and ¬blotted·out all ⁼the ⁼¬height ⁼which was upon of·¬face of·all ⁼the ⁼earth off of·human ¬until of·¬animal and of·¬reptiles⁺ and of·the⁺ ⁼winglings⁺ of·the ⁼heaven and they·were·¬blotted·out off of·the ⁼earth and was·¬left·behind ¬alone ⁼¬Noah and the·ones⁺ with of·him in to·the ⁼¬ark

24 and was·¬lifted·up the ⁼water upon of·the ⁼earth °days⁺ hundred fifty

8 and was·¬remembered the ⁼God of·the ⁼¬Noah and of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ and of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ and of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼winglings⁺ and of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬reptiles⁺ whatever⁺ was with of·him in to·the ⁼¬ark and ¬brought·upon the ⁼God °breath upon °the ⁼earth and ¬abated the ⁼water

2 and they·were·¬covered the⁺ ⁼¬flows⁺ of·the ⁼abyss and the⁺ ⁼¬dungeons⁺ of·the ⁼heaven and was·¬held the ⁼¬rain off of·the ⁼heaven

3 and ¬gave·forth the ⁼water ⁼self-¬travelling off of·the ⁼earth ¬gave·forth and ¬had·little·himself the ⁼water with fifty and hundred °days⁺

4 and ¬seated the ⁼¬ark in to·month ⁼the ⁼seventh to·seventh and to·¬twentieth·day of·the ⁼month upon °the⁺ ⁼mountains⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ Ararat

5 then the ⁼water °self-¬travelling ¬had·little·himself ¬until of·the ⁼tenth ⁼month in then to·the ⁼eleventh ⁼month to·the ⁼first of·the ⁼month they·were·¬seen the⁺ ⁼heads⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼mountains⁺

6 and was·generated·himself with forty °days⁺ ¬opened ¬Noah °the ⁼¬window of·the ⁼¬ark °which did

7 and missioned·off °the ⁼¬raven of·the·one to·¬see if has·¬abated the ⁼water and coming·out not ¬returned ¬until of·the·one to·be·dried·up °the ⁼water off of·the ⁼earth

8 and missioned·off °the ⁼dove ¬after of·him to·¬see if has·¬abated the ⁼water off of·¬face of·the ⁼earth

9 and not finding ⁼the ⁼dove °¬rest to·the⁺ ⁼feet⁺ of·her ¬returned unto °him to °the ⁼¬ark ¬that water was upon to·all ⁼¬face of·all ⁼the ⁼earth and ¬stretching·out °the ⁼hand of·him took °her and ¬brought·in °her unto °himself to °the ⁼¬ark

10 and ¬holding·fast ¬still °days⁺ seven °óther⁺ ¬again ¬sended·out °the ⁼dove out of·the ⁼¬ark

11 and ¬lived unto °him the ⁼dove °the·one unto °¬evening and had °¬leaf of·¬olive·tree °¬twig in to·the ⁼mouth of·her and knew ¬Noah ¬that has·¬abated the ⁼water off of·the ⁼earth

12 and ¬holding·fast ¬still °days⁺ seven °óther⁺ ¬again ¬sended·out °the ⁼dove and not ¬added·himself of·the·one to·¬turn unto °him ¬still

13 and was·generated·himself in to·the ⁼one and to·¬six·hundredth ⁼year in to·the ⁼life of·the ⁼¬Noah ⁼the ⁼first ⁼month to·one of·the ⁼month ¬failed the ⁼water off of·the ⁼earth and ¬revealed ¬Noah °the ⁼¬roof of·the ⁼¬ark °which did and ¬saw ¬that ¬failed the ⁼water off of·¬face of·the ⁼earth

14 in then to·the ⁼month ⁼the ⁼second to·seventh and to·¬twentieth·day of·the ⁼month was·dried·up the ⁼earth

15 and told lord ⁼the ⁼God to·the ⁼¬Noah saying

16 ꜝcome·out out of·the ⁼¬ark you and the ⁼woman of·you and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·you and the⁺ ⁼women⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·you with of·you

17 and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ is with of·you and all ⁼flesh off of·winglings⁺ ¬until of·¬animals⁺ and °all ⁼¬reptile ⁼self-¬moving upon of·the ⁼earth ꜝ¬lead·out with of·yourself and ꜝ¬grow⁺·yourselves⁺ and ꜝ¬multiply⁺·yourselves⁺ upon of·the ⁼earth

18 and came·out ¬Noah and the ⁼woman of·him and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him and the⁺ ⁼women⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him with of·him

19 and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ and all ⁼wingling and all ⁼¬reptile ⁼self-¬moving upon of·the ⁼earth ¬according·to °¬gens of·them they·came·out out of·the ⁼¬ark

20 and ¬built ¬Noah °¬altar to·the ⁼God and took off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬clean⁺ and off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼winglings⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬clean⁺ and ¬carried·up ¬??? upon °the ⁼¬altar

21 and was·¬savored lord ⁼the ⁼God °¬aroma of·¬aroma and told lord ⁼the ⁼God ⁼¬considered not I·will·¬add ¬still of·the·one to·self-¬curse °the ⁼earth through °the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ ¬that ¬clings·himself the ⁼¬mind of·the ⁼human ¬carefully upon °the⁺ ⁼¬evil⁺ out of·youth not I·will·¬add therefore ¬still to·¬strike °all ⁼flesh ⁼living ¬as I·did

22 °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·the ⁼earth seed and ¬harvest ¬cold and ¬heat ⁼¬summer and ¬spring·season °day and °night not they·will·¬keep·from

9 and ¬praised the ⁼God °the ⁼¬Noah and °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him and told to·them ꜝ¬grow⁺·yourselves⁺ and ꜝ¬multiply⁺·yourselves⁺ and ꜝ¬fulfill⁺ °the ⁼earth and ꜝ¬master⁺ of·her

2 and the ⁼¬trembling of·you⁺ and the ⁼¬fear will·be·himself upon to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ of·the ⁼earth and upon °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬birds⁺ of·the ⁼heaven and upon °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼self-¬moving upon of·the ⁼earth and upon °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼fishes⁺ of·the ⁼sea ¬by °hands⁺ to·you⁺ I·have·given

3 and all ⁼¬reptile ⁼which is living to·you⁺ will·be·himself to °¬eating as ¬plants⁺ of·¬grass I·have·given to·you⁺ °the⁺ ⁼all⁺

4 ¬but °meat in to·blood of·soul not you⁺·will·¬eat·yourselves⁺

5 and for the·one you blood of·the⁺ ⁼souls⁺ of·you⁺ I·should·¬seek·out out of·hand of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ I·should·¬seek·out °it and out of·hand of·human ⁼brother I·should·¬seek·out °the ⁼soul of·the ⁼human

6 the ⁼¬pouring·out °blood of·human anti of·the ⁼blood of·him will·be·¬poured·out ¬that in to·¬image of·God I·did °the ⁼human

7 you⁺ then ꜝ¬grow⁺·yourselves⁺ and ꜝ¬multiply⁺·yourselves⁺ and ꜝ¬fulfill⁺ °the ⁼earth and ꜝ¬multiply⁺·yourselves⁺ upon of·her

8 and told the ⁼God to·the ⁼¬Noah and to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him with of·him saying

9 I* ¬¡see! I·¬arise °the ⁼¬covenant of·me to·you⁺ and to·the ⁼seed of·you⁺ with °you⁺

10 and to·all ⁼soul ⁼the ⁼living with of·you⁺ off of·¬birds⁺ and off of·¬animals⁺ and to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ of·the ⁼earth whatever⁺ with of·you⁺ off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼coming·out out of·the ⁼¬ark

11 and I·will·stand °the ⁼¬covenant of·me unto °you⁺ and not will·die·off·himself all ⁼flesh ¬still off of·the ⁼water of·the ⁼¬flood and not will·be·himself ¬still ¬flood of·water ⁼the·one to·¬deprave °all ⁼the ⁼earth

12 and told lord ⁼the ⁼God unto °¬Noah this ⁼the ⁼sign of·the ⁼¬covenant °which I* I·give ¬each °¬midst myˊ and of·you⁺ and ¬each °¬midst of·all ⁼soul ⁼living which is with of·you⁺ to °generations⁺ ⁼eternal⁺

13 °the ⁼¬bow of·me I·¬place in to·the ⁼cloud and will·be·himself to °sign of·¬covenant ¬each °¬midst myˊ and of·the ⁼earth

14 and will·be·himself in to·the·one to·¬collect·clouds·together °me °clouds⁺ upon °the ⁼earth will·be·¬seen °the ⁼¬bow of·me in to·the ⁼cloud

15 and I·will·be·¬remembered of·the ⁼¬covenant of·me which is ¬each °¬midst myˊ and of·you⁺ and ¬each °¬midst of·all ⁼soul ⁼living in to·all ⁼flesh and not will·be·himself ¬still the ⁼water to °¬flood ¬so to·¬blot·out °all ⁼flesh

16 and will·be·himself the ⁼¬bow of·me in to·the ⁼cloud and I·will·¬see·myself of·the·one to·be·¬remembered °¬covenant ⁼eternal ¬each °¬midst myˊ and ¬each °¬midst of·all ⁼soul ⁼living in to·all ⁼flesh which is upon of·the ⁼earth

17 and told the ⁼God to·the ⁼¬Noah this ⁼the ⁼sign of·the ⁼¬covenant ⁼which I·¬made·a·covenant·myself ¬each °¬midst myˊ and ¬each °¬midst of·all ⁼flesh which is upon of·the ⁼earth

18 they·were then the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·¬Noah the⁺ ⁼coming·out out of·the ⁼¬ark ¬Shem Cham Iafeth Cham was father of·¬Canaan

19 three⁺ ⁼these⁺ they·are the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·¬Noah off of·these⁺ they·were·¬scattered upon °all ⁼the ⁼earth

20 and ¬was·first·himself ¬Noah ⁼human ⁼¬farmer of·earth and ¬planted °vineyard

21 and drank out of·the ⁼wine and was·¬gotten·drunk and was·¬been·naked in to·the ⁼house of·him

22 and ¬saw Cham ⁼the ⁼father of·¬Canaan °the ⁼nakedness of·the ⁼father of·him and coming·out ¬announced to·the⁺ ⁼two⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·him out

23 and taking ¬Shem and Iafeth °the ⁼cloak they·¬put·themselves upon °the·ones⁺ two °¬backs⁺ of·them and they·were·¬travelled ¬backwards and they·¬concealed °the ⁼nakedness of·the ⁼father of·them and °the ⁼¬face of·them °¬backwards and °the ⁼nakedness of·the ⁼father of·them not they·¬saw

24 ¬woke·up then ¬Noah off of·the ⁼wine and knew °whatever⁺ did to·him the ⁼son of·him the ⁼young

25 and told ¬cursed ⁼¬Canaan ⁼¬child ⁼¬slave will·be·himself to·the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·him

26 and told ¬praiseworthy ⁼lord ⁼the ⁼God of·the ⁼¬Shem and will·be·himself ¬Canaan ⁼¬child of·him

27 may·¬widen the ⁼God to·the Iafeth and ꜝlet·them·¬dwell in to·the⁺ ⁼houses⁺ of·the ⁼¬Shem and ꜝlet·them·be·been·generated ¬Canaan ⁼¬child of·them

28 lived then ¬Noah with °the ⁼¬flood °three·hundred⁺ fifty °years⁺

29 and they·were·generated·themselves all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·¬Noah ¬nine·hundred⁺ fifty years⁺ and died·off

10 these⁺ then the⁺ ⁼genesiss⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·¬Noah ⁼¬Shem Cham Iafeth and they·were·been·generated to·them sons⁺ with °the ⁼¬flood

2 sons⁺ Iafeth Gamer and ¬Magog and Madai and Iōuan and ¬Elisha and Thobel and Mosoch and Thiras

3 and sons⁺ Gamer Aschanaz and Rifath and Thorgama

4 and sons⁺ Iōuan ¬Elisha and Tharsis Kitioi Rodioi

5 out of·these⁺ they·were·¬separated ¬islands⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ in to·the ⁼earth of·them ¬each ¬according·to °tongue in to·the⁺ ⁼¬tribes⁺ of·them and in to·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ of·them

6 sons⁺ then Cham Chous and Mesraim Foud and ¬Canaan

7 sons⁺ then Chous Saba and Euila and Sabatha and Regma and ¬??? sons⁺ then Regma Saba and Dadan

8 Chous then engendered °the Nebrōd this ¬was·first·himself to·be ¬giant upon of·the ⁼earth

9 this was ¬giant ⁼¬hunter·with·hounds ¬in·front·of of·lord ⁼the ⁼God through °this they·will·¬say as Nebrōd ⁼¬giant ⁼¬hunter·with·hounds ¬in·front·of of·lord

10 and was·generated·himself ¬beginning of·the ⁼kingdom of·him ¬Babylon and Orech and Archad and Chalannē in to·the ⁼earth Sennaar

11 out of·the ⁼earth ⁼that came·out Assour and ¬built °the ⁼¬Nineveh and °the Roōbōth ⁼city and °the Chalach

12 and °the·one ¬??? ¬each °¬midst of·¬Nineveh and ¬each °¬midst Chalach this ⁼the ⁼city ⁼the ⁼great

13 and Mesraim engendered °the⁺ Loudiim and °the·ones⁺ ¬??? and °the⁺ Labiim and °the⁺ ⁼¬Naphtalis⁺

14 and °the⁺ Patrosōniim and °the⁺ Chaslōniim ¬whence came·out ¬from·there Fulistiim and °the⁺ Kafthoriim

15 ¬Canaan then engendered °the ⁼¬Sidon ⁼¬firstborn and °the Chettaion

16 and °the Iebousaion and °the Amorraion and °the Gergesaion

17 and °the Euaion and °the Aroukaion and °the Asennaion

18 and °the Aradion and °the Samaraion and °the Amathi and with °this they·were·¬scattered the⁺ ⁼¬tribes⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬Canaanites⁺

19 and they·were·generated·themselves the⁺ ⁼¬regions⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬Canaanites⁺ off of·¬Sidon ¬until to·come to Gerara and °¬Gaza ¬until to·come of·¬Sodom and of·¬Gomorrah Adama and Sebōim ¬until Lasa

20 these⁺ ⁼sons⁺ Cham in to·the⁺ ⁼¬tribes⁺ of·them ¬according·to °tongues⁺ of·them in to·the⁺ ⁼¬countries⁺ of·them and in to·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ of·them

21 and to·the ⁼¬Shem was·been·generated and to·him ⁼father of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·¬Eber to·brother Iafeth ⁼the ⁼great

22 sons⁺ of·¬Shem ¬Elamite and Assour and ¬Arphaxad and Loud and ¬Ram and ¬Cainan

23 and sons⁺ of·¬Ram Ōs and Oul and Gather and Mosoch

24 and ¬Arphaxad engendered °the ⁼¬Cainan and ¬Cainan engendered °the ⁼¬Sala ¬Sala then engendered °the ⁼¬Eber

25 and to·the ⁼¬Eber they·were·been·generated two sons⁺ name to·the ⁼one ¬Peleg ¬that in to·the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·him was·¬divided the ⁼earth and °name to·the ⁼brother of·him Iektan

28 and Abimeēl and ¬???

29 and Oufir and Euila and Iōbab all⁺ ⁼these⁺ ⁼sons⁺ Iektan

30 and was·generated·himself the ⁼¬dwelling of·them off Massē ¬until to·come to Sōfēra ⁼mountain of·¬easts⁺

31 these⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·¬Shem in to·the⁺ ⁼¬tribes⁺ of·them ¬according·to °tongues⁺ of·them in to·the⁺ ⁼¬countries⁺ of·them and in to·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ of·them

32 these⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬tribes⁺ of·sons⁺ of·¬Noah ¬according·to genesiss⁺ of·them ¬according·to °the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ of·them off of·these⁺ they·were·¬scattered ¬islands⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ upon of·the ⁼earth with °the ⁼¬flood

11 and was all ⁼the ⁼earth lip ⁼one and voice ⁼one to·all⁺

2 and was·generated·himself in to·the·one to·¬move °them off of·¬easts⁺ they·found °¬plain in to·earth Sennaar and they·¬dwelled there

3 and told human to·the ⁼¬neighbor ¬come we·should·¬make·bricks °¬bricks⁺ and we·should·¬bake °them to·fire and was·generated·himself to·them the ⁼¬brick to °stone and ¬tar was to·them the ⁼¬clay

4 and they·told ¬come we·should·¬build to·¬selves⁺ °city and °tower ¬whither the ⁼head will·be·himself ¬until of·the ⁼heaven and we·should·do to·¬selves⁺ °name ¬before of·the·one to·be·¬scattered upon of·¬face of·all ⁼the ⁼earth

5 and ¬came lord to·¬see °the ⁼city and °the ⁼tower ⁼which they·¬built the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼humans⁺

6 and told lord ¬¡see! ¬gens ⁼one and lip ⁼one of·all⁺ and °this they·¬were·first·themselves to·do and now not will·¬fail out of·them °all⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ iᵮ they·should·¬put·themselves to·do

7 ¬come and ¬coming we·should·¬confound there of·them °the ⁼tongue so·that ńot they·should·hear ¬each °the ⁼voice of·the ⁼¬neighbor

8 and ¬scattered °them lord ¬from·there upon °¬face of·all ⁼the ⁼earth and they·¬ceased·themselves ¬building °the ⁼city and °the ⁼tower

9 through °this was·called the ⁼name of·her ¬confusion ¬that there ¬confounded lord °the⁺ ⁼lips⁺ of·all ⁼the ⁼earth and ¬from·there ¬scattered °them lord ⁼the ⁼God upon °¬face of·all ⁼the ⁼earth

10 and these⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼genesiss⁺ of·¬Shem ¬Shem ⁼son hundred of·years⁺ when engendered °the ⁼¬Arphaxad of·second ⁼year with °the ⁼¬flood

11 and lived ¬Shem with °the·one to·engender °him ⁼the ⁼¬Arphaxad °five·hundred⁺ ⁼years⁺ and engendered °sons⁺ and °daughters⁺ and died·off

12 and lived ¬Arphaxad hundred thirty five °years⁺ and engendered °the ⁼¬Cainan

13 and lived ¬Arphaxad with °the·one to·engender °him ⁼the ⁼¬Cainan °years⁺ ⁼four·hundred⁺ thirty and engendered °sons⁺ and °daughters⁺ and died·off and lived ¬Cainan hundred thirty °years⁺ and engendered °the ⁼¬Sala and lived ¬Cainan with °the·one to·engender °him ⁼the·one ¬Sala °years⁺ ⁼three·hundred⁺ thirty and engendered °sons⁺ and °daughters⁺ and died·off

14 and lived ¬Sala hundred thirty °years⁺ and engendered °the ⁼¬Eber

15 and lived ¬Sala with °the·one to·engender °him ⁼the ⁼¬Eber °three·hundred⁺ thirty °years⁺ and engendered °sons⁺ and °daughters⁺ and died·off

16 and lived ¬Eber hundred thirty °four⁺ ⁼years⁺ and engendered °the ⁼¬Peleg

17 and lived ¬Eber with °the·one to·engender °him ⁼the ⁼¬Peleg °years⁺ ⁼three·hundred⁺ seventy and engendered °sons⁺ and °daughters⁺ and died·off

18 and lived ¬Peleg hundred thirty °years⁺ and engendered °the ⁼¬Reu

19 and lived ¬Peleg with °the·one to·engender °him ⁼the ⁼¬Reu °two·hundred⁺ nine °years⁺ and engendered °sons⁺ and °daughters⁺ and died·off

20 and lived ¬Reu hundred thirty two °years⁺ and engendered °the ⁼¬Serug

21 and lived ¬Reu with °the·one to·engender °him ⁼the ⁼¬Serug °two·hundred⁺ seven °years⁺ and engendered °sons⁺ and °daughters⁺ and died·off

22 and lived ¬Serug hundred thirty °years⁺ and engendered °the ⁼¬Nahor

23 and lived ¬Serug with °the·one to·engender °him ⁼the ⁼¬Nahor °years⁺ ⁼two·hundred⁺ and engendered °sons⁺ and °daughters⁺ and died·off

24 and lived ¬Nahor °years⁺ seventy nine and engendered °the ⁼¬Terah

25 and lived ¬Nahor with °the·one to·engender °him ⁼the ⁼¬Terah °years⁺ hundred twenty nine and engendered °sons⁺ and °daughters⁺ and died·off

26 and lived ¬Terah seventy °years⁺ and engendered °the Abram and °the ⁼¬Nahor and °the ⁼¬Haran

27 these⁺ then the⁺ ⁼genesiss⁺ of·¬Terah ¬Terah engendered °the Abram and °the ⁼¬Nahor and °the ⁼¬Haran and ¬Haran engendered °the ⁼¬Lot

28 and died·off ¬Haran ¬before of·¬Terah ⁼the ⁼father of·him in to·the ⁼earth ⁼which was·been·generated in to·the ⁼¬country of·the⁺ ⁼¬Chaldeans⁺

29 and they·took Abram and ¬Nahor to·¬selves⁺ °women⁺ name to·the ⁼woman Abram Sara and name to·the ⁼woman of·¬Nahor Melcha ⁼daughter of·¬Haran father Melcha and father Iescha

30 and was Sara ⁼¬barren and not ¬produced·children

31 and took ¬Terah °the Abram ⁼son of·him and °the ⁼¬Lot ⁼son of·¬Haran °son of·the ⁼son of·him and °the Saran ⁼the ⁼bride of·him °woman Abram ⁼the ⁼son of·him and ¬led·out °them out of·the ⁼¬country of·the⁺ ⁼¬Chaldeans⁺ to·be·¬travelled to °the ⁼earth ¬Canaan and came ¬until of·¬Haran and ¬dwelled there

32 and they·were·generated·themselves the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·¬Terah in to·¬Haran °two·hundred⁺ five °years⁺ and died·off ¬Terah in to·¬Haran

12 and told lord to·the Abram ꜝcome·out out of·the ⁼earth of·you and out of·the ⁼¬kindred of·you and out of·the ⁼house ⁼the ⁼father of·you to °the ⁼earth ⁼which iᵮ to·you I·will·¬show

2 and I·will·do °you to °nation ⁼great and I·will·¬praise °you and I·will·¬magnify °the ⁼name of·you and you·will·be·yourself ¬praiseworthy

3 and I·will·¬praise °the⁺ ⁼¬praising °you and °the⁺ ⁼self-¬cursing °you I·will·¬curse·myself and they·will·be·¬been·blessed in to·you all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬tribes⁺ of·the ⁼earth

4 and was·¬travelled Abram ¬just·as spoke to·him lord and ¬was·undone·himself with of·him ¬Lot Abram then was of·years⁺ seventy five when came·out out of·¬Haran

5 and took Abram °the Saran ⁼woman of·him and °the ⁼¬Lot ⁼son of·the ⁼brother of·him and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬possessioning of·them °whatever⁺ they·¬possessed·themselves and °all ⁼soul ⁼which they·¬possessed·themselves in to·¬Haran and they·came·out to·be·¬travelled to °earth ¬Canaan and they·came to °earth ¬Canaan

6 and ¬went·through Abram °the ⁼earth to °the ⁼¬length of·her ¬until of·the ⁼¬place of·¬Shechem upon °the ⁼¬oak ⁼the ⁼¬high then the⁺ ⁼¬Canaanites⁺ ŧhen they·¬dwelled °the ⁼earth

7 and was·¬seen lord to·the Abram and told to·him to·the ⁼seed of·you I·will·give °the ⁼earth ⁼this and ¬built there Abram °¬altar to·lord ⁼the ⁼¬seen to·him

8 and ¬left ¬from·there to °the ⁼mountain ¬according·to °¬easts⁺ Baithēl and stood there °the ⁼¬tent of·him Baithēl ¬according·to °sea and Aggai ¬according·to °¬easts⁺ and ¬built there °¬altar to·the ⁼lord and ¬called·himself upon to·the ⁼name of·lord

9 and ¬took·away Abram and ¬travelled ¬encamped in to·the ⁼¬deserted

10 and was·generated·himself ¬famine upon of·the ⁼earth and ¬came Abram to °Egypt to·¬be·a·stranger there ¬that ¬strengthened the ⁼¬famine upon of·the ⁼earth

11 was·generated·himself then ¬when ¬came·near Abram to·come·to to °Egypt told Abram Sara ⁼the ⁼woman of·him I·know I* ¬that woman ⁼¬good-looking you·are

12 will·be·himself therefore as iᵮ they·should·¬see °you the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ they·will·¬say ¬that woman of·him this and they·will·kill·off °me °you then they·will·¬gain·themselves

13 ꜝtell therefore ¬that sister of·him I·am ¬that iᵮ ¬well to·me should·be·generated·himself through °you and will·live·himself the ⁼soul of·me ¬because·of of·you

14 was·generated·himself then ¬when came·to Abram to °Egypt ¬seeing ⁼the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ °the ⁼woman ¬that beautiful was ¬very

15 and they·¬saw °her the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ to·¬Pharaoh and they·¬praised °her unto °¬Pharaoh and they·¬brought·in °her to °the ⁼house of·¬Pharaoh

16 and to·the Abram ¬well they·¬lended·themselves through °her and they·were·generated·themselves to·him sheep⁺ and calves⁺ and donkeys⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ and ¬maidservants⁺ ¬half-donkeys⁺ and camels⁺

17 and ¬chastised the ⁼God °the ⁼¬Pharaoh to·¬chastisements⁺ ⁼great⁺ and to·¬evil⁺ and °the ⁼house of·him about Saras ⁼the ⁼woman Abram

18 calling then ¬Pharaoh °the Abram told °what ⁼this you·did to·me ¬that not you·¬announced to·me ¬that woman of·you is

19 so·that °what you·told ¬that sister of·me is and I·took °her to·myself to °woman and now ¬¡see! the ⁼woman of·you ¬in·front·of of·you taking ꜝ¬run·from

20 and ¬ordered·himself ¬Pharaoh to·men⁺ about Abram to·¬escort °him and °the ⁼woman of·him and °all⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ was to·him and °¬Lot with of·him

13 ¬ascended then Abram out of·Egypt he and the ⁼woman of·him and all⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ of·him and ¬Lot with of·him to °the ⁼¬deserted

2 Abram then was rich ¬very to·¬animals⁺ and to·silver and to·gold

3 and was·¬travelled ¬whence came to °the ⁼¬deserted ¬until Baithēl ¬until of·the ⁼¬place ¬whither was the ⁼¬tent of·him °the ⁼¬before ¬each °¬midst Baithēl and ¬each °¬midst Aggai

4 to °the ⁼¬place of·the ⁼¬altar ¬whither did there °the ⁼¬beginning and ¬called·himself there Abram °the ⁼name of·lord

5 and to·¬Lot ⁼the ⁼self-¬going·with with Abram was sheep⁺ and ¬oxes⁺ and ¬tents⁺

6 and not ¬made·room·for °them the ⁼earth to·¬dwell ¬together ¬that was the⁺ ⁼¬possessioning of·them many⁺ and not they·were·able·themselves to·¬dwell ¬together

7 and was·generated·himself ¬quarrel ¬each °¬midst of·the⁺ ⁼¬flocksmans⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ of·the Abram and ¬each °¬midst of·the⁺ ⁼¬flocksmans⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ of·the ⁼¬Lot then the⁺ ⁼¬Canaanites⁺ and the⁺ Ferezaioi ŧhen they·¬dwelled °the ⁼earth

8 told then Abram to·the ⁼¬Lot ńot ꜝlet·them·be ¬quarrel ¬each °¬midst myˊ and of·you and ¬each °¬midst of·the⁺ ⁼¬flocksmans⁺ of·me and ¬each °¬midst of·the⁺ ⁼¬flocksmans⁺ of·you ¬that humans⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ we we·are

9 not ¬¡see! all ⁼the ⁼earth ¬in·front·of of·you is ꜝbe·¬been·separated off myˊ if you to °¬left⁺ I* to °¬right⁺ if then you to °¬right⁺ I* to °¬left⁺

10 and ¬lifting·up ⁼¬Lot °the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ of·him ¬saw °all ⁼the ⁼¬region of·the ⁼¬Jordan ¬that all was self-¬watering ¬before of·the·one to·¬overturn °the ⁼God °¬Sodom and °¬Gomorrah as the ⁼¬paradise of·the ⁼God and as the ⁼earth of·Egypt ¬until to·come to Zogora

11 and ¬selected·himself to·himself ¬Lot °all ⁼the ⁼¬region of·the ⁼¬Jordan and ¬took·away ¬Lot off of·¬easts⁺ and they·were·¬been·separated ¬each off of·the ⁼brother of·him

12 Abram then ¬dwelled in to·earth ¬Canaan ¬Lot then ¬dwelled in to·city of·the⁺ ⁼¬region⁺ and ¬dwelled in to·¬Sodom

13 then the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ in to·¬Sodom ¬evil⁺ and ¬sinful⁺ ¬in·front·of of·the ⁼God ¬very

14 then the ⁼God told to·the Abram with °the·one to·be·¬been·separated °the ⁼¬Lot off of·him ¬looking·up to·the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ of·you ꜝ¬see off of·the ⁼¬place ¬whither now you you·are unto °¬north and °¬southwest and °¬easts⁺ and °sea

15 ¬that °all ⁼the ⁼earth ⁼which you you·¬see to·you I·will·give °her and to·the ⁼seed of·you ¬until of·the ⁼eternity

16 and I·will·do °the ⁼seed of·you as °the ⁼¬sand of·the ⁼earth if is·able·himself whatever to·¬count·out °the ⁼¬sand of·the ⁼earth and the ⁼seed of·you will·be·¬counted·out

17 ¬arising ꜝ¬go·through °the ⁼earth to also °the ⁼¬length of·her and to °the ⁼¬width ¬that to·you I·will·give °her

18 and ¬moving·a·tent Abram ⁼coming ¬dwelled ¬from °the ⁼¬oak ⁼the Mambrē which was in Chebrōn and ¬built there °¬altar to·lord

14 was·generated·himself then in to·the ⁼kingdom ⁼the·one Amarfal ⁼king Sennaar Ariōch ⁼king Ellasar and Chodollogomor ⁼king of·¬Elamite and Thargal ⁼king of·nations⁺

2 they·did °¬war with Balla ⁼king of·¬Sodom and with Barsa ⁼king of·¬Gomorrah and Sennaar of·king Adama and ¬??? of·king Sebōim and of·king of·¬Balak this is Sēgōr

3 all⁺ ⁼these⁺ they·¬agreed·with upon °the ⁼¬valley ⁼the ⁼¬salty this ⁼the ⁼sea of·the⁺ ⁼¬salts⁺

4 twelve °years⁺ they·served to·the Chodollogomor then to·the ⁼¬thirteenth ⁼year they·¬left

5 in then to·the ⁼four-and-tenth ⁼year came Chodollogomor and the⁺ ⁼kings⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ with of·him and they·¬cut °the⁺ ⁼¬giants⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ in Astarōth Karnain and °nations⁺ ⁼¬strong⁺ ¬together to·them and °the·ones⁺ ¬??? °the·ones⁺ in Sauē to·the ⁼city

6 and °the⁺ Chorraious ⁼the·ones⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼mountains⁺ Sēir ¬until of·the ⁼¬terebinth·resin ⁼the Faran which is in to·the ⁼¬deserted

7 and ¬living they·came upon °the ⁼¬flow of·the ⁼judgment this is Kadēs and they·¬cut °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ Amalēk and °the⁺ Amorraious ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling in Asasanthamar

8 came·out then king of·¬Sodom and king of·¬Gomorrah and king Adama and king Sebōim and king of·¬Balak this is Sēgōr and they·¬deployed·themselves to·them to °¬war in to·the ⁼¬cavity ⁼the ⁼¬salty

9 unto Chodollogomor ⁼king of·¬Elamite and Thargal ⁼king of·nations⁺ and Amarfal ⁼king Sennaar and Ariōch ⁼king Ellasar the⁺ ⁼four⁺ ⁼kings⁺ unto °the·ones⁺ five

10 then the ⁼¬cavity ⁼the ⁼¬salty ¬wells⁺ ⁼¬wells⁺ of·¬tar ¬fled then king of·¬Sodom and king of·¬Gomorrah and they·¬fell·into there then the⁺ ⁼¬left·behind to °the ⁼¬hilly they·¬fled

11 they·took then °the ⁼horse ⁼all ⁼the·one of·¬Sodom and of·¬Gomorrah and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬foods⁺ of·them and they·came·off

12 they·took then and °the ⁼¬Lot ⁼son of·the ⁼brother Abram and °the ⁼¬accoutrements of·him and they·¬moved·themselves was for ¬dwelling in to·¬Sodom

13 self-¬coming then of·the⁺ ⁼¬escaped whatever ¬announced Abram ⁼the ⁼¬traveler he then ¬dwelled unto to·the ⁼¬oak ⁼the Mambrē the·one ¬??? of·the ⁼brother Eschōl and of·brother Aunan which⁺ they·were ¬confederates⁺ of·the Abram

14 hearing then Abram ¬that has·¬taken·captive·himself ¬Lot ⁼the ⁼brother of·him ¬numbered °the⁺ ⁼¬one's·own⁺ ⁼¬native-born·servant⁺ of·him °three·hundred⁺ ten and eight and ¬sought ¬after of·them ¬until Dan

15 and ¬fell upon °them °the ⁼night he and the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·him and ¬struck °them and ¬pursued °them ¬until Chōba which is in to·¬left of·¬Damascus

16 and ¬turned·away °all ⁼the ⁼horse of·¬Sodom and °¬Lot ⁼the ⁼brother of·him ¬turned·away and °the⁺ ⁼¬possessioning of·him and °the⁺ ⁼women⁺ and °the ⁼people

17 came·out then king of·¬Sodom to °¬meeting to·him with °the·one to·¬live °him off of·the ⁼¬slaughter of·the Chodollogomor and of·the⁺ ⁼kings⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ with of·him to °the ⁼¬cavity ⁼the Sauē this was the ⁼¬plain of·king

18 and ¬Melchizedek ⁼king of·¬Salem ¬brought °breads⁺ and °wine was then priest of·the ⁼God ⁼the ⁼¬Highest

19 and ¬praised °the Abram and told having·been·¬praised Abram to·the ⁼God ⁼the ⁼¬Highest which ¬created °the ⁼heaven and °the ⁼earth

20 and ¬praiseworthy ⁼the ⁼God ⁼the ⁼¬Highest ⁼which ¬delivered °the⁺ ⁼¬enemies⁺ of·you °¬under·one's·hand⁺ to·you and gave to·him °¬tenth off of·all⁺

21 told then king of·¬Sodom unto Abram ꜝgive to·me °the⁺ ⁼men⁺ then °the ⁼horse ꜝtake to·yourself

22 told then Abram unto °king of·¬Sodom I·will·¬stretch·out °the ⁼hand of·me unto °the ⁼God ⁼the ⁼¬Highest which ¬created °the ⁼heaven and °the ⁼earth

23 if off of·¬cord ¬until of·¬knob of·¬sandal I·will·take·myself off of·all⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ yourˊ so·that ńot you·should·tell ¬that I* I·enriched °the Abram

24 ¬but of·which⁺ they·¬ate the⁺ ⁼youths⁺ and of·the ⁼¬part of·the⁺ ⁼men⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬gone·with with myˊ Eschōl Aunan Mambrē these⁺ they·will·take·themselves °¬part

15 with then °the⁺ ⁼¬declarations⁺ ⁼these⁺ was·been·generated ¬declaration of·lord unto Abram in to·¬vision saying ńot ꜝ¬fear·yourself Abram I* I·¬shield of·you the ⁼¬wage of·you much will·be·himself ¬very

2 says then Abram ¬master °what to·me you·will·give I* then I·¬release·myself ¬childless then ⁼the ⁼son Masek ⁼the ⁼¬native-born·servant of·me this ¬Damascus ¬Eliezer

3 and told Abram ¬since to·me* not you·gave °seed then the ⁼¬native-born·servant of·me will·¬inherit °me

4 and ¬straightaway voice of·lord was·generated·himself unto °him saying not will·¬inherit °you this but which will·come·out·himself out of·you this will·¬inherit °you

5 ¬led·out then °him out and told to·him ꜝ¬look·up ¬so to °the ⁼heaven and ꜝ¬number °the⁺ ⁼stars⁺ if you·will·be·able·yourself to·¬count·out °them and told thus will·be·himself the ⁼seed of·you

6 and trusted Abram to·the ⁼God and was·¬counted to·him to °¬justice

7 told then unto °him I* the ⁼God ⁼the ⁼¬leading·out °you out of·¬country of·¬Chaldeans⁺ ¬so to·give to·you °the ⁼earth ⁼this to·¬inherit

8 told then ¬master ⁼lord ¬according·to °what I·will·know·myself ¬that I·will·¬inherit °her

9 told then to·him ꜝtake to·me °¬heifer ⁼three·years·old and °¬goat ⁼three·years·old and °¬ram ⁼three·years·old and °pigeon and °dove

10 took then to·him °all⁺ ⁼these⁺ and ¬distributed °them ⁼¬midst⁺ and ¬placed °them ⁼¬facing⁺ to·one·another⁺ then °the⁺ ⁼¬birds⁺ not ¬distributed

11 ¬came then ¬birds⁺ upon °the⁺ ⁼bodies⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬pieces⁺ of·them and ¬sat·down·with to·them Abram

12 about then of·sun °¬wests⁺ ¬amazement ¬fell to·the Abram and ¬¡see! ¬fear ⁼¬dark ⁼great ¬falls to·him

13 and was·¬said unto Abram knowing you·will·know·yourself ¬that ¬foreigner will·be·himself the ⁼seed of·you in to·earth not to·¬one's·own and they·will·¬enslave °them and they·will·do·evil °them and they·will·¬humble °them °four·hundred⁺ ⁼years⁺

14 then °the ⁼nation to·which ifᵮ they·should·serve I·will·judge I* with then °these⁺ they·will·come·out·themselves ¬here with of·¬accoutrements ⁼much

15 you then you·will·come·off·yourself unto °the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·you with of·peace ¬buried in to·¬old·age ⁼beautiful

16 fourth then generation they·will·be·¬turned·away ¬here ¬not·yet for they·have·¬fulfilled·themselves the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·the⁺ Amorraiōn ¬until of·the·one now

17 ¬since then was·generated·himself the ⁼sun unto to·¬wests⁺ ¬flame was·generated·himself and ¬¡see! ¬oven ⁼self-¬smoking and ¬windows⁺ of·fire which⁺ they·¬passed·through ¬each °¬midst of·the⁺ ⁼¬pieces⁺ of·these⁺

18 in to·the ⁼day ⁼that ¬made·a·covenant·himself lord to·the Abram °¬covenant saying to·the ⁼seed of·you I·will·give °the ⁼earth ⁼this off of·the ⁼¬river of·Egypt ¬until of·the ⁼¬river ⁼the ⁼great ⁼¬river ⁼¬Euphrates

19 °the⁺ Kainaious and °the⁺ Kenezaious and °the⁺ Kedmōnaious

20 and °the⁺ Chettaious and °the⁺ Ferezaious and °the⁺ Rafain

21 and °the⁺ Amorraious and °the⁺ ⁼¬Canaanites⁺ and °the⁺ Euaious and °the⁺ Gergesaious and °the⁺ Iebousaious

16 Sara then the ⁼woman Abram not ¬gave·birth·to to·him was then to·her ¬maidservant ⁼Egyptian to·which name Hagar

2 told then Sara unto Abram ¬¡see! ¬confined °me lord of·the·one ńot to·¬give·birth·to ꜝcome·to therefore unto °the ⁼¬maidservant of·me so·that ¬??? out of·her ¬obeyed then Abram of·the ⁼voice Saras

3 and taking Sara ⁼the ⁼woman Abram °Hagar ⁼the ⁼Egypt ⁼the·one of·herself °¬maidservant with ten °years⁺ of·the·one to·¬dwell Abram in to·earth ¬Canaan and gave °her Abram ⁼the ⁼man of·her to·him °woman

4 and came·to unto °Hagar and ¬seized and ¬saw ¬that in to·¬belly has and was·¬dishonored the ⁼¬lady ¬in·front·of of·her

5 told then Sara unto Abram I·am·¬harmed out of·you I* I·have·given °the ⁼¬maidservant of·me to °the ⁼¬bosom of·you ¬seeing then ¬that in to·¬belly has I·was·¬dishonored ¬in·front·of of·her may·judge the ⁼God ¬each °¬midst myˊ and of·you

6 told then Abram unto Saran ¬¡see! the ⁼¬maidservant of·you in to·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·you ꜝ¬use·yourself to·her as iᵮ to·you ¬pleasing should·be and did·evil °her Sara and ¬ran·away off of·¬face of·her

7 found then °her ¬announcer of·lord upon of·the ⁼¬flow of·the ⁼water in to·the ⁼¬deserted upon of·the ⁼¬flow in to·the ⁼¬road Sour

8 and told to·her the ⁼¬announcer of·lord Hagar ⁼¬maidservant Saras ¬whence you·come·yourself and ¬where? you·¬travel·yourself and told off of·¬face Saras ⁼the ⁼¬lady of·me I* I·¬run·away

9 told then to·her the ⁼¬announcer of·lord ꜝbe·¬turned·away unto °the ⁼¬lady of·you and ꜝbe·¬humbled ¬by °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·her

10 and told to·her the ⁼¬announcer of·lord ¬multiplying I·will·¬multiply °the ⁼seed of·you and not will·be·¬numbered off of·the ⁼¬multitude

11 and told to·her the ⁼¬announcer of·lord ¬¡see! you in to·¬belly you·have and you·will·¬give·birth·to·yourself °son and you·will·call °the ⁼name of·him Ismaēl ¬that ¬listened·to lord to·the ⁼¬lowliness of·you

12 this will·be·himself ¬rugged ⁼human the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·him upon °all⁺ and the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·all⁺ upon °him and ¬according·to °¬face of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·him will·¬dwell

13 and called Hagar °the ⁼name of·lord ⁼the ⁼speaking unto °her you the ⁼God ⁼the ⁼¬looking·upon °me ¬that told and for ¬before I·¬saw °¬seen to·me

14 ¬because·of of·this called °the ⁼¬well ¬well ¬whither ¬before they·¬saw ¬¡see! ¬each °¬midst Kadēs and ¬each °¬midst Barad

15 and ¬gave·birth·to Hagar to·the Abram °son and called Abram °the ⁼name of·the ⁼son of·him °which ¬gave·birth·to to·him Hagar Ismaēl

16 Abram then was eighty six of·years⁺ ¬when ¬gave·birth·to Hagar °the Ismaēl to·the Abram

17 was·generated·himself then Abram of·years⁺ ¬ninety nine and was·¬seen lord to·the Abram and told to·him I* I·am the ⁼God of·you ꜝ¬please ¬in·front·of myˊ and ꜝbe·generated·yourself ¬blameless

2 and I·will·¬place·myself °the ⁼¬covenant of·me ¬each °¬midst myˊ and ¬each °¬midst of·you and I·will·¬multiply °you ¬very

3 and ¬collapsed Abram upon °¬face of·him and spoke to·him the ⁼God ⁼saying

4 and I* ¬¡see! the ⁼¬covenant of·me with of·you and you·will·be·yourself father of·¬multitude of·nations⁺

5 and not will·be·called ¬still the ⁼name of·you Abram but will·be·himself the ⁼name of·you Abraham ¬that °father of·many⁺ ⁼nations⁺ I·have·¬placed °you

6 and I·will·¬grow °you ¬very ¬very and I·will·¬place °you to °nations⁺ and kings⁺ out of·you they·will·come·out·themselves

7 and I·will·stand °the ⁼¬covenant of·me ¬each °¬midst myˊ and ¬each °¬midst of·you and ¬each °¬midst of·the ⁼seed of·you with °you to °generations⁺ of·them to °¬covenant ⁼eternal to·be of·you God and of·the ⁼seed of·you with °you

8 and I·will·give to·you and to·the ⁼seed of·you with °you °the ⁼earth ⁼which you·¬are·a·stranger °all ⁼the ⁼earth ¬Canaan to °¬possession ⁼eternal and I·will·be·myself to·them God

9 and told the ⁼God unto °Abraham you then °the ⁼¬covenant of·me you·will·¬keep you and the ⁼seed of·you with °you to °the⁺ ⁼generations⁺ of·them

10 and this ⁼the ⁼¬covenant °which you·will·¬keep ¬each °¬midst myˊ and of·you⁺ and ¬each °¬midst of·the ⁼seed of·you with °you to °the⁺ ⁼generations⁺ of·them will·be·¬circumcised of·you⁺ all ⁼¬male

14 and ¬uncircumcised ⁼virulent ⁼which not will·be·¬circumcised °the ⁼flesh of·the ⁼¬uncircumcision of·him to·the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼eighth will·be·¬rooted·out the ⁼soul ⁼that out of·the ⁼¬gens of·her ¬that °the ⁼¬covenant of·me ¬dispersed

15 told then the ⁼God to·the ⁼Abraham Sara ⁼the ⁼woman of·you not will·be·called the ⁼name of·her Sara but ¬Sarah will·be·himself the ⁼name of·her

16 I·will·¬praise then °her and I·will·give to·you out of·her °¬child and I·will·¬praise °him and will·be·himself to °nations⁺ and kings⁺ of·nations⁺ out of·him they·will·be·themselves

17 and ¬collapsed Abraham upon °¬face and ¬laughed and told in to·the ⁼¬mind of·him saying if to·the ⁼hundred·years will·be·generated·himself and if ¬Sarah ¬ninety of·years⁺ being will·¬give·birth·to·himself

18 told then Abraham unto °the ⁼God Ismaēl ⁼this ꜝlet·them·live ¬in·front·of of·you

19 told then the ⁼God to·the ⁼Abraham ¬yes ¬¡see! ¬Sarah ⁼the ⁼woman of·you will·¬give·birth·to·himself to·you °son and you·will·call °the ⁼name of·him °Yitzchaq and I·will·stand °the ⁼¬covenant of·me unto °him to °¬covenant ⁼eternal and to·the ⁼seed of·him with °him

20 about then Ismaēl ¬¡see! I·¬listened·to of·you ¬¡see! I·¬praised °him and I·will·¬grow °him and I·will·¬multiply °him ¬very twelve °nations⁺ will·engender and I·will·give °him to °nation ⁼great

21 then °the ⁼¬covenant of·me I·will·stand unto °Yitzchaq ⁼which will·¬give·birth·to·himself to·you ¬Sarah to °the ⁼¬time ⁼this in to·the ⁼¬year ⁼the ⁼óther

22 ¬completed then speaking unto °him and ¬ascended the ⁼God off of·Abraham

23 and took Abraham Ismaēl ⁼the ⁼son of·him and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬native-born·servant⁺ of·him and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬bought·with·silver⁺ and °all ⁼virulent of·the⁺ ⁼men⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ in to·the ⁼house of·Abraham and ¬circumcised °the⁺ ⁼¬uncircumcisions⁺ of·them in to·the ⁼¬time of·the ⁼day ⁼that ¬as spoke to·him the ⁼God

24 ⁼Abraham then was ¬ninety nine of·years⁺ ¬when ¬circumcised °the ⁼flesh of·the ⁼¬uncircumcision of·him

25 Ismaēl then the ⁼son of·him of·years⁺ ten of·three⁺ was ¬when was·¬circumcised °the ⁼flesh of·the ⁼¬uncircumcision of·him

26 in to·the ⁼¬time of·the ⁼day ⁼that was·¬circumcised Abraham and Ismaēl ⁼the ⁼son of·him

18 was·¬seen then to·him the ⁼God unto to·the ⁼¬oak ⁼the Mambrē of·self-¬sitting of·him upon of·the ⁼¬door ⁼the ⁼¬tent of·him of·¬noon

2 ¬looking·up then to·the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ of·him ¬saw and ¬¡see! three⁺ ⁼men⁺ they·had·stood ¬above of·him and ¬seeing ¬hastened to °¬meeting to·them off of·the ⁼¬door ⁼the ⁼¬tent of·him and ¬worshipped upon °the ⁼earth

3 and told lord if ¬therefore I·found °¬grace ¬in·front·of of·you ńot you·should·¬pass·by °the ⁼¬child of·you

4 ꜝlet·them·be·taken ¬so water and ꜝlet·¬wash⁺ °the⁺ ⁼feet⁺ of·you⁺ and ꜝ¬cool⁺ ¬by °the ⁼tree

5 and I·will·take·myself °bread and ꜝ¬eat⁺·yourselves⁺ and with °this you⁺·will·¬pass·by·yourselves⁺ to °the ⁼¬road of·you⁺ ¬whither ¬because·of you⁺·¬turned·from unto °the ⁼¬child of·you⁺ and they·told thus ꜝdo ¬as you·have·¬said

6 and ¬hastened Abraham upon °the ⁼¬tent unto °¬Sarah and told to·her ꜝ¬hasten and ꜝ¬mix·up °three⁺ ⁼¬measures⁺ of·¬fine·flour and ꜝdo °¬cakeses⁺

7 and to °the⁺ ⁼¬oxes⁺ ¬ran Abraham and took °¬young·calf ⁼¬tender and °beautiful and gave to·the ⁼¬child and ¬hastened of·the·one to·do °it

8 took then °¬cow·butter and °milk and °the ⁼¬young·calf ⁼which did and ¬set·before to·them and they·¬ate he then had·¬stood·by to·them ¬by °the ⁼tree

9 told then unto °him ¬where? ¬Sarah ⁼the ⁼woman of·you then the ⁼¬answered told ¬¡see! in to·the ⁼¬tent

10 told then ¬returning I·will·¬come unto °you ¬according·to °the ⁼¬time ⁼this to °hours⁺ and will·have °son ¬Sarah ⁼the ⁼woman of·you ¬Sarah then heard unto to·the ⁼¬door of·the ⁼¬tent being ¬after of·him

11 Abraham then and ¬Sarah ¬elder⁺ ⁼having·¬advanced of·days⁺ ¬failed then ¬Sarah to·self-be·generated °the⁺ ⁼¬feminine⁺

12 ¬laughed then ¬Sarah in to·¬self saying ¬not·yet ¬on·the·other·hand to·me has·been·generated ¬until of·the·one now then the ⁼lord of·me ¬elder

13 and told lord unto °Abraham °what ¬that ¬laughed ¬Sarah in to·¬self saying ¬no? ¬indeed ¬truly I·will·¬give·birth·to·myself I* then I·have·¬grown·old

14 ńot ¬is·impossible ¬from to·the ⁼God ¬declaration to °the ⁼¬time ⁼this I·will·¬live unto °you to °hours⁺ and will·be·himself to·the ⁼¬Sarah son

15 ¬denied·himself then ¬Sarah ⁼saying not I·¬laughed was·¬feared for and told ¬not! but you·¬laughed

16 ¬raising·up then ¬from·there the⁺ ⁼men⁺ they·¬looked·down upon °¬face of·¬Sodom and of·¬Gomorrah Abraham then ¬went·with·himself with of·them ¬escorting °them

17 then the ⁼lord told ńot I·will·¬hide I* off of·Abraham ⁼the ⁼¬child of·me °which⁺ I* I·do

18 Abraham then self-generated will·be·himself to °nation ⁼great and °much and they·will·be·¬been·blessed in to·him all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ of·the ⁼earth

19 had·¬seen for ¬that will·¬direct to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him and to·the ⁼house of·him with °him and they·will·¬keep °the⁺ ⁼¬roads⁺ of·lord to·do °¬justice and °judgment ¬that iᵮ should·¬bring·upon lord upon °Abraham °all⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ spoke unto °him

20 told then lord ¬shouting of·¬Sodom and of·¬Gomorrah has·¬multiplied·himself and the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·them great⁺ ¬very

21 ¬coming therefore I·will·¬behold·myself if ¬according·to °the ⁼¬shouting of·them °the ⁼self-coming unto °me they·¬complete·themselves if then ńot so·that I·should·know

22 and ¬turning·away ¬from·there the⁺ ⁼men⁺ they·came to °¬Sodom Abraham then was having·stood ¬in·front·of of·lord

23 and ¬coming·near ⁼Abraham told ńot you·should·¬die °¬just with of·¬ungodly and will·be·himself the ⁼¬just as the ⁼¬ungodly

24 ifᵮ they·should·be fifty ¬just⁺ in to·the ⁼city you·will·¬destroy °them not you·will·¬loosen °all ⁼the ⁼¬place ¬because·of of·the·ones⁺ fifty of·¬just⁺ ifᵮ they·should·be in to·her

25 ¬surely·not you you·will·do as °the ⁼¬declaration ⁼this of·the·one to·kill·off °¬just with of·¬ungodly and will·be·himself the ⁼¬just as the ⁼¬ungodly ¬surely·not the ⁼judging °all ⁼the ⁼earth not you·will·do °judgment

26 told then lord ifᵮ I·should·find in to·¬Sodom fifty °¬just⁺ in to·the ⁼city I·will·¬release °all ⁼the ⁼¬place through °them

27 and ¬answered ⁼Abraham told now I·¬was·first·myself to·speak unto °the ⁼lord I* then I·am earth and ¬ashes

28 ifᵮ then they·should·be·¬had·little the·ones⁺ fifty ¬just⁺ five you·will·¬destroy ¬because·of of·the·ones⁺ five °all ⁼the ⁼city and told not ńot I·should·¬destroy ifᵮ I·should·find there forty five

29 and ¬added ¬still to·speak unto °him and told ifᵮ then they·should·be·found there forty and told not ńot I·should·¬destroy ¬because·of of·the·ones⁺ forty

30 and told ńot what lord ifᵮ I·should·speak ifᵮ then they·should·be·found there thirty and told not ńot I·should·¬destroy ifᵮ I·should·find there thirty

31 and told ¬since I·have to·speak unto °the ⁼lord ifᵮ then they·should·be·found there twenty and told not ńot I·should·¬destroy ¬because·of of·the·ones⁺ twenty

32 and told ńot °whatever lord ifᵮ I·should·speak ¬still ¬once ifᵮ then they·should·be·found there ten and told not ńot I·should·¬destroy ¬because·of of·the·ones⁺ ten

33 came·off then lord as ¬ceased·himself speaking to·the ⁼Abraham and Abraham ¬turned·away to °the ⁼¬place of·him

19 they·came then the·ones⁺ two ¬announcers⁺ to °¬Sodom of·¬evening ¬Lot then ¬sat·himself ¬from °the ⁼gate of·¬Sodom ¬seeing then ¬Lot ¬raised·up to °¬meeting to·them and ¬worshipped to·the ⁼¬face upon °the ⁼earth

2 and told ¬¡see! lords⁺ ꜝ¬turn·from⁺ to °the ⁼house of·the ⁼¬child of·you⁺ and ꜝ¬destroy⁺ and ꜝ¬wash⁺·yourselves⁺ °the⁺ ⁼feet⁺ of·you⁺ and ¬rising·at·dawn you⁺·will·come·off·yourselves⁺ to °the ⁼¬road of·you⁺ they·told then ¬not! but in to·the ⁼¬street we·will·¬destroy

3 and ¬constrained·himself °them and they·¬turned·from unto °him and they·came·to to °the ⁼house of·him and did to·them °¬carousing and °¬unleavened⁺ ¬baked to·them and they·¬ate

4 ¬before of·the·one to·be·¬slept and the⁺ ⁼men⁺ of·the ⁼city the⁺ ⁼¬Sodoms⁺ they·¬surrounded °the ⁼house off of·youth ¬until of·¬elder ¬all ⁼the ⁼people ¬together

5 and they·¬called·forth·themselves °the ⁼¬Lot and they·said unto °him ¬where? they·are the⁺ ⁼men⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼coming·to unto °you °the ⁼night ꜝ¬lead·out °them unto °us so·that we·should·¬be·intimate·with·ourselves to·them

6 came·out then ¬Lot unto °them unto °the ⁼¬threshold then °the ⁼¬door ¬shut ¬after of·him

7 told then unto °them ¬surely·not brothers⁺ ńot you⁺·should·¬act·wickedly·yourselves⁺

8 they·are then to·me two daughters⁺ ⁼which⁺ not they·knew °man I·will·¬lead·out °them unto °you⁺ and ꜝ¬use⁺·yourselves⁺ to·them ¬as iᵮ should·¬please to·you⁺ ¬only to °the⁺ ⁼men⁺ ⁼these⁺ ńot you⁺·should·do °¬nothing ⁼¬unjust of·which ¬because·of they·came·to ¬by °the ⁼¬shelter of·the⁺ ⁼¬planks⁺ of·me

9 they·told then ꜝ¬leave there one you·came to·¬be·a·stranger ńot and °judgment to·judge now therefore °you we·will·do·evil ¬more or °those⁺ and they·¬urged·themselves °the ⁼man ⁼the ⁼¬Lot ¬very and they·¬came·near to·¬break °the ⁼¬door

10 ¬stretching·out then the⁺ ⁼men⁺ °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ they·¬drew·into·themselves °the ⁼¬Lot unto °¬selves⁺ to °the ⁼house and °the ⁼¬door of·the ⁼house they·¬shut

11 then °the⁺ ⁼men⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼being upon of·the ⁼¬door of·the ⁼house they·¬struck to·¬inability·to·see off of·¬small ¬until of·great and they·were·¬paralyzed ¬seeking °the ⁼¬door

12 they·told then the⁺ ⁼men⁺ unto °¬Lot is what to·you ¬here ¬in-laws⁺ or sons⁺ or daughters⁺ or if what to·you other is in to·the ⁼city ꜝ¬lead·out out of·the ⁼¬place ⁼this

13 ¬that we·¬destroy we °the ⁼¬place ⁼this ¬that was·¬lifted·up the ⁼¬shouting of·them ¬in·front·of of·lord and missioned·off °us lord to·¬obliterate °her

14 came·out then ¬Lot and spoke unto °the⁺ ⁼¬in-laws⁺ of·him °the⁺ ⁼having·taken °the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·him and told ꜝ¬arise⁺ and ꜝcome·out⁺ out of·the ⁼¬place ⁼this ¬that ¬obliterates lord °the ⁼city ¬thought then to·¬joke ¬in·front·of of·the⁺ ⁼¬in-laws⁺ of·him

15 ¬when then ¬dawn was·generated·himself ¬??? the⁺ ⁼¬announcers⁺ °the ⁼¬Lot saying ¬arising ꜝtake °the ⁼woman of·you and °the·ones⁺ two °daughters⁺ of·you °which⁺ you·have and ꜝcome·out so·that ńot you·should·¬die·yourself to·the⁺ ⁼¬lawlessnesses⁺ of·the ⁼city

16 and they·were·¬troubled and they·¬grasped the⁺ ⁼¬announcers⁺ of·the ⁼hand of·him and of·the ⁼hand ⁼the ⁼woman of·him and of·the·ones⁺ of·hands⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ two of·daughters⁺ of·him in to·the·one to·self-¬spare °lord of·him

17 and was·generated·himself ¬when they·¬led·out °them out and they·told ¬saving ꜝ¬save °the·one of·yourself °soul ńot you·should·¬look·around to °the·ones⁺ ¬after ńot·then you·should·stand in to·all ⁼the ⁼¬region to °the ⁼mountain ꜝ¬save·yourself ¬lest you·should·be·¬taken·along·with

18 told then ¬Lot unto °them I·¬pray·myself lord

19 ¬since found the ⁼¬child of·you °mercy ¬in·front·of of·you and you·¬magnified °the ⁼¬justice of·you °which you·do upon °me* of·the·one to·live °the ⁼soul of·me I* then not I·will·be·able·myself to·be·¬saved to °the ⁼mountain ńot should·¬grasp °me the⁺ ⁼evil⁺ and I·should·die·off

20 ¬¡see! the ⁼city ⁼this ¬near of·the·one to·¬flee °me there which is ¬small there I·will·be·¬saved not ¬small is and will·live·himself the ⁼soul of·me

21 and told to·him ¬¡see! I·¬marvelled of·you °the ⁼¬face and upon to·the ⁼¬declaration ⁼this of·the·one ńot to·¬overturn °the ⁼city about of·which you·spoke

22 ꜝ¬hasten therefore of·the·one to·be·¬saved there not for I·will·be·able·myself to·do °¬thing ¬until of·the·one °you to·come·to there through °this called °the ⁼name of·the ⁼city ⁼that Sēgōr

23 the ⁼sun came·out upon °the ⁼earth and ¬Lot came·to to Sēgōr

24 and lord ¬rained·down upon °¬Sodom and °¬Gomorrah °¬sulfur and °fire ¬from of·lord out of·the ⁼heaven

25 and ¬overturned °the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ ⁼these⁺ and °all ⁼the ⁼¬neighboring and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling in to·the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬rising out of·the ⁼earth

26 and ¬looked·upon the ⁼woman of·him to °the·ones⁺ ¬after and was·generated·himself ¬monument of·¬salt

27 ¬rised·at·dawn then Abraham °the·one ¬early to °the ⁼¬place ¬whither had·stood ¬in·front·of of·lord

28 and ¬looked·upon upon °¬face of·¬Sodom and of·¬Gomorrah and upon °¬face of·the ⁼earth ⁼the ⁼¬region and ¬saw and ¬¡see! ¬ascended ¬flame of·the ⁼earth ¬like ¬vapor of·¬furnace

29 and was·generated·himself in to·the·one to·¬obliterate °lord °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ of·the ⁼¬neighboring was·¬remembered the ⁼God of·the ⁼Abraham and ¬sended·out °the ⁼¬Lot out of·¬midst of·the ⁼¬ruin in to·the·one to·¬overturn °lord °the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ in to·which⁺ ¬dwelled in to·them ¬Lot

30 ¬ascended then ¬Lot out Sēgōr and ¬sat·himself in to·the ⁼mountain and the·ones⁺ two daughters⁺ of·him with of·him was·¬feared for to·¬dwell in Sēgōr and ¬dwelled in to·the ⁼cave he and the·ones⁺ two daughters⁺ of·him with of·him

31 told then the ⁼¬elder unto °the ⁼young the ⁼father of·us ¬elder and no·one is upon of·the ⁼earth which will·come·to·himself unto °us as ¬is·fit to·all ⁼the ⁼earth

32 ¬come and we·should·¬water °the ⁼father of·us °wine and we·should·be·¬slept with of·him and we·should·¬raise·up out of·the ⁼father of·us °seed

33 they·¬watered then °the ⁼father of·them °wine in to·the ⁼night ⁼this and coming·to ⁼the ⁼¬elder was·¬slept with of·the ⁼father of·her °the ⁼night ⁼that and not had·¬seen in to·the·one to·be·¬slept °her and to·¬arise

34 was·generated·himself then to·the·one ¬next·day and told the ⁼¬elder unto °the ⁼young ¬¡see! I·was·¬slept ¬yesterday with of·the ⁼father of·us we·should·¬water °him ⁼wine and °the ⁼night ⁼this and coming·to ꜝbe·¬slept with of·him and we·should·¬raise·up out of·the ⁼father of·us °seed

35 they·¬watered then and in to·the ⁼night ⁼that °the ⁼father of·them °wine and coming·to ⁼the ⁼young was·¬slept with of·the ⁼father of·her and not had·¬seen in to·the·one to·be·¬slept °her and to·¬arise

36 and they·¬seized the·ones⁺ two daughters⁺ of·¬Lot out of·the ⁼father of·them

37 and ¬gave·birth·to the ⁼¬elder °son and called °the ⁼name of·him Mōab saying out of·the ⁼father of·me this ⁼father Mōabitōn ¬until of·the·one today of·day

38 ¬gave·birth·to then and the ⁼young °son and called °the ⁼name of·him Amman son of·the ⁼¬gens of·me this ⁼father Ammanitōn ¬until of·the·one today of·day

20 and ¬moved ¬from·there Abraham to °earth unto °¬southwest and ¬dwelled ¬each °¬midst Kadēs and ¬each °¬midst Sour and ¬was·a·stranger in Gerarois

2 told then Abraham about of·¬Sarah ⁼the ⁼woman of·him ¬that sister of·me is was·¬feared for to·tell ¬that woman of·me is ¬lest they·should·kill·off °him the⁺ ⁼men⁺ of·the ⁼city through °her missioned·off then Abimelech ⁼king Gerarōn and took °the ⁼¬Sarah

3 and came·to the ⁼God unto Abimelech in to·¬sleep °the ⁼night and told ¬¡see! you you·die·off about of·the ⁼woman ⁼which you·took this then is having·¬lived·with to·man

4 Abimelech then not touched·himself of·her and told lord °nation ⁼¬·ignorant and °¬just you·will·¬destroy

5 not he to·me told sister of·me is and she to·me told brother of·me is in to·¬clean ⁼heart and in to·¬justice of·hands⁺ I·did °this

6 told then to·him the ⁼God ¬according·to °¬sleep and I* I·knew ¬that in to·¬clean ⁼heart you·did °this and I·¬spared·myself I* of·you of·the·one ńot to·sin °you to °me* ¬because·of of·this not I·¬released °you to·self-touch of·her

7 now then ꜝ¬pay °the ⁼woman to·the ⁼human ¬that ¬prophet is and will·¬pray·himself about of·you and you·will·live·yourself if then ńot you·¬pay ꜝknow ¬that you·will·die·off·yourself you and all⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ yourˊ

8 and ¬rised·at·dawn Abimelech °the·one ¬early and called °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·him and spoke °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬declarations⁺ ⁼these⁺ to °the⁺ ⁼ears⁺ of·them they·were·¬feared then all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ ¬very

9 and called Abimelech °the·one Abraham and told to·him °what ⁼this you·did to·us ńot °whatever we·sinned to °you ¬that you·¬brought·upon upon °me* and upon °the ⁼kingdom of·me °sin ⁼great °work ⁼which no·one will·do you·have·done to·me

10 told then Abimelech to·the ⁼Abraham °what ¬seeing·in you·did °this

11 told then Abraham I·told for ¬therefore not is ¬reverence·for·God in to·the ⁼¬place ⁼this °me* also they·will·kill·off ¬because·of of·the ⁼woman of·me

12 and for ¬truly sister of·me is out of·father but not out of·mother was·been·generated then to·me to °woman

13 was·generated·himself then ¬when ¬led·out °me the ⁼God out of·the ⁼house ⁼the ⁼father of·me and I·told to·her °this ⁼the ⁼¬justice you·will·do upon °me* to °all ⁼¬place ¬whither ifᵮ we·should·come·to there ꜝtell °me* ¬that brother of·me is

14 took then Abimelech °thousand⁺ ⁼¬two-drachmas⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ and °calves⁺ and °¬children⁺ and °¬maidservants⁺ and gave to·the ⁼Abraham and ¬payed to·him °¬Sarah ⁼the ⁼woman of·him

15 and told Abimelech to·the ⁼Abraham ¬¡see! the ⁼earth of·me ¬in·front·of of·you ¬whither ifᵮ to·you should·¬please ꜝ¬dwell

16 then to·the ⁼¬Sarah told ¬¡see! I·have·given °thousand⁺ ⁼¬two-drachmas⁺ to·the ⁼brother of·you these⁺ will·be·himself to·you to °¬honor of·the ⁼¬face of·you and to·all⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ with of·you and °all ꜝ¬be·truthful

17 ¬prayed·himself then Abraham unto °the ⁼God and ¬healed·himself the ⁼God °the Abimelech and °the ⁼woman of·him and °the⁺ ⁼¬maidservants⁺ of·him and they·¬gave·birth·to

21 and lord ¬visitted·himself °the ⁼¬Sarah ¬as told and did lord to·the·one of·¬Sarah ¬as spoke

2 and ¬seizing ¬gave·birth·to ¬Sarah to·the ⁼Abraham °son to °the ⁼¬old·age to °the ⁼¬time ¬as spoke to·him lord

3 and called Abraham °the ⁼name of·the ⁼son of·him ⁼the ⁼self-generated to·him °which ¬gave·birth·to to·him ¬Sarah °Yitzchaq

4 ¬circumcised then Abraham °the ⁼Yitzchaq to·the ⁼eighth ⁼day ¬as ¬ordered·himself to·him the ⁼God

5 ⁼Abraham then was hundred of·years⁺ ¬when was·generated·himself to·him Yitzchaq ⁼the ⁼son of·him

6 told then ¬Sarah °¬laughter to·me did lord ⁼which for iᵮ should·hear will·¬rejoice·with·himself to·me
