9 ¬seeing then ¬Sarah °the ⁼son of·Hagar ⁼the ⁼Egypt which was·generated·himself to·the ⁼Abraham °¬playing with of·Yitzchaq ⁼the ⁼son of·her

14 ¬arose then Abraham °the·one ¬early and took °breads⁺ and °¬wineskin of·water and gave to·Hagar and ¬put upon °the ⁼shoulder and °the ⁼¬child and missioned·off °her coming·off then ¬led·astray·himself °the ⁼¬deserted ¬according·to °the ⁼¬well of·the ⁼¬oath

16 coming·off then ¬sat·himself ¬opposite of·him ¬from·afar ¬like of·¬bow °¬throwing told for not ńot I·should·¬see °the ⁼death of·the ⁼¬child of·me and ¬seated ¬opposite of·him ¬crying·out then the ⁼¬child ¬wept

17 ¬listened·to then the ⁼God of·the ⁼voice of·the ⁼¬child out of·the ⁼¬place ¬whither was and called ¬announcer of·the ⁼God °the ⁼Hagar out of·the ⁼heaven and told to·her what is Hagar ńot ꜝ¬fear·yourself has·¬listened·to for the ⁼God of·the ⁼voice of·the ⁼¬child of·you out of·the ⁼¬place ¬whither is

23 now therefore ꜝ¬swear to·me °the ⁼God ńot to·be·going·to·¬harm °me ńot·then °the ⁼seed of·me ńot·then °the ⁼name of·me but ¬according·to °the ⁼¬justice ⁼which I·did with of·you you·will·do with myˊ and to·the ⁼earth ⁼which you you·¬were·a·stranger in to·her

24 and told Abraham I* I·will·¬swear·myself

25 and ¬rebuked Abraham °the·one Abimelech about of·the⁺ ⁼¬wells⁺ of·the ⁼water of·which⁺ they·¬removed·themselves the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·the Abimelech

30 and told Abraham ¬that °the·ones⁺ seven °¬ewe-lambs⁺ ⁼these⁺ you·will·take·yourself ¬from myˊ so·that they·should·be to·me to °¬testimony ¬that I* I·¬dug °the ⁼¬well ⁼this

22 and was·generated·himself with °the⁺ ⁼¬declarations⁺ ⁼these⁺ the ⁼God ¬tested °the ⁼Abraham and told unto °him Abraham ⁼Abraham the·one then told ¬¡see! I*

2 and told ꜝtake °the ⁼son of·you °the ⁼beloved ⁼which you·loved °the ⁼Yitzchaq and ꜝbe·¬travelled to °the ⁼earth ⁼the ⁼¬high and ꜝ¬carry·up °him there to °¬whole·offering upon °one of·the⁺ ⁼mountains⁺ of·which⁺ iᵮ to·you I·should·tell

3 ¬arising then Abraham °the·one ¬early ¬saddled °the ⁼donkey of·him ¬took then with of·himself two °¬children⁺ and °Yitzchaq ⁼the ⁼son of·him and ¬splitting °¬woods⁺ to °¬whole·offering ¬arising was·¬travelled and came upon °the ⁼¬place ⁼which told to·him the ⁼God

17 ¬surely ¬certainly ¬praising I·will·¬praise °you and ¬multiplying I·will·¬multiply °the ⁼seed of·you as °the⁺ ⁼stars⁺ of·the ⁼heaven and as °the ⁼¬sand ⁼the·one ¬from °the ⁼lip of·the ⁼sea and will·¬inherit the ⁼seed of·you °the·ones⁺ cities⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬opposed⁺

18 and they·will·be·¬been·blessed in to·the ⁼seed of·you all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ of·the ⁼earth anti of·which⁺ you·¬obeyed of·the·one myˊ of·voice

19 was·¬turned·away then Abraham unto °the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·him and ¬arising they·were·¬travelled ¬together upon °the ⁼¬well of·the ⁼¬oath and ¬dwelled Abraham upon to·the ⁼¬well of·the ⁼¬oath

23 was·generated·himself then the ⁼life of·¬Sarah years⁺ hundred twenty seven

2 and died·off ¬Sarah in to·city Arbok which is in to·the ⁼¬hollow this is Chebrōn in to·earth ¬Canaan came then Abraham to·self-chop °¬Sarah and to·¬mourn

3 and ¬arose Abraham off of·the ⁼corpse of·him and told to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ Chet saying

4 ⁼¬foreigner and ¬stranger I* I·am with of·you⁺ ꜝgive⁺ therefore to·me °¬possession of·¬grave with of·you⁺ and I·should·¬bury °the ⁼corpse of·me off myˊ

5 they·were·¬answered then the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ Chet unto °Abraham saying

6 ńot lord ꜝhear then of·us king ¬from of·God you·are you in to·us in to·the⁺ ⁼¬select⁺ ⁼¬graves⁺ of·us ꜝ¬bury °the ⁼corpse of·you no·one for of·us °the ⁼¬grave of·him will·¬prevent off of·you of·the·one to·¬bury °the ⁼corpse of·you there

7 ¬arising then Abraham ¬worshipped to·the ⁼people of·the ⁼earth to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ Chet

8 and spoke unto °them Abraham ⁼saying if you⁺·have to·the ⁼soul of·you⁺ ¬so to·¬bury °the ⁼corpse of·me off of·¬face of·me ꜝhear⁺ of·me and ꜝspeak⁺ about myˊ Efrōn ⁼the·one of·the Saar

9 and ꜝlet·them·give to·me °the ⁼cave ⁼the ⁼¬double which is to·him °the ⁼being in to·¬part of·the ⁼field of·him of·silver ⁼the ⁼¬worthy ꜝlet·them·give to·me °it in to·you⁺ to °¬possession of·¬grave

10 Efrōn then ¬sat·himself in to·¬midst of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ Chet ¬answered then Efrōn ⁼the Chettaios unto °Abraham told of·hearing ⁼the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ Chet and of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼self-¬entering to °the ⁼city saying

11 ¬from to·me* ꜝbe·generated·yourself lord and ꜝhear of·me °the ⁼field and °the ⁼cave ⁼the·one in to·him to·you I·give ¬in·front·of of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬citizens⁺ of·me I·have·given to·you ꜝ¬bury °the ⁼corpse of·you

12 and ¬worshipped Abraham ¬in·front·of of·the ⁼people of·the ⁼earth

13 and told to·the Efrōn to °the⁺ ⁼ears⁺ of·the ⁼people of·the ⁼earth ¬since unto myˊ you·are ꜝhear of·me °the ⁼silver of·the ⁼field ꜝtake ¬from myˊ and I·should·¬bury °the ⁼corpse of·me there

14 was·¬answered then Efrōn to·the ⁼Abraham saying

15 ¬not! lord I·have·heard earth of·four·hundred⁺ ⁼¬two-drachmas⁺ of·silver ¬each °¬midst myˊ and of·you what iᵮ may·be this you then °the ⁼corpse of·you ꜝ¬bury

16 and heard Abraham of·the Efrōn and ¬restored Abraham to·the Efrōn °the ⁼silver ⁼which spoke to °the⁺ ⁼ears⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ Chet °four·hundred⁺ ⁼¬two-drachmas⁺ of·silver of·¬tested to·¬traders⁺

17 and stood the ⁼field Efrōn which was in to·the ⁼¬double ⁼cave which is ¬according·to °¬face Mambrē the ⁼field and the ⁼cave ⁼which was in to·him and all ⁼tree ⁼which was in to·the ⁼field which is in to·the⁺ ⁼¬regions⁺ of·him ¬surrounding

18 to·the ⁼Abraham to °¬possession ¬in·front·of of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ Chet and of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼self-¬entering to °the ⁼city

19 with °these⁺ ¬buried Abraham °¬Sarah ⁼the ⁼woman of·him in to·the ⁼cave of·the ⁼field to·the ⁼¬double which is ¬opposite Mambrē this is Chebrōn in to·the ⁼earth ¬Canaan

20 and was·¬affirmed the ⁼field and the ⁼cave ⁼which was in to·him ⁼the ⁼Abraham to °¬possession of·¬grave ¬from of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ Chet

24 and Abraham was ¬elder ⁼having·¬advanced of·days⁺ and lord ¬praised °the ⁼Abraham ¬according·to °all⁺

2 and told Abraham to·the ⁼¬child of·him to·the ⁼¬elder of·the ⁼house of·him to·the ⁼¬ruler of·all⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ of·him ꜝ¬place °the ⁼hand of·you ¬by °the ⁼¬thigh of·me

3 and I·will·¬adjure °you °lord ⁼the ⁼God of·the ⁼heaven and °the ⁼God of·the ⁼earth so·that ńot you·should·take °woman to·the ⁼son of·me to·Yitzchaq off of·the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬Canaanites⁺ with of·which⁺ I* I·¬dwell in to·them

4 but to °the ⁼earth of·me ¬whither I·was·generated·myself should·¬travel and to °the ⁼¬tribe of·me and you·will·take·yourself °woman to·the ⁼son of·me to·Yitzchaq ¬from·there

5 told then unto °him the ⁼¬child ¬lest not ¬plans·himself the ⁼woman to·be·¬travelled with myˊ ¬after to °the ⁼earth ⁼this I·will·¬turn·away °the ⁼son of·you to °the ⁼earth ¬whence you·came·out ¬from·there

6 told then unto °him Abraham ꜝ¬watch·out to·yourself ńot you·should·¬turn·away °the ⁼son of·me there

7 lord ⁼the ⁼God of·the ⁼heaven and the ⁼God of·the ⁼earth which took °me out of·the ⁼house ⁼the ⁼father of·me and out of·the ⁼earth ⁼which I·was·been·generated which spoke to·me and ¬sweared to·me saying to·you I·will·give °the ⁼earth ⁼this and to·the ⁼seed of·you he will·mission·off °the ⁼¬announcer of·him ¬before of·you and you·will·take·yourself °woman to·the ⁼son of·me to·Yitzchaq ¬from·there

8 ifᵮ then ńot should·¬will the ⁼woman to·be·¬travelled with of·you to °the ⁼earth ⁼this ¬clean you·will·be·yourself off of·the ⁼¬oath ⁼this ¬only °the ⁼son of·me ńot you·should·¬turn·away there

9 and ¬placed the ⁼¬child °the ⁼hand of·him ¬by °the ⁼¬thigh of·Abraham ⁼the ⁼lord of·him and ¬sweared to·him about of·the ⁼¬declaration ⁼this

10 and took the ⁼¬child ten °camels⁺ off of·the⁺ ⁼camels⁺ of·the ⁼lord of·him and off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼good⁺ of·the ⁼lord of·him with of·himself and ¬arising was·¬travelled to °the ⁼¬Mesopotamia to °the ⁼city ¬Nahor

11 and ¬rested °the⁺ ⁼camels⁺ out of·the ⁼city ¬from °the ⁼¬well of·the ⁼water °the·one unto ¬late ¬when they·¬depart·themselves the⁺ ⁼self-¬drawing·water

12 and told lord the ⁼God of·the ⁼lord of·me of·Abraham ꜝ¬get·along·well ¬in·front·of myˊ today and ꜝdo °mercy with of·the ⁼lord of·me of·Abraham

13 ¬¡see! I* I·have·stood upon of·the ⁼¬flow of·the ⁼water then the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling °the ⁼city they·¬depart·themselves to·¬draw °water

14 and will·be·himself the ⁼virgin to·which iᵮ I* I·should·tell ꜝ¬incline °the ⁼¬jar of·you so·that I·should·drink and should·tell to·me ꜝdrink and °the⁺ ⁼camels⁺ of·you I·will·¬water ¬until iᵮ they·should·¬cease·themselves drinking °this you·¬made·ready to·the ⁼¬child of·you to·Yitzchaq and in to·this I·will·know·myself ¬that you·did °mercy to·the ⁼lord of·me to·Abraham

15 and was·generated·himself ¬before of·the·one to·¬complete °him ⁼speaking in to·the ⁼¬mind and ¬¡see! ¬Rebekah ¬departed·himself the ⁼¬given·birth·to Bathouēl ⁼son Melchas ⁼the ⁼woman of·¬Nahor ⁼brother then of·Abraham having °the ⁼¬jar upon of·the⁺ ⁼shoulders⁺ of·her

16 then the ⁼virgin was beautiful to·the ⁼¬face ¬very virgin was man not knew °her ¬coming then upon °the ⁼¬flow ¬filled °the ⁼¬jar and ¬ascended

17 ¬ran·to then the ⁼¬child to °¬meeting of·her and told ꜝ¬water °me °¬small ⁼water out of·the ⁼¬jar of·you

18 the·one then told ꜝdrink lord and ¬hastened and ¬took·down °the ⁼¬jar upon °the ⁼arm of·her and ¬watered °him

19 ¬until ¬ceased·himself drinking and told and to·the⁺ ⁼camels⁺ of·you I·will·¬draw·water·myself ¬until iᵮ all⁺ they·should·drink

20 and ¬hastened and ¬emptied·out °the ⁼¬jar to °the ⁼¬channel and ¬ran ¬still upon °the ⁼¬well to·¬draw and ¬drew·water·himself to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼camels⁺

21 then the ⁼human ¬considered °her and ¬remained·silent of·the·one to·know if has·¬gotten·along·well lord °the ⁼¬road of·him or not

22 was·generated·himself then ¬when they·¬ceased·themselves all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼camels⁺ ⁼drinking took the ⁼human °¬rings⁺ ⁼golden⁺ ¬each °¬drachma of·¬scale-weight and two °¬bracelets⁺ upon °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·her ten of·golden⁺ ¬scale-weight of·them

23 and ¬questioned °her and told daughter of·what you·are ꜝ¬announce to·me if is ¬from to·the ⁼father of·you ¬place to·us to·¬destroy

24 and told to·him daughter Bathouēl I·am I* of·the·one Melchas °which ¬gave·birth·to to·the ⁼¬Nahor

25 and told to·him and ¬chaffs⁺ and ¬foods⁺ ⁼many⁺ ¬from to·us and ¬place of·the·one to·¬destroy

26 and ¬delighting ⁼the ⁼human ¬worshipped to·lord

27 and told ¬praiseworthy ⁼lord ⁼the ⁼God of·the ⁼lord of·me of·Abraham which not ¬left·behind °the ⁼¬justice of·him and °the ⁼¬truth off of·the ⁼lord of·me °me* has·¬gotten·along·well lord to °house of·the ⁼brother ⁼the ⁼lord of·me

28 and ¬running ⁼the·one ¬child ¬announced to °the ⁼house of·the ⁼mother of·her ¬according·to °the⁺ ⁼¬declarations⁺ ⁼these⁺

29 then to·the ⁼¬Rebekah brother was to·which name Laban and ¬ran Laban unto °the ⁼human out upon °the ⁼¬flow

30 and was·generated·himself ¬when ¬saw °the⁺ ⁼¬rings⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬bracelets⁺ upon °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·the ⁼sister of·him and when heard °the⁺ ⁼¬declarations⁺ of·¬Rebekah ⁼the ⁼sister of·him of·saying thus has·spoken to·me the ⁼human and came unto °the ⁼human of·having·stood of·him upon of·the⁺ ⁼camels⁺ upon of·the ⁼¬flow

31 and told to·him ¬come ꜝcome·to ¬praiseworthy ⁼lord so·that °what you·have·stood out I* then I·have·¬made·ready °the ⁼house and °¬place to·the⁺ ⁼camels⁺

32 came·to then the ⁼human to °the ⁼house and ¬unharnessed °the⁺ ⁼camels⁺ and gave °¬chaffs⁺ and °¬foods⁺ to·the⁺ ⁼camels⁺ and °water to·self-¬wash to·the⁺ ⁼feet⁺ of·him and to·the⁺ ⁼feet⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼men⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ with of·him

33 and ¬set·before to·them °breads⁺ to·¬eat and told not ńot I·should·¬eat ¬until of·the·one to·speak °me °the⁺ ⁼¬declarations⁺ of·me and they·told ꜝspeak

34 and told ¬child of·Abraham I* I·am

35 lord then ¬praised °the ⁼lord of·me ¬very and was·¬lifted·up and gave to·him °sheep⁺ and °calves⁺ °silver and °gold °¬children⁺ and °¬maidservants⁺ °camels⁺ and °donkeys⁺

36 and ¬gave·birth·to ¬Sarah ⁼the ⁼woman of·the ⁼lord of·me °son ⁼one to·the ⁼lord of·me with °the·one to·¬grow·old °him and gave to·him whatever⁺ was to·him

37 and ¬adjured °me the ⁼lord of·me saying not you·will·take·yourself °woman to·the ⁼son of·me off of·the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬Canaanites⁺ in to·which⁺ I* I·¬am·a·stranger in to·the ⁼earth of·them

38 but or to °the ⁼house of·the ⁼father of·me should·¬travel and to °the ⁼¬tribe of·me and you·will·take·yourself °woman to·the ⁼son of·me ¬from·there

39 I·told then to·the ⁼lord of·me ¬lest not will·¬travel·himself the ⁼woman with myˊ

40 and told to·me lord to·which I·¬pleased ¬in·front·of of·him he will·mission·off °the ⁼¬announcer of·him with of·you and will·¬get·along·well °the ⁼¬road of·you and you·will·take·yourself °woman to·the ⁼son of·me out of·the ⁼¬tribe of·me and out of·the ⁼house ⁼the ⁼father of·me

41 ŧhen ¬innocent you·will·be·yourself off of·the ⁼¬curse of·me ¬when for ifᵮ you·should·come to °the·one myˊ °¬tribe and ńot to·you they·should·give and you·will·be·yourself ¬innocent off of·the ⁼¬conjuring of·me

42 and coming today upon °the ⁼¬flow I·told lord the ⁼God of·the ⁼lord of·me of·Abraham if you you·¬get·along·well °the ⁼¬road of·me °which now I* I·¬travel·myself upon °her

43 ¬¡see! I* I·have·¬approached upon of·the ⁼¬flow of·the ⁼water and the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ of·the ⁼city they·will·come·out·themselves to·self-¬draw·water °water and will·be·himself the ⁼virgin to·which iᵮ I* I·should·tell ꜝ¬water °me °¬small ⁼water out of·the ⁼¬jar of·you

44 and should·tell to·me and you ꜝdrink and to·the⁺ ⁼camels⁺ of·you I·will·¬draw·water·myself this ⁼the ⁼woman °which ¬made·ready lord to·the·one of·himself to·¬servant ⁼Yitzchaq and in to·this I·will·know·myself ¬that you·have·done °mercy to·the ⁼lord of·me of·Abraham

45 and was·generated·himself ¬before of·the·one to·¬complete °me °speaking in to·the ⁼¬mind ¬straightaway ¬Rebekah ¬departed·himself having °the ⁼¬jar upon of·the⁺ ⁼shoulders⁺ and ¬came upon °the ⁼¬flow and ¬drew·water·himself I·told then to·her ꜝ¬water °me

46 and ¬hastening ¬took·down °the ⁼¬jar of·her off of·herself and told ꜝdrink you and °the⁺ ⁼camels⁺ of·you I·will·¬water and I·drank and °the⁺ ⁼camels⁺ of·me ¬watered

47 and I·¬asked °her and I·told of·what you·are daughter ⁼the·one then ¬asserted daughter Bathouēl I·am of·the ⁼son ⁼¬Nahor °which ¬gave·birth·to to·him Melcha and I·¬put·on to·her °the⁺ ⁼¬rings⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬bracelets⁺ about °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·her

48 and ¬delighting I·¬worshipped to·lord and I·¬praised °lord ⁼the ⁼God of·the ⁼lord of·me of·Abraham which ¬got·along·well to·me in to·¬road of·¬truth to·take °the ⁼daughter of·the ⁼brother ⁼the ⁼lord of·me to·the ⁼son of·him

49 if therefore you⁺·do you⁺ °mercy and °¬justice unto °the ⁼lord of·me ꜝ¬announce⁺ to·me if then ńot ꜝ¬announce⁺ to·me so·that I·should·¬turn to °¬right or to °¬left

50 ¬answered then Laban and Bathouēl they·told ¬from of·lord came·out the ⁼¬order ⁼this not we·will·be·able·ourselves therefore to·you to·¬contradict °evil to·beautiful

51 ¬¡see! ¬Rebekah ¬before of·you taking ꜝ¬run·from and ꜝlet·them·be woman to·the ⁼son of·the ⁼lord of·you ¬as spoke lord

52 was·generated·himself then in to·the·one to·hear °the ⁼¬child ⁼the·one of·Abraham of·the⁺ ⁼¬declarations⁺ of·these⁺ ¬worshipped upon °the ⁼earth to·lord

53 and ¬bringing ⁼the ⁼¬child °¬vessels⁺ ⁼silver⁺ and °golden⁺ and °cloak gave to·¬Rebekah and °¬gifts⁺ gave to·the ⁼brother of·her and to·the ⁼mother of·her

54 and they·¬ate and they·drank he and the⁺ ⁼men⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ with of·him being and they·were·¬slept and ¬arising ¬early told ꜝ¬send·away⁺ °me so·that I·should·come·off unto °the ⁼lord of·me

55 they·told then the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·her and the ⁼mother ꜝlet·them·¬stay the ⁼virgin with of·us of·day ¬like ten and with °these⁺ will·come·off·himself

56 the·one then told unto °them ńot you⁺·¬hold·back °me and lord ¬got·along·well °the ⁼¬road of·me ꜝ¬send·away⁺ °me so·that I·should·come·off unto °the ⁼lord of·me

57 the·ones⁺ then they·told we·should·call °the·one °¬child and we·should·¬ask °the ⁼mouth of·her

58 and they·called °¬Rebekah and they·told to·her you·will·¬travel·yourself with of·the ⁼human ⁼this the·one then told I·will·¬travel·myself

59 and they·¬sended·away °¬Rebekah ⁼the ⁼sister of·them and °the⁺ ⁼¬·already of·her and °the ⁼¬child ⁼the·one of·Abraham and °the·ones⁺ with of·him

60 and they·¬praised °¬Rebekah ⁼the ⁼sister of·them and they·told to·her sister of·us you·are ꜝbe·generated·yourself to °thousands⁺ of·myriads⁺ and ꜝlet·them·¬inherit the ⁼seed of·you °the·ones⁺ cities⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬opposed⁺

61 ¬arising then ¬Rebekah and the⁺ ⁼¬handmaiden⁺ of·her they·¬mounted upon °the⁺ ⁼camels⁺ and they·were·¬travelled with of·the ⁼human and ¬taking·up ⁼the ⁼¬child °the ⁼¬Rebekah came·off

62 Yitzchaq then ¬travelled·himself through of·the ⁼¬deserted ¬according·to °the ⁼¬well of·the ⁼¬appearance he then ¬dwelled in to·the ⁼earth ⁼the·one unto °¬southwest

63 and came·out Yitzchaq to·¬meditate to °the ⁼¬plain ⁼the·one unto of·¬afternoon and ¬looking·up to·the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ ¬saw °camels⁺ ⁼self-coming

64 and ¬looking·up ⁼¬Rebekah to·the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ ¬saw °the ⁼Yitzchaq and ¬leaped·down off of·the ⁼camel

65 and told to·the ⁼¬child °what is the ⁼human ⁼that ⁼the ⁼self-¬travelling in to·the ⁼¬plain to °¬meeting to·us told then the ⁼¬child ⁼this is the ⁼lord of·me then the ⁼taking °the ⁼¬reaping·hook ¬clothed·himself

66 and ¬related·fully·himself the ⁼¬child to·the ⁼Yitzchaq °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬declarations⁺ ⁼which⁺ did

67 came·to then Yitzchaq to °the ⁼house of·the ⁼mother of·him and took °the ⁼¬Rebekah and was·generated·himself of·him woman and loved °her and was·¬pleaded Yitzchaq about of·¬Sarah ⁼the ⁼mother of·him

25 self-¬adding then Abraham took °woman to·which name Chettoura

2 ¬gave·birth·to then to·him °the Zemran and °the Iexan and °the Madan and °the ⁼¬Midian and °the Iesbok and °the Sōue

3 Iexan then engendered °the Saba and °the Thaiman and °the Daidan sons⁺ then Daidan they·were·generated·themselves Ragouēl and Nabdeēl and Assouriim and Latousiim and Loōmim

4 ⁼sons⁺ then of·¬Midian Gaifa and Afer and ¬Enoch and Abira and ¬??? all⁺ ⁼these⁺ they·were sons⁺ Chettouras

5 gave then Abraham °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬possessioning of·him to·Yitzchaq ⁼the ⁼son of·him

6 and to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬concubines⁺ of·him gave Abraham °¬gifts⁺ and ¬sended·out °them off of·Yitzchaq ⁼the ⁼son of·him ¬still of·living of·him unto °¬easts⁺ to °earth of·¬easts⁺

7 these⁺ then the⁺ ⁼years⁺ of·days⁺ of·life of·Abraham °whatever⁺ lived hundred seventy five years⁺

8 and ¬failing died·off Abraham in to·¬old·age to·beautiful ¬old·man and ¬full of·days⁺ and was·¬added unto °the ⁼people of·him

9 and they·¬buried °him Yitzchaq and Ismaēl the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him to °the ⁼cave ⁼the ⁼¬double to °the ⁼field Efrōn ⁼the Saar ⁼the Chettaiou which is ¬opposite Mambrē

10 °the ⁼field and °the ⁼cave ⁼which ¬possessed·himself Abraham ¬from of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ Chet there they·¬buried °Abraham and °¬Sarah ⁼the ⁼woman of·him

11 was·generated·himself then with °the·one to·die·off °Abraham ¬praised the ⁼God °Yitzchaq ⁼the ⁼son of·him and ¬dwelled Yitzchaq ¬from °the ⁼¬well of·the ⁼¬appearance

12 these⁺ then the⁺ ⁼genesiss⁺ Ismaēl ⁼the ⁼son ⁼Abraham °which ¬gave·birth·to Hagar ⁼the ⁼¬maidservant of·¬Sarah to·the ⁼Abraham

13 and these⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼names⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ Ismaēl ¬according·to °name of·the⁺ ⁼generations⁺ of·him ¬firstborn Ismaēl Nabaiōth and Kēdar and Nabdeēl and Massam

14 and Masma and Idouma and Massē

15 and Choddad and Thaiman and Ietour and Nafes and Kedma

16 these⁺ they·are the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ Ismaēl and these⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼names⁺ of·them in to·the⁺ ⁼¬tents⁺ of·them and in to·the⁺ ⁼¬residences⁺ of·them twelve ¬rulers⁺ ¬according·to °nations⁺ of·them

17 and these⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼years⁺ of·the ⁼life Ismaēl hundred thirty seven °years⁺ and ¬failing died·off and was·¬added unto °the ⁼¬gens of·him

18 ¬dwelled then off Euilat ¬until Sour which is ¬according·to °¬face of·Egypt ¬until to·come unto Assurious ¬according·to °¬face of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·him ¬dwelled

19 and these⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼genesiss⁺ of·Yitzchaq ⁼the ⁼son ⁼Abraham Abraham engendered °the ⁼Yitzchaq

20 was then Yitzchaq of·years⁺ forty when took °the ⁼¬Rebekah ⁼daughter Bathouēl ⁼the ⁼¬Syrian out of·the ⁼¬Mesopotamia °sister Laban ⁼the ⁼¬Syrian to·himself °woman

21 ¬prayed·himself then Yitzchaq of·lord about of·¬Rebekah ⁼the ⁼woman of·him ¬that ¬barren was ¬listened·to then of·him the ⁼God and took in to·¬belly ¬Rebekah ⁼the ⁼woman of·him

22 ¬leaping then the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ in to·her told then if thus to·me ¬ensues to·self-be·generated so·that what to·me °this was·¬travelled then to·self-¬inquire ¬from of·lord

23 and told lord to·her two nations⁺ in to·the ⁼¬belly of·you they·are and two peoples⁺ out of·the ⁼¬belly of·you they·will·be·¬given·orders and people of·people will·¬be·higher and the ⁼¬greater will·serve to·the ⁼¬lesser

24 and they·were·¬fulfilled the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·the·one to·¬give·birth·to °her and to·¬this was ¬Twin⁺ in to·the ⁼¬belly of·her

25 came·out then the ⁼son ⁼the ⁼¬firstborn ⁼¬fiery·red ⁼¬all ¬like ¬skin ¬bushy ¬named then °the ⁼name of·him °¬Esau

26 and with °this came·out the ⁼brother of·him and the ⁼hand of·him having·self-¬caught of·the ⁼¬heel of·¬Esau and called °the ⁼name of·him °Ya‘aqob Yitzchaq then was of·years⁺ sixty when ¬gave·birth·to °them ¬Rebekah

27 they·were·¬grown then the⁺ ⁼youths⁺ and was ¬Esau ⁼human ⁼having·¬seen to·¬hunt·with·hounds ¬rugged ⁼Ya‘aqob then was human ⁼¬simple ⁼¬dwelling °house

28 loved then Yitzchaq °the ⁼¬Esau ¬that the ⁼¬trap of·him ¬eating to·him ¬Rebekah then loved °the ⁼Ya‘aqob

29 ¬baked then Ya‘aqob °¬stew came then ¬Esau out of·the ⁼¬plain ¬failing

30 and told ¬Esau to·the ⁼Ya‘aqob ꜝ¬taste °me off of·the ⁼¬stew of·the ⁼¬fiery·red ⁼this ¬that I·¬fail through °this was·called the ⁼name of·him Edōm

31 told then Ya‘aqob to·the ⁼¬Esau ꜝ¬pay·yourself to·me today °the⁺ ⁼¬birthrights⁺ of·you to·me*

32 told then ¬Esau ¬¡see! I* I·¬travel·myself to·¬decease and so·that what to·me these⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬birthrights⁺

33 and told to·him Ya‘aqob ꜝ¬swear to·me today and ¬sweared to·him ¬payed·himself then ¬Esau °the⁺ ⁼¬birthrights⁺ to·the ⁼Ya‘aqob

34 Ya‘aqob then gave to·the ⁼¬Esau °bread and °¬stew of·¬flask and ¬ate and drank and ¬arising ¬was·undone·himself and ¬treated·as·worthless ¬Esau °the⁺ ⁼¬birthrights⁺

26 was·generated·himself then ¬famine upon of·the ⁼earth ¬without of·the ⁼¬famine ⁼the·one ¬previously which was·generated·himself in to·the ⁼¬time ⁼the·one of·Abraham was·¬travelled then Yitzchaq unto Abimelech ⁼king Fulistiim to Gerara

2 was·¬seen then to·him lord and told ńot you·should·¬come to °Egypt ꜝ¬dwell then in to·the ⁼earth ⁼which iᵮ to·you I·should·tell

3 and ꜝ¬be·a·stranger in to·the ⁼earth ⁼this and I·will·be·myself with of·you and I·will·¬praise °you to·you for and to·the ⁼seed of·you I·will·give °all ⁼the ⁼earth ⁼this and I·will·stand °the ⁼¬oath of·me °which I·¬sweared to·Abraham ⁼the ⁼father of·you

4 and I·will·¬multiply °the ⁼seed of·you as °the⁺ ⁼stars⁺ of·the ⁼heaven and I·will·give to·the ⁼seed of·you °all ⁼the ⁼earth ⁼this and they·will·be·¬been·blessed in to·the ⁼seed of·you all the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ of·the ⁼earth

5 anti of·which⁺ ¬obeyed Abraham ⁼the ⁼father of·you of·the·one myˊ of·voice and ¬kept °the⁺ ⁼¬orders⁺ of·me and °the⁺ ⁼¬commandments⁺ of·me and °the⁺ ⁼¬righteous·acts⁺ of·me and °the⁺ ⁼law⁺ of·me

6 and ¬dwelled Yitzchaq in Gerarois

7 they·¬questioned then the⁺ ⁼men⁺ of·the ⁼¬place about of·¬Rebekah ⁼the ⁼woman of·him and told sister of·me is was·¬feared for to·tell ¬that woman of·me is ¬lest they·should·kill·off °him the⁺ ⁼men⁺ of·the ⁼¬place about of·¬Rebekah ¬that ¬Beautiful to·the ⁼¬face was

8 was·generated·himself then ¬long-lived there ¬stooping then Abimelech ⁼the ⁼king Gerarōn through of·the ⁼¬window ¬saw °the ⁼Yitzchaq ⁼¬playing with of·¬Rebekah ⁼the ⁼woman of·him

9 called then Abimelech °the ⁼Yitzchaq and told to·him ¬therefore ¬indeed woman of·you is °what ¬that you·told sister of·me is told then to·him Yitzchaq I·told for ¬lest I·should·die·off through °her

10 told then to·him Abimelech °what ⁼this you·did to·us of·¬small was·¬slept whatever of·the ⁼¬gens of·me with of·the ⁼woman of·you and you·¬brought·upon upon °us °¬ignorance

11 ¬directed then Abimelech to·all ⁼the ⁼people of·him saying ⁼all ⁼the ⁼self-touching of·the ⁼human ⁼this or of·the ⁼woman of·him ⁼death ¬liable·for will·be·himself

12 seeded then Yitzchaq in to·the ⁼earth ⁼that and found in to·the ⁼¬year ⁼that °¬bearing·a·hundred ⁼¬barley ¬praised then °him lord

13 and was·¬lifted·up the ⁼human and ¬advancing ⁼¬greater was·generated·himself ¬until ¬whither great was·generated·himself ¬very

14 was·generated·himself then to·him ¬animals⁺ of·sheep⁺ and ¬animals⁺ of·¬oxes⁺ and ¬farm·fields⁺ ⁼many⁺ they·were·zealous then °him the⁺ Fulistiim

15 and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬wells⁺ ⁼which⁺ they·¬dug the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·the ⁼father of·him in to·the ⁼¬time of·the ⁼father of·him they·¬obstructed °them the⁺ Fulistiim and they·¬filled °them of·earth

16 told then Abimelech unto °Yitzchaq ꜝcome·off off of·us ¬that able of·us you·were·generated·yourself ¬very

17 and came·off ¬from·there Yitzchaq and ¬destroyed in to·the ⁼¬valley Gerarōn and ¬dwelled there

18 and ¬again Yitzchaq ¬dug °the⁺ ⁼¬wells⁺ of·the ⁼water °which⁺ they·¬dug the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·Abraham ⁼the ⁼father of·him and they·¬obstructed °them the⁺ Fulistiim with °the·one to·die·off °Abraham ⁼the ⁼father of·him and ¬named to·them °names⁺ ¬according·to °the⁺ ⁼names⁺ ⁼which⁺ ¬named Abraham ⁼the ⁼father of·him

19 and they·¬dug the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·Yitzchaq in to·the ⁼¬valley Gerarōn and they·found there °¬well of·water ⁼living

20 and they·¬quarrelled·themselves the⁺ ⁼¬flocksmans⁺ Gerarōn with of·the⁺ ⁼¬flocksmans⁺ of·Yitzchaq ¬claiming of·them to·be °the ⁼water and called °the ⁼name of·the ⁼¬well ¬unrighteousness they·¬harmed for °him

21 ¬taking·away then Yitzchaq ¬from·there ¬dug °¬well ⁼óther they·judged·themselves then and about of·that and ¬named °the ⁼name of·him ¬hatred

22 ¬taking·away then ¬from·there ¬dug °¬well ⁼óther and not they·¬quarrelled·themselves about of·him and ¬named °the ⁼name of·him ¬expanse saying ¬because now ¬widened lord to·us and ¬grew °us upon of·the ⁼earth

23 ¬ascended then ¬from·there upon °the ⁼¬well of·the ⁼¬oath

24 and was·¬seen to·him lord in to·the ⁼night ⁼that and told I* I·am the ⁼God of·Abraham ⁼the ⁼father of·you ńot ꜝ¬fear·yourself with of·you for I·am and I·have·¬praised °you and I·will·¬multiply °the ⁼seed of·you through °Abraham ⁼the ⁼father of·you

25 and ¬built there °¬altar and ¬called·himself °the ⁼name of·lord and ¬set·up there °the ⁼¬tent of·him they·¬dug then there the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·Yitzchaq °¬well

26 and Abimelech was·¬travelled unto °him off Gerarōn and Ochozath ⁼the ⁼¬groomsman of·him and Fikol ⁼the ⁼¬commander-in-chief of·the ⁼ability of·him

27 and told to·them Yitzchaq so·that °what you⁺·came unto °me you⁺ then you⁺·¬hated °me and you⁺·missioned·off °me off of·you⁺

28 and they·told ¬seeing we·have·¬seen ¬that was lord with of·you and we·told ꜝlet·them·be·generated·himself ¬curse ¬each °¬midst of·us and ¬each °¬midst of·you and we·will·¬make·a·covenant·ourselves with of·you °¬covenant

29 ńot to·be·going·to·do with of·us °evil ¬as we °you not we·¬abhorred·ourselves and °which ⁼¬way we·¬lended·ourselves to·you beautifully and we·¬sended·out °you with of·peace and now you ¬praiseworthy ¬by of·lord

30 and did to·them °¬banquet and they·¬ate and they·drank

31 and ¬arising °the·one ¬early they·¬sweared human to·the ⁼¬neighbor of·him and ¬sended·out °them Yitzchaq and they·¬moved·themselves off of·him with of·¬salvation

32 was·generated·himself then in to·the ⁼day ⁼that and self-¬coming ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·Yitzchaq they·¬announced to·him about of·the ⁼¬well ¬whither they·¬dug and they·told not we·found °water

33 and called °it ¬oath through °this ⁼name to·the ⁼city ¬well of·¬oath ¬until of·the·one today of·day

34 was then ¬Esau of·years⁺ forty and took °woman Ioudin ⁼the ⁼daughter of·¬Beor ⁼the Chettaiou and °the Basemmath ⁼daughter of·year ⁼the Euaiou

35 and they·were ¬quarrelling to·the ⁼Yitzchaq and to·the ⁼¬Rebekah

27 was·generated·himself then with °the·one to·¬grow·old °Yitzchaq and they·were·¬blunted the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ of·him of·the·one to·¬see and called °¬Esau ⁼the ⁼son of·him °the ⁼¬elder and told to·him son of·me and told ¬¡see! I*

2 and told ¬¡see! I·have·¬grown·old and not I·know °the ⁼day of·the ⁼¬death of·me

3 now therefore ꜝtake °the ⁼¬vessel of·you °the·one also °¬quiver and °the ⁼¬bow and ꜝcome·out to °the ⁼¬plain and ꜝ¬hunt to·me °¬trap

4 and ꜝdo to·me °¬foods⁺ as I·¬befriend I* and ꜝ¬bear to·me so·that I·should·¬eat ¬that should·¬praise °you the ⁼soul of·me ¬before to·die·off °me

5 ¬Rebekah then heard of·speaking ⁼Yitzchaq unto °¬Esau ⁼the ⁼son of·him was·¬travelled then ¬Esau to °the ⁼¬plain to·¬hunt °¬trap to·the ⁼father of·him

6 ¬Rebekah then told unto °Ya‘aqob ⁼the ⁼son of·her °the ⁼¬lesser ꜝ¬see I* I·heard of·the ⁼father of·you of·speaking unto °¬Esau ⁼the ⁼brother of·you of·saying

7 ꜝ¬bear to·me °¬trap and ꜝdo to·me °¬foods⁺ and ¬eating I·will·¬praise °you ¬in·front·of of·lord ¬before of·the·one to·die·off °me

8 now therefore son ꜝhear of·me ¬as I* to·you I·¬order·myself

9 and ¬travelled to °the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ ꜝtake to·me ¬from·there two °¬goats⁺ ⁼¬tender⁺ and °beautiful⁺ and I·will·do °them °¬foods⁺ to·the ⁼father of·you as ¬befriends

10 and you·will·¬bring·in to·the ⁼father of·you and will·¬eat·himself ¬that should·¬praise °you the ⁼father of·you ¬before of·the·one to·die·off °him

11 told then Ya‘aqob unto °¬Rebekah ⁼the ⁼mother of·him is ¬Esau ⁼the ⁼brother of·me man ⁼¬bushy I* then man ⁼¬smooth

12 ¬lest should·¬touch °me the ⁼father of·me and I·will·be·myself ¬in·front·of of·him as ¬despising and I·will·¬bring·upon upon °myself °¬curse and not °¬praise

13 told then to·him the ⁼mother upon °me* the ⁼¬curse of·you ¬child ¬only ꜝ¬obey of·the ⁼voice of·me and ¬travelled ꜝ¬bear to·me

14 ¬travelled then took and ¬bore to·the ⁼mother and did the ⁼mother of·him °¬foods⁺ ¬as ¬befriended the ⁼father of·him

15 and taking ⁼¬Rebekah °the ⁼robe of·¬Esau ⁼the ⁼son of·her of·the ⁼¬elder °the ⁼beautiful which was ¬from to·her in to·the ⁼house ¬put·on Ya‘aqob °the ⁼son of·her °the ⁼young

16 and °the⁺ ⁼leathers⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬goats⁺ ¬put·on upon °the⁺ ⁼arms⁺ of·him and upon °the⁺ ⁼naked⁺ of·the ⁼neck of·him

17 and gave °the⁺ ⁼¬foods⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼breads⁺ ⁼which⁺ did to °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·Ya‘aqob ⁼the ⁼son of·her

20 told then Yitzchaq to·the ⁼son of·him what °this ⁼which ⁼¬quick you·found ¬oh! ¬child the·one then told °which ¬delivered lord ⁼the ⁼God of·you ¬in·front·of of·me

21 told then Yitzchaq to·the ⁼Ya‘aqob ꜝ¬come·near to·me and I·should·¬touch °you ¬child if you you·are the ⁼son of·me ¬Esau or not

22 ¬came·near then Ya‘aqob unto °Yitzchaq ⁼the ⁼father of·him and ¬touched °him and told the·one ¬on·the·other·hand voice ⁼voice of·Ya‘aqob then the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·¬Esau

23 and not ¬came·to·know °him they·were for the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·him as the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·¬Esau ⁼the ⁼brother of·him ¬bushy⁺ and ¬praised °him

24 and told you you·are the ⁼son of·me ¬Esau ⁼the·one then told I*

26 and told to·him Yitzchaq ⁼the ⁼father of·him ꜝ¬come·near to·me and ꜝ¬befriend °me ¬child

27 and ¬coming·near ¬befriended °him and was·¬savored °the ⁼¬aroma of·the⁺ ⁼cloaks⁺ of·him and ¬praised °him and told ¬¡see! ¬aroma of·the ⁼son of·me as ¬aroma of·field ⁼¬full °which ¬praised lord

28 and may·give to·you the ⁼God off of·the ⁼¬dew of·the ⁼heaven and off of·the ⁼¬richness ⁼the ⁼earth and °¬multitude of·¬grain and of·wine

29 and ꜝlet·serve⁺ to·you nations⁺ and they·will·¬worship to·you ¬rulers⁺ and ꜝbe·generated·yourself lord of·the ⁼brother of·you and they·will·¬worship to·you the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·the ⁼father of·you the ⁼self-¬cursing °you ¬cursed then ⁼the ⁼¬praising °you having·been·¬praised

32 and told to·him Yitzchaq ⁼the ⁼father of·him what you·are you the·one then told I* I·am the ⁼son of·you the ⁼¬firstborn ⁼¬Esau

33 ¬amazed then Yitzchaq °¬amazement ⁼great ¬very and told what therefore the ⁼¬hunting to·me °¬trap and ¬bringing·in to·me and I·¬ate off of·all⁺ ¬before of·the·one °you to·come and I·¬praised °him and having·been·¬praised ꜝlet·them·be

34 was·generated·himself then ¬when heard ¬Esau °the⁺ ⁼¬declarations⁺ of·Yitzchaq ⁼the ⁼father of·him ¬cried·out °voice ⁼great and °¬bitter ¬very and told ꜝ¬praise ¬so and °me* father

35 told then to·him coming ⁼the ⁼brother of·you with of·¬deceit took °the ⁼¬praise of·you

36 and told ¬rightly was·called the ⁼name of·him Ya‘aqob has·¬stomped for °me ¬already °second ⁼this °the·ones⁺ also °¬birthrights⁺ of·me has·taken and now has·taken °the ⁼¬praise of·me and told ¬Esau to·the ⁼father of·him not you·¬left·yourself to·me °¬praise father

37 ¬answered then Yitzchaq told to·the ⁼¬Esau if °lord °him I·did of·you and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·him I·did of·him °¬slaves⁺ to·¬grain and to·wine I·¬established °him to·you then °what I·should·do ¬child

38 told then ¬Esau unto °the ⁼father of·him ńot ¬praise ⁼one to·you is father ꜝ¬praise ¬so and °me* father of·¬pierced then of·Yitzchaq ¬cried·out °voice ¬Esau and ¬wept

39 ¬answered then Yitzchaq ⁼the ⁼father of·him told to·him ¬¡see! off of·the ⁼¬richness ⁼the ⁼earth will·be·himself the ⁼¬dwelling of·you and off of·the ⁼¬dew of·the ⁼heaven ¬from·above

40 and upon to·the ⁼¬sword of·you you·will·live·yourself and to·the ⁼brother of·you you·will·serve will·be·himself then ¬when ifᵮ you·should·¬take·down and you·will·¬faint °the ⁼¬yoke of·him off of·the ⁼neck of·you

41 and ¬was·angry ¬Esau to·the ⁼Ya‘aqob about of·the ⁼¬praise ⁼which ¬praised °him the ⁼father of·him told then ¬Esau in to·the ⁼¬mind ꜝlet·¬come·near⁺ the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·the ⁼¬grief of·the ⁼father of·me so·that I·should·kill·off °Ya‘aqob ⁼the ⁼brother of·me

42 was·¬announced then to·¬Rebekah the⁺ ⁼¬declarations⁺ of·¬Esau ⁼the ⁼son of·her of·the ⁼¬elder and sending called °Ya‘aqob ⁼the ⁼son of·her °the ⁼young and told to·him ¬¡see! ¬Esau ⁼the ⁼brother of·you ¬threatens to·you of·the·one to·kill·off °you

43 now therefore ¬child ꜝhear of·me of·the ⁼voice and ¬arising ꜝ¬run·away to °the ⁼¬Mesopotamia unto Laban ⁼the ⁼brother of·me to °¬Haran

44 and ꜝ¬dwell with of·him °days⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ ¬until of·the·one to·¬turn·away °the ⁼¬wrath

45 and °the ⁼¬wrath of·the ⁼brother of·you off of·you and should·¬forget·himself °which⁺ you·have·done to·him and missioning·off I·will·¬summon·myself °you ¬from·there ¬lest ¬??? off of·the·ones⁺ two of·you⁺ in to·day ⁼one

46 told then ¬Rebekah unto °Yitzchaq I·have·¬been·angry to·the ⁼life of·me through °the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ Chet if will·take·himself Ya‘aqob °woman off of·the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·the ⁼earth ⁼this so·that °what to·me to·live

28 self-¬calling·to then Yitzchaq °the ⁼Ya‘aqob ¬praised °him and ¬ordered·himself to·him saying not you·will·take·yourself °woman out of·the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·¬Canaan

2 ¬arising ꜝ¬run·away to °the ⁼¬Mesopotamia to °the ⁼house Bathouēl of·the ⁼father of·the ⁼mother of·you and ꜝtake to·yourself ¬from·there °woman out of·the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ Laban ⁼the ⁼brother of·the ⁼mother of·you

3 then the ⁼God of·me may·¬praise °you and may·¬grow °you and may·¬multiply °you and you·will·be·yourself to °¬synagogues⁺ of·nations⁺

4 and may·give to·you °the ⁼¬praise of·Abraham ⁼the ⁼father of·me to·you and to·the ⁼seed of·you with °you to·¬inherit °the ⁼earth of·the ⁼¬sojourning of·you °which gave the ⁼God to·the ⁼Abraham

5 and missioned·off Yitzchaq °the ⁼Ya‘aqob and was·¬travelled to °the ⁼¬Mesopotamia unto Laban ⁼the ⁼son Bathouēl ⁼the ⁼¬Syrian °brother then of·¬Rebekah ⁼the ⁼mother of·Ya‘aqob and of·¬Esau

6 ¬saw then ¬Esau ¬that ¬praised Yitzchaq °the ⁼Ya‘aqob and ¬??? to °the ⁼¬Mesopotamia of·¬Syria to·take to·himself ¬from·there °woman in to·the·one to·¬praise °him and ¬ordered·himself to·him saying not you·will·take·yourself °woman off of·the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·¬Canaan

7 and heard Ya‘aqob of·the ⁼father and of·the ⁼mother of·him and was·¬travelled to °the ⁼¬Mesopotamia of·¬Syria

8 and ¬saw ¬Esau ¬that ¬evil⁺ they·are the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·¬Canaan ¬in·front·of of·Yitzchaq ⁼the ⁼father of·him

9 and was·¬travelled ¬Esau unto Ismaēl and took °the Maeleth ⁼daughter Ismaēl ⁼the ⁼son ⁼Abraham °sister Nabaiōth unto to·the⁺ ⁼women⁺ of·him °woman

10 and came·out Ya‘aqob off of·the ⁼¬well of·the ⁼¬oath and was·¬travelled to of·¬Haran

11 and ¬met to·¬place and was·¬slept there ¬set for the ⁼sun and took off of·the⁺ ⁼stones⁺ of·the ⁼¬place and ¬placed unto of·head of·him and was·¬slept in to·the ⁼¬place ⁼that

12 and was·¬dreamed and ¬¡see! ¬stairway ⁼having·self-¬established in to·the ⁼earth of·which the ⁼head ¬reached·himself to °the ⁼heaven and the⁺ ⁼¬announcers⁺ of·the ⁼God they·¬ascended and they·¬came upon of·her

13 then the ⁼lord had·been·¬strengthened upon of·her and told I* lord ⁼the ⁼God of·Abraham ⁼the ⁼father of·you and the ⁼God of·Yitzchaq ńot ꜝ¬fear·yourself the ⁼earth upon of·which you you·¬sleep upon of·her to·you I·will·give °her and to·the ⁼seed of·you

14 and will·be·himself the ⁼seed of·you as the ⁼¬sand of·the ⁼earth and will·be·¬widened upon °sea and upon °¬southwest and upon °¬north and upon °¬easts⁺ and they·will·be·¬been·blessed in to·you all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬tribes⁺ of·the ⁼earth and in to·the ⁼seed of·you

15 and ¬¡see! I* with of·you ¬protecting °you in to·the ⁼¬road ⁼all ¬whither ifᵮ you·should·be·¬travelled and I·will·¬turn·away °you to °the ⁼earth ⁼this ¬that not ńot °you I·should·¬leave·behind ¬until of·the·one to·do °me °all⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ I·spoke to·you

16 and was·¬raised Ya‘aqob off of·the ⁼¬sleep of·him and told ¬that is lord in to·the ⁼¬place ⁼this I* then not had·¬seen

17 and was·¬feared and told as ¬fearful ⁼the ⁼¬place ⁼this not is this but or house of·God and this ⁼the ⁼gate of·the ⁼heaven

18 and ¬arose Ya‘aqob °the·one ¬early and took °the ⁼stone ⁼which ¬layed there unto of·head of·him and stood °him °¬monument and ¬poured·on °¬olive·oil upon °the ⁼¬end of·her

19 and called Ya‘aqob °the ⁼name of·the ⁼¬place ⁼that house of·God and ¬??? was °name to·the ⁼city °the ⁼¬before

20 and ¬prayed·himself Ya‘aqob °¬vow saying ifᵮ should·be lord ⁼the ⁼God with myˊ and should·¬protect °me in to·the ⁼¬road ⁼this ⁼which I* I·¬travel·myself and should·give to·me °bread to·¬eat and °cloak to·self-¬clothe

21 and should·¬turn·away °me with of·¬salvation to °the ⁼house of·the ⁼father of·me and will·be·himself to·me lord to °God

22 and the ⁼stone ⁼this °which I·stood °¬monument will·be·himself to·me house of·God and of·all⁺ ⁼which⁺ ifᵮ to·me you·should·give °¬tenth I·will·¬tithe °them to·you

29 and ¬expelling ⁼Ya‘aqob °the⁺ ⁼feet⁺ was·¬travelled to °earth of·¬easts⁺ unto Laban ⁼the ⁼son Bathouēl ⁼the ⁼¬Syrian °brother then of·¬Rebekah ⁼mother of·Ya‘aqob and of·¬Esau

2 and ¬sees and ¬¡see! ¬well in to·the ⁼¬plain they·were then there three⁺ ⁼¬flocks⁺ of·sheep⁺ self-¬giving·rest upon of·him out for of·the ⁼¬well of·that they·¬watered °the⁺ ⁼¬flocks⁺ stone then was great upon to·the ⁼mouth of·the ⁼¬well

3 and they·¬assembled·themselves there all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬flocks⁺ and they·¬rolled·away °the ⁼stone off of·the ⁼mouth ⁼the ⁼¬well and they·¬watered °the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ and they·¬restored °the ⁼stone upon °the ⁼mouth of·the ⁼¬well to °the ⁼¬place of·him

4 told then to·them Ya‘aqob brothers⁺ ¬whence you⁺·are you⁺ the·ones⁺ then they·told out of·¬Haran we·are

5 told then to·them you⁺·know Laban ⁼the ⁼son of·¬Nahor the·ones⁺ then they·told we·know

6 told then to·them ¬is·healthy the·ones⁺ then they·told ¬is·healthy and ¬¡see! ¬Rachel ⁼the ⁼daughter of·him came·himself with of·the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺

7 and told Ya‘aqob ¬still is day ⁼much ¬not·yet hour to·be·¬assembled °the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ ¬watering °the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ coming·off you⁺·¬feed

8 the·ones⁺ then they·told not we·will·be·able·ourselves ¬until of·the·one to·be·¬assembled °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬flocksmans⁺ and they·should·¬roll·away °the ⁼stone off of·the ⁼mouth ⁼the ⁼¬well and we·will·¬water °the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺

9 ¬still of·him ⁼speaking to·them and ¬Rachel ⁼the ⁼daughter Laban came·himself with of·the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ of·the ⁼father of·her she for ¬feeded °the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ of·the ⁼father of·her

10 was·generated·himself then as ¬saw Ya‘aqob °the ⁼¬Rachel ⁼daughter Laban ⁼brother of·the ⁼mother of·him and °the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ Laban ⁼brother of·the ⁼mother of·him and coming·unto ⁼Ya‘aqob ¬rolled·away °the ⁼stone off of·the ⁼mouth ⁼the ⁼¬well and ¬watered °the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ Laban ⁼the ⁼brother of·the ⁼mother of·him

11 and ¬befriended Ya‘aqob °the ⁼¬Rachel and ¬crying·out to·the ⁼voice of·him ¬wept

12 and ¬announced to·the ⁼¬Rachel ¬that brother of·the ⁼father of·her is and ¬that son of·¬Rebekah is and ¬running ¬announced to·the ⁼father of·her ¬according·to °the⁺ ⁼¬declarations⁺ ⁼these⁺

13 was·generated·himself then as heard Laban °the ⁼name of·Ya‘aqob ⁼the ⁼son of·the ⁼sister of·him ¬ran to °¬meeting to·him and ¬embracing °him ¬befriended and ¬brought·in °him to °the ⁼house of·him and ¬related·fully·himself to·the Laban °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ ⁼these⁺

14 and told to·him Laban out of·the⁺ ⁼bones⁺ of·me and out of·the ⁼flesh of·me you·are you and was with of·him °month of·days⁺

15 told then Laban to·the ⁼Ya‘aqob ¬that for brother of·me you·are not you·will·serve to·me ¬freely ꜝ¬announce to·me what ⁼the ⁼¬wage of·you is

16 then to·the Laban two daughters⁺ name to·the ⁼great Leia and °name to·the ⁼young ¬Rachel

17 then the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ Leias ¬weak⁺ ¬Rachel then beautiful to·the ⁼¬appearance and ¬Beautiful to·the ⁼¬face

18 loved then Ya‘aqob °the ⁼¬Rachel and told I·will·serve to·you seven °years⁺ about of·¬Rachel ⁼the ⁼daughter of·you of·the ⁼young

19 told then to·him Laban ¬better to·give °me °her to·you or to·give °me °her to·man ⁼óther ꜝ¬dwell with myˊ

20 and served Ya‘aqob about of·¬Rachel °years⁺ seven and they·were ¬in·front·of of·him as days⁺ ⁼¬little⁺ ¬from °the·one to·love °him °her

21 told then Ya‘aqob unto Laban ꜝ¬pay °the ⁼woman of·me they·have·¬fulfilled·themselves for the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·me ¬that I·should·come·to unto °her

22 ¬assembled then Laban °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼men⁺ of·the ⁼¬place and did °marriage

23 and was·generated·himself ¬evening and taking Laban Leian ⁼the ⁼daughter of·him ¬brought·in °her unto °Ya‘aqob and came·to unto °her Ya‘aqob

24 gave then Laban Leia ⁼the ⁼daughter of·him Zelfan ⁼the ⁼¬maidservant of·him to·her °¬maidservant

25 was·generated·himself then ¬early and ¬¡see! was Leia told then Ya‘aqob to·the Laban °what ⁼this you·did to·me not about of·¬Rachel I·served ¬from to·you and so·that °what you·¬deceived·yourself °me

26 told then Laban not is thus in to·the ⁼¬place of·us to·give °the ⁼young ¬before or °the ⁼¬elder

27 ꜝ¬complete therefore °the⁺ ⁼seventh⁺ of·this and I·will·give to·you and °this anti of·the ⁼¬work ⁼which you·will·work·yourself ¬from to·me* ¬still seven °years⁺ ⁼óther⁺

28 did then Ya‘aqob thus and ¬fulfilled °the⁺ ⁼seventh⁺ of·this and gave to·him Laban °¬Rachel ⁼the ⁼daughter of·him to·him °woman

29 gave then Laban to·¬Rachel ⁼the ⁼daughter of·him Ballan ⁼the ⁼¬maidservant of·him to·her °¬maidservant

30 and came·to unto °¬Rachel loved then °¬Rachel ¬more or Leian and served to·him seven °years⁺ ⁼óther⁺

31 ¬seeing then lord ¬that ¬hates·himself Leia ¬opened °the ⁼motherhood of·her ¬Rachel then was ¬barren

32 and ¬seized Leia and ¬gave·birth·to °son to·the ⁼Ya‘aqob called then °the ⁼name of·him °¬Reuben saying ¬because ¬saw of·me lord °the ⁼¬lowliness now °me will·love the ⁼man of·me

33 and ¬seized ¬again Leia and ¬gave·birth·to °son ⁼second to·the ⁼Ya‘aqob and told ¬that heard lord ¬that I·¬hate·myself and ¬gave·in·addition to·me and °this called then °the ⁼name of·him °¬Simeon

34 and ¬seized ¬still and ¬gave·birth·to °son and told in to·the·one now to·¬time unto myˊ will·be·himself the ⁼man of·me I·¬gave·birth·to for to·him °three⁺ ⁼sons⁺ through °this called °the ⁼name of·him °¬Levi

35 and ¬seizing ¬still ¬gave·birth·to °son and told now ¬still °this I·will·¬agree·myself to·lord through °this called °the ⁼name of·him °Yudah and stood of·the·one to·¬give·birth·to

30 ¬seeing then ¬Rachel ¬that not has·¬given·birth·to to·the ⁼Ya‘aqob and was·zealous ¬Rachel °the ⁼sister of·her and told to·the ⁼Ya‘aqob ꜝgive to·me °¬children⁺ if then ńot I·will·¬decease I*

2 was·¬angered then Ya‘aqob to·the ⁼¬Rachel and told to·her ńot anti of·God I* I·am which ¬strengthened °you °fruit of·¬belly

3 told then ¬Rachel to·the ⁼Ya‘aqob ¬¡see! the ⁼¬maidservant of·me Balla ꜝcome·to unto °her and will·¬give·birth·to·himself upon of·the⁺ ⁼knees⁺ of·me and I·will·¬produce·children·myself and I* out of·her

4 and gave to·him Ballan ⁼the ⁼¬maidservant of·her to·him °woman came·to then unto °her Ya‘aqob

5 and ¬seized Balla ⁼the ⁼¬maidservant of·¬Rachel and ¬gave·birth·to to·the ⁼Ya‘aqob °son

6 and told ¬Rachel judged to·me the ⁼God and ¬listened·to of·the ⁼voice of·me and gave to·me °son through °this called °the ⁼name of·him Dan

7 and ¬seized ¬still Balla ⁼the ⁼¬maidservant of·¬Rachel and ¬gave·birth·to °son ⁼second to·the ⁼Ya‘aqob

8 and told ¬Rachel ¬seized·himself to·me the ⁼God and ¬??? to·the ⁼sister of·me and I·was·been·able and called °the ⁼name of·him °¬Naphtali

9 ¬saw then Leia ¬that stood of·the·one to·¬give·birth·to and took Zelfan ⁼the ⁼¬maidservant of·her and gave °her to·the ⁼Ya‘aqob °woman

10 came·to then unto °her Ya‘aqob and ¬seized Zelfa ⁼the ⁼¬maidservant Leias and ¬gave·birth·to to·the ⁼Ya‘aqob °son

11 and told Leia in to·¬good·luck and ¬named °the ⁼name of·him °¬Gad

12 and ¬seized Zelfa ⁼the ⁼¬maidservant Leias and ¬gave·birth·to ¬still to·the ⁼Ya‘aqob °son ⁼second

13 and told Leia ⁼blessed I* ¬that they·bless °me the⁺ ⁼women⁺ and called °the ⁼name of·him °¬Asher

14 was·¬travelled then ¬Reuben in to·days⁺ of·¬harvest of·¬wheats⁺ and found °¬cheekses⁺ of·¬mandrake in to·the ⁼field and ¬bore °them unto Leian ⁼the ⁼mother of·him told then ¬Rachel to·the Leia ꜝgive to·me of·the⁺ ⁼¬mandrakes⁺ of·the ⁼son of·you

15 told then Leia not ¬sufficient to·you ¬that you·took °the ⁼man of·me ńot and °the⁺ ⁼¬mandrakes⁺ of·the ⁼son of·me you·will·take·yourself told then ¬Rachel not thus ꜝlet·them·be·¬slept with of·you °the ⁼night ⁼this anti of·the⁺ ⁼¬mandrakes⁺ of·the ⁼son of·you

16 came·to then Ya‘aqob out of·field of·¬evening and came·out Leia to °¬meeting to·him and told unto °me you·will·come·to·yourself today I·have·¬hired·myself for °you anti of·the⁺ ⁼¬mandrakes⁺ of·the ⁼son of·me and was·¬slept with of·her °the ⁼night ⁼that

17 and ¬listened·to the ⁼God Leias and ¬seizing ¬gave·birth·to to·the ⁼Ya‘aqob °son ⁼fifth

18 and told Leia gave the ⁼God °the ⁼¬wage of·me anti of·which I·gave °the ⁼¬maidservant of·me to·the ⁼man of·me and called °the ⁼name of·him °¬Issachar which is ¬wage

19 and ¬seized ¬still Leia and ¬gave·birth·to °son ⁼sixth to·the ⁼Ya‘aqob

20 and told Leia has·¬given·himself to·me the ⁼God °¬gift ⁼beautiful in to·the·one now to·¬time will·¬choose °me the ⁼man of·me they·¬gave·birth·to for to·him °sons⁺ six and called °the ⁼name of·him °¬Zebulun

21 and with °this ¬gave·birth·to °daughter and called °the ⁼name of·her Dina

22 was·¬remembered then the ⁼God of·the ⁼¬Rachel and ¬listened·to of·her the ⁼God and ¬opened of·her °the ⁼motherhood

23 and ¬seizing ¬gave·birth·to to·the ⁼Ya‘aqob °son told then ¬Rachel ¬removed the ⁼God of·me °the ⁼¬disgrace

24 and called °the ⁼name of·him °Yosef saying ꜝlet·them·¬add the ⁼God to·me °son ⁼óther

25 was·generated·himself then as ¬gave·birth·to ¬Rachel °the ⁼Yosef told Ya‘aqob to·the Laban ꜝmission·off °me so·that I·should·come·off to °the ⁼¬place of·me and to °the ⁼earth of·me

26 ꜝ¬pay °the⁺ ⁼women⁺ of·me and °the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ about of·which⁺ I·have·served to·you so·that I·should·come·off you for you·know °the ⁼servitude ⁼which I·have·served to·you

27 told then to·him Laban if they·found °¬grace ¬in·front·of of·you I·¬foretelled·myself iᵮ ¬praised for °me the ⁼God to·the·one your to·¬entry
