29 told then to·him Ya‘aqob you you·know °which⁺ I·have·served to·you and whatever⁺ was ¬animals⁺ of·you with myˊ

30 ¬small⁺ for was whatever⁺ to·you was ¬in·front·of myˊ and was·¬grown to °¬multitude and ¬praised °you lord upon to·the ⁼foot of·me now therefore ¬when? I·should·do and I* to·myself °house

31 and told to·him Laban °what to·you I·will·give told then to·him Ya‘aqob not you·will·give to·me °no·one ifᵮ you·should·do to·me °the ⁼¬declaration ⁼this ¬again I·will·¬flocksman °the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ of·you and I·will·¬keep

32 ꜝlet·them·¬pass·by °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ of·you today and ꜝ¬be·separated ¬from·there °all ⁼sheep ⁼¬gray in to·the⁺ ⁼lambs⁺ and °all ⁼¬white-mixed and °¬speckled in to·the·ones⁺ to·¬goats⁺ will·be·himself to·me ¬wage

33 and will·¬listen·to·himself to·me the ⁼¬justice of·me in to·the ⁼day ⁼the·one ¬tomorrow ¬that is the ⁼¬wage of·me ¬before of·you all ⁼which ifᵮ ńot should·be ¬speckled and ¬white-mixed in to·the·ones⁺ to·¬goats⁺ and ¬gray in to·the⁺ ⁼lambs⁺ having·self-thieved will·be·himself ¬from to·me*

34 told then to·him Laban ꜝlet·them·be ¬according·to °the ⁼¬declaration of·you

35 and ¬gave·orders in to·the ⁼day ⁼that °the⁺ ⁼¬he-goats⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬speckled⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬white-mixed⁺ and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬goats⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬speckled⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬white-mixed⁺ and °all which was white in to·them and °all which was ¬gray in to·the⁺ ⁼lambs⁺ and gave through of·hand of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him

36 and ¬left °¬road of·three⁺ ⁼days⁺ ¬each °¬midst of·them and ¬each °¬midst of·Ya‘aqob Ya‘aqob then ¬flocksmaned °the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ Laban °the⁺ ⁼¬left

37 took then to·himself Ya‘aqob °¬rod ⁼¬of·a·green·poplar ⁼green and °¬of·walnut and of·¬plane·tree and ¬peeled °them Ya‘aqob °¬peels⁺ ⁼white⁺ ¬tearing·away °the ⁼green ¬shined·himself then upon to·the⁺ ⁼¬rods⁺ the ⁼white °which ¬peeled ¬various

38 and ¬set·before °the⁺ ⁼¬rods⁺ ⁼which⁺ ¬peeled in to·the⁺ ⁼¬winepresses⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬channels⁺ of·the ⁼water so·that as iᵮ they·should·come the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ to·drink ¬before of·the⁺ ⁼¬rods⁺ of·coming of·them to °the·one to·drink

39 ¬??? the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ to °the⁺ ⁼¬rods⁺ and they·¬gave·birth·to the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ °¬white-mixed⁺ and °¬various⁺ and °¬ashen⁺ ⁼¬speckled⁺

40 then °the⁺ ⁼¬lambs⁺ ¬gave·orders Ya‘aqob and stood ¬in·front·of of·the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ °¬ram ⁼¬white-mixed and °all ⁼¬various in to·the⁺ ⁼¬lambs⁺ and ¬was·separated to·himself °¬flocks⁺ ¬according·to °himself and not ¬mixed °them to °the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ Laban

41 was·generated·himself then in to·the ⁼¬time ⁼which ¬??? the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ in to·¬belly taking ¬placed Ya‘aqob °the⁺ ⁼¬rods⁺ ¬in·front·of of·the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼¬winepresses⁺ of·the·one to·¬stimulate °them ¬according·to °the⁺ ⁼¬rods⁺

42 ¬when then iᵮ they·¬gave·birth·to the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ not ¬placed was·generated·himself then the⁺ ⁼¬insignificant⁺ of·the Laban then the⁺ ⁼¬notable⁺ of·the ⁼Ya‘aqob

43 and was·enriched the ⁼human ¬very ¬very and was·generated·himself to·him ¬animals⁺ ⁼many⁺ and ¬oxes⁺ and ¬children⁺ and ¬maidservants⁺ and camels⁺ and donkeys⁺

31 heard then Ya‘aqob °the⁺ ⁼¬declarations⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ Laban of·saying has·taken Ya‘aqob °all⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ of·the ⁼father of·us and out of·the·ones⁺ of·the ⁼father of·us has·done °all ⁼the ⁼¬glory ⁼this

2 and ¬saw Ya‘aqob °the ⁼¬face of·the Laban and ¬¡see! not was unto °him as ¬yesterday and °third ⁼day

3 told then lord unto °Ya‘aqob ꜝ¬turn·away·yourself to °the ⁼earth of·the ⁼father of·you and to °the ⁼generation of·you and I·will·be·myself with of·you

4 missioning·off then Ya‘aqob called °¬Rachel and Leian to °the ⁼¬plain ¬whither the⁺ ⁼¬flocks⁺

5 and told to·them I·¬see I* °the ⁼¬face of·the ⁼father of·you⁺ ¬that not is unto myˊ as ¬yesterday and °third ⁼day then the ⁼God of·the ⁼father of·me was with myˊ

6 and they then you⁺·have·¬seen ¬that in to·all ⁼the ⁼¬strength of·me I·have·served to·the ⁼father of·you⁺

7 then the ⁼father of·you⁺ ¬cheated·himself °me and ¬changed °the ⁼¬wage of·me of·the·ones⁺ ten of·¬lambs⁺ and not gave to·him the ⁼God to·do·evil °me

8 ifᵮ thus should·tell the⁺ ⁼¬various⁺ will·be·himself of·you ¬wage and will·¬give·birth·to·himself all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ ⁼¬various⁺ ifᵮ then should·tell the⁺ ⁼white⁺ will·be·himself of·you ¬wage and will·¬give·birth·to·himself all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ ⁼white⁺

9 and ¬removed·himself the ⁼God °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ of·the ⁼father of·you⁺ and gave to·me °them

10 and was·generated·himself ¬when they·¬stimulated the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ and they·¬saw to·the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ °them in to·the ⁼¬sleep and ¬¡see! the⁺ ⁼¬he-goats⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬rams⁺ ⁼¬ascending they·were upon °the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬goats⁺ ¬white-mixed⁺ and ¬various⁺ and ¬ashen⁺ ⁼¬speckled⁺

11 and told to·me the ⁼¬announcer of·the ⁼God ¬according·to °¬sleep Ya‘aqob I* then I·told what is

12 and told ꜝ¬look·up to·the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ of·you and ꜝ¬see °the⁺ ⁼¬he-goats⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬rams⁺ ⁼¬ascending upon °the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬goats⁺ °¬white-mixed⁺ and °¬various⁺ and °¬ashen⁺ ⁼¬speckled⁺ I·have·¬seen for °whatever⁺ to·you Laban does

13 I* I·am the ⁼God ⁼the ⁼¬beheld to·you in to·¬place of·God ¬whither you·¬anointed to·me there °¬monument and you·¬prayed·yourself to·me there °¬vow now therefore ꜝ¬arise and ꜝcome·out out of·the ⁼earth ⁼this and ꜝcome·off to °the ⁼earth of·the ⁼genesis of·you and I·will·be·myself with of·you

14 and ¬answered ⁼¬Rachel and Leia they·told to·him ńot is to·us ¬still ¬part or ¬inheritance in to·the ⁼house of·the ⁼father of·us

15 not as the⁺ ⁼¬another's⁺ we·have·been·¬counted to·him has·¬sold for °us and ¬devoured to·¬thing·devoured °the ⁼silver of·us

16 °all ⁼the ⁼riches and °the ⁼¬glory ⁼which ¬removed·himself the ⁼God of·the ⁼father of·us to·us will·be·himself and to·the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·us now therefore °whatever⁺ has·¬said to·you the ⁼God ꜝdo

17 ¬arising then Ya‘aqob took °the⁺ ⁼women⁺ of·him and °the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·him upon °the⁺ ⁼camels⁺

18 and ¬led·away °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬possessioning of·him and °all ⁼the ⁼¬accoutrements of·him °which ¬gained·himself in to·the ⁼¬Mesopotamia and °all⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ of·him to·come·off unto °Yitzchaq ⁼the ⁼father of·him to °earth ¬Canaan

19 Laban then ¬was·undone·himself to·¬shear °the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ of·him thieved then ¬Rachel °the⁺ ⁼idols⁺ of·the ⁼father of·her

20 ¬hid then Ya‘aqob Laban ⁼the ⁼¬Syrian of·the·one ńot to·¬announce to·him ¬that ¬runs·away

21 and ¬ran·away he and °all⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ of·him and ¬crossed °the ⁼¬river and ¬stampeded to °the ⁼mountain Galaad

22 was·¬announced then Laban ⁼the ⁼¬Syrian to·the ⁼third ⁼day ¬that ¬ran·away Ya‘aqob

23 and ¬taking °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·him with of·himself ¬pursued ¬after of·him °¬road of·days⁺ seven and ¬grasped °him in to·the ⁼mountain ⁼the Galaad

24 came then the ⁼God unto Laban ⁼the ⁼¬Syrian ¬according·to °¬sleep °the ⁼night and told to·him ꜝ¬keep·yourself °yourself ¬lest you·should·speak with of·Ya‘aqob °¬evil⁺

25 and ¬grasped Laban °the ⁼Ya‘aqob Ya‘aqob then ¬set·up °the ⁼¬tent of·him in to·the ⁼mountain Laban then stood °the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·him in to·the ⁼mountain Galaad

26 told then Laban to·the ⁼Ya‘aqob °what you·did so·that °what ¬in·secret you·¬ran·away and you·¬ransacked °me and you·¬led·away °the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·me as °¬captives⁺ to·¬sword

27 and if you·¬announced to·me I·¬sended·out iᵮ °you with of·¬joy and with of·musician⁺ of·¬tamborines⁺ and °guitars⁺

28 not I·was·¬deemed·worthy to·¬kiss °the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·me and °the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·me now then ¬unwisely you·¬did

29 and now ¬is·strong the ⁼hand of·me to·do·evil °you then the ⁼God of·the ⁼father of·you ¬yesterday told unto °me saying ꜝ¬keep·yourself °yourself ¬lest you·should·speak with of·Ya‘aqob °¬evil⁺

30 now therefore you·have·¬travelled·yourself to·¬desire for you·¬longed·for to·come·off to °the ⁼house of·the ⁼father of·you so·that °what you·thieved °the⁺ ⁼Gods⁺ of·me

31 ¬answered then Ya‘aqob told to·the Laban I·told for ¬lest you·should·¬remove °the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·you off myˊ and °all⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ my

32 ꜝ¬come·to·know what is of·the·ones⁺ yourˊ ¬from to·me* and ꜝtake and not ¬came·to·know ¬from to·him °no·one and told to·him Ya‘aqob ¬from to·which ifᵮ you·should·find °the⁺ ⁼Gods⁺ of·you not will·live·himself ¬in·front·of of·the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·us not had·¬seen then Ya‘aqob ¬that ¬Rachel ⁼the ⁼woman of·him thieved °them

33 coming·to then Laban ¬looked·for to °the ⁼house Leias and not found and coming·out out of·the ⁼house Leias ¬looked·for °the ⁼house of·Ya‘aqob and in to·the ⁼house of·the·ones⁺ two of·¬maidservants⁺ and not found came·to then and to °the ⁼house of·¬Rachel

34 ¬Rachel then took °the⁺ ⁼idols⁺ and threw·in °them to °the⁺ ⁼¬packsaddles⁺ of·the ⁼camel and ¬sat·on to·them

35 and told to·the ⁼father of·her ńot ¬difficultly ꜝ¬bear lord not I·am·able·myself to·¬arise ¬before of·you ¬that the·one ¬according·to °¬custom of·the⁺ ⁼women⁺ to·me is ¬looked·for then Laban in to·¬all ⁼the ⁼house and not found °the⁺ ⁼idols⁺

36 was·¬angered then Ya‘aqob and ¬quarrelled·himself to·the Laban ¬answered then Ya‘aqob told to·the Laban what ⁼the ⁼¬crime of·me and what ⁼the ⁼¬sin of·me ¬that you·¬sought ¬after of·me

37 and ¬that you·¬looked·for °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬vessels⁺ of·me °what you·found off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬vessels⁺ of·the ⁼house of·you ꜝ¬place ¬here ¬in·front·of of·the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·me and of·the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·you and ꜝlet·¬rebuke⁺ ¬each °¬midst of·the·ones⁺ two of·us

38 these⁺ to·me twenty °years⁺ I* I·am with of·you the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ of·you and the⁺ ⁼¬goats⁺ of·you not they·were·¬been·barren °¬rams⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ of·you not they·¬devoured

39 °¬taken·by·wild·beasts not I·have·¬carried·up to·you I* I·¬payed·for ¬from of·myself °thieveries⁺ of·day and °thieveries⁺ of·night

40 I·was·generated·myself of·the ⁼day self-¬burning·with to·the ⁼¬heat and to·¬icy·coldness of·the ⁼night and ¬left·himself the ⁼¬sleep off of·the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ of·me

41 °these⁺ to·me twenty °years⁺ I* I·am in to·the ⁼house of·you I·served to·you ten °four⁺ ⁼years⁺ anti of·the·ones⁺ two of·daughters⁺ of·you and six °years⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ of·you and you·¬deceived·yourself °the ⁼¬wage of·me ten to·¬ewe-lambs⁺

42 if ńot the ⁼God of·the ⁼father of·me of·Abraham and the ⁼¬fear of·Yitzchaq was to·me now iᵮ °¬empty °me you·¬sended·out °the ⁼¬lowliness of·me and °the·one °¬labor of·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·me ¬saw the ⁼God and ¬rebuked °you ¬yesterday

43 ¬answered then Laban told to·the ⁼Ya‘aqob the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·me and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·me and the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ of·me and all⁺ °whatever⁺ you you·¬see my is and of·the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·me °what I·will·do to·these⁺ today or to·the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·them to·which⁺ they·¬gave·birth·to

44 now therefore ¬come we·should·¬make·a·covenant·ourselves °¬covenant I* and you and will·be·himself to °¬testimony ¬each °¬midst myˊ and of·you told then to·him ¬¡see! no·one with of·us is ꜝ¬see the ⁼God ⁼¬witness ¬each °¬midst myˊ and of·you

45 taking then Ya‘aqob °stone stood °him °¬monument

46 told then Ya‘aqob to·the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·him ꜝ¬collect⁺ °stones⁺ and they·¬collected °stones⁺ and they·did °¬hill and they·¬ate and they·drank there upon of·the ⁼¬hill and told to·him Laban ⁼the ⁼¬hill ⁼this ¬testifies ¬each °¬midst myˊ and of·you today

47 and called °him Laban ⁼¬hill of·the ⁼¬testimony Ya‘aqob then called °him ¬hill ⁼¬witness

48 told then Laban to·the ⁼Ya‘aqob ¬¡see! the ⁼¬hill ⁼this and the ⁼¬monument ⁼this °which I·stood ¬each °¬midst myˊ and of·you ¬testifies the ⁼¬hill ⁼this and ¬testifies the ⁼¬monument ⁼this through °this was·called the ⁼name of·him ¬hill ¬testifies

49 and the ⁼¬appearance °which told may·¬give the ⁼God ¬each °¬midst myˊ and of·you ¬that we·will·¬leave·ourselves óther off of·the ⁼óther

50 if you·will·¬humble °the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·me if you·will·take·yourself °women⁺ upon to·the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·me ꜝ¬see no·one with of·us is

52 ifᵮ also for I* ńot I·should·¬cross unto °you ńot·then you you·should·¬cross unto °me °the ⁼¬hill ⁼this and °the ⁼¬monument ⁼this upon to·evil

53 the ⁼God of·Abraham and the ⁼God of·¬Nahor will·judge ¬each °¬midst of·us and ¬sweared Ya‘aqob ¬according·to of·the ⁼¬fear ⁼the ⁼father of·him ⁼Yitzchaq

54 and ¬sacrificed Ya‘aqob °¬sacrifice in to·the ⁼mountain and called °the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·him and they·¬ate and they·drank and they·were·¬slept in to·the ⁼mountain

32 ¬arising then Laban °the·one ¬early ¬kissed °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him and °the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·him and ¬praised °them and ¬turned·away Laban came·off to °the ⁼¬place of·him

2 and Ya‘aqob came·off to °the·one of·himself °¬road and ¬looking·up ¬saw °¬barracks of·God °having·¬inserted·against and they·¬met to·him the⁺ ⁼¬announcers⁺ of·the ⁼God

3 told then Ya‘aqob ¬when ¬saw °them ¬barracks of·God this and called °the ⁼name of·the ⁼¬place ⁼that ¬barrackses⁺

4 missioned·off then Ya‘aqob °¬announcers⁺ ¬before of·him unto °¬Esau ⁼the ⁼brother of·him to °earth Sēir to °¬country Edōm

5 and ¬ordered·himself to·them saying thus you⁺·will·¬say to·the ⁼lord of·me to·¬Esau thus says the ⁼¬child of·you Ya‘aqob with Laban I·¬was·a·stranger and I·¬delayed ¬until of·the·one now

6 and they·were·generated·themselves to·me ¬oxes⁺ and donkeys⁺ and sheep⁺ and ¬children⁺ and ¬maidservants⁺ and I·missioned·off to·¬announce to·the ⁼lord of·me to·¬Esau so·that should·find the ⁼¬child of·you °¬grace ¬in·front·of of·you

7 and they·¬lived the⁺ ⁼¬announcers⁺ unto °Ya‘aqob saying we·came unto °the ⁼brother of·you °¬Esau and ¬¡see! he comes·himself to °¬meeting to·you and four·hundred⁺ ⁼men⁺ with of·him

8 was·¬feared then Ya‘aqob ¬very and ¬was·perplexed·himself and ¬distributed °the ⁼people ⁼the·one with of·him and °the⁺ ⁼¬oxes⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ to two °¬barrackses⁺

9 and told Ya‘aqob ifᵮ should·come ¬Esau to °¬barracks ⁼one and should·¬prevent °her will·be·himself the ⁼¬barracks ⁼the ⁼second to °the·one to·self-¬save

10 told then Ya‘aqob ⁼the ⁼God of·the ⁼father of·me of·Abraham and the ⁼God of·the ⁼father of·me of·Yitzchaq lord the ⁼telling to·me ꜝ¬run·from to °the ⁼earth of·the ⁼genesis of·you and ¬well °you I·will·do

11 ¬qualifies·himself to·me off of·all ⁼¬justice and off of·all ⁼¬truth ⁼which you·did to·the ⁼¬child of·you in for to·the ⁼¬rod of·me I·¬crossed °the ⁼¬Jordan ⁼this now then I·have·been·generated to two °¬barrackses⁺

12 ꜝ¬take·out·yourself °me out of·hand of·the ⁼brother of·me of·¬Esau ¬that I·¬fear·myself I* °him ¬lest coming should·¬strike °me and °mother upon to·¬children⁺

13 you then you·told beautifully ¬well °you I·will·do and I·will·¬place °the ⁼seed of·you as °the ⁼¬sand of·the ⁼sea which not will·be·¬numbered off of·the ⁼¬multitude

14 and was·¬slept there °the ⁼night ⁼that and took of·which⁺ ¬bore °¬gifts⁺ and ¬sended·out to·¬Esau ⁼the ⁼brother of·him

15 °¬goats⁺ ⁼two·hundred⁺ °¬he-goats⁺ twenty °sheep⁺ ⁼two·hundred⁺ °¬rams⁺ twenty

16 °camels⁺ ⁼suckling and °the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·them thirty °¬oxes⁺ forty °¬bulls⁺ ten °donkeys⁺ twenty and °¬colts⁺ ten

17 and gave through of·hand to·the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·him °¬flock ¬according·to °¬alone⁺ told then to·the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·him ꜝ¬go·before⁺·yourselves⁺ ¬before of·me and °¬interval you⁺·do ¬each °¬midst of·¬flock and of·¬flock

18 and ¬ordered·himself to·the ⁼first saying ifᵮ to·you should·¬meet ¬Esau ⁼the ⁼brother of·me and ¬asks °you saying of·what you·are and ¬where? should·¬travel and of·what these⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ °self-¬going·before of·you

19 you·will·¬say of·the ⁼¬child of·you of·Ya‘aqob °¬gifts⁺ has·missioned·off to·the ⁼lord of·me of·¬Esau and ¬¡see! he ¬after of·us

20 and ¬ordered·himself to·the ⁼first and to·the ⁼second and to·the ⁼third and to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼self-¬going·before ¬after of·the⁺ ⁼¬flocks⁺ ⁼these⁺ saying ¬according·to °the ⁼¬declaration ⁼this ꜝspeak⁺ to·¬Esau in to·the·one to·find °you⁺ °him

21 and you⁺·will·¬say ¬¡see! the ⁼¬child of·you Ya‘aqob ¬comes·himself ¬after of·us told for I·will·¬appease·myself °the ⁼¬face of·him in to·the⁺ ⁼¬gifts⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼self-¬going·before of·him and with °this I·will·¬behold·myself °the ⁼¬face of·him ¬perhaps for will·¬wait·for·himself °the ⁼¬face of·me

22 and they·¬passed·by·themselves °the⁺ ⁼¬gifts⁺ ¬according·to °¬face of·him he then was·¬slept °the ⁼night ⁼that in to·the ⁼¬barracks

23 ¬arising then °the ⁼night ⁼that took °the·ones⁺ two °women⁺ and °the·ones⁺ two °¬maidservants⁺ and °the·ones⁺ eleven °¬children⁺ of·him and ¬crossed °the ⁼¬ford of·the Iabok

24 and took °them and ¬crossed °the ⁼¬brook and ¬caused·to·pass·over °all⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ of·him

25 was·¬left then Ya‘aqob ⁼¬alone and ¬wrestled human with of·him ¬until ¬early

26 ¬saw then ¬that not is·able·himself unto °him and touched·himself of·the ⁼¬width of·the ⁼¬thigh of·him and ¬was·paralyzed °the ⁼¬width of·the ⁼¬thigh ⁼Ya‘aqob in to·the·one to·¬wrestle °him with of·him

27 and told to·him ꜝmission·off °me ¬ascended for the ⁼¬dawn ⁼the·one then told not ńot °you I·should·mission·off ifᵮ ńot °me you·should·¬praise

28 told then to·him what ⁼the ⁼name of·you is the·one then told Ya‘aqob

29 told then to·him not will·be·called ¬still the ⁼name of·you Ya‘aqob but Yisra’el will·be·himself the ⁼name of·you ¬that you·¬strengthened with of·God and with of·humans⁺ able

30 ¬asked then Ya‘aqob and told ꜝ¬announce to·me °the ⁼name of·you and told so·that °what ⁼this you·¬ask °the ⁼name of·me and ¬praised °him there

31 and called Ya‘aqob °the ⁼name of·the ⁼¬place ⁼that ¬appearance of·God I·¬saw for °God °¬face unto °¬face and was·¬saved of·me the ⁼soul

32 ¬rised then to·him the ⁼sun ¬when ¬passed·by °the ⁼¬appearance of·the ⁼God he then ¬limped to·the ⁼¬thigh of·him

33 ¬because·of of·this not ńot they·should·¬eat the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el °the ⁼¬nerve ⁼which ¬was·paralyzed which is upon of·the ⁼¬width of·the ⁼¬thigh ¬until of·the ⁼day ⁼this ¬that touched·himself of·the ⁼¬width of·the ⁼¬thigh ⁼Ya‘aqob of·the ⁼¬nerve and ¬was·paralyzed

33 ¬looking·up then Ya‘aqob ¬saw and ¬¡see! ¬Esau ⁼the ⁼brother of·him self-coming and four·hundred⁺ ⁼men⁺ with of·him and ¬??? Ya‘aqob °the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ upon Leian and °¬Rachel and °the·ones⁺ two °¬maidservants⁺

2 and did °the·ones⁺ two °¬maidservants⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·them in to·first⁺ and Leian and °the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·her ¬after and °¬Rachel and °Yosef °¬last⁺

3 he then ¬went·before ¬before of·them and ¬worshipped upon °the ⁼earth seven·times ¬until of·the·one to·¬come·near of·the ⁼brother of·him

4 and ¬hastened ¬Esau to °¬meeting to·him and ¬embracing °him ¬befriended and ¬fell upon °the ⁼neck of·him and they·¬wept ¬both⁺

5 and ¬looking·up ¬saw °the⁺ ⁼women⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ and told what these⁺ to·you is the·one then told the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ to·which⁺ ¬had·mercy the ⁼God °the ⁼¬child of·you

6 and they·¬approached the⁺ ⁼¬maidservants⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·them and they·¬worshipped

7 and ¬approached Leia and the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·her and they·¬worshipped and with °these⁺ ¬approached ¬Rachel and Yosef and they·¬worshipped

8 and told what these⁺ to·you is all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬barrackses⁺ ⁼these⁺ to·which⁺ I·have·¬met the·one then told so·that should·find the ⁼¬child of·you °¬grace ¬in·front·of of·you lord

9 told then ¬Esau is to·me many⁺ brother ꜝlet·them·be to·you the·ones⁺ yourˊ

10 told then Ya‘aqob if I·have·found °¬grace ¬in·front·of of·you ꜝ¬receive·yourself °the⁺ ⁼¬gifts⁺ through of·the·ones⁺ my of·hands⁺ ¬because·of of·this I·¬saw °the ⁼¬face of·you as iᵮ whatever may·¬see °¬face of·God and you·will·¬delight °me

11 ꜝtake °the⁺ ⁼¬praises⁺ of·me °which⁺ I·¬bore to·you ¬that ¬had·mercy °me the ⁼God and is to·me all⁺ and ¬forced·himself °him and took

12 and told ¬taking·away we·will·¬travel·ourselves upon °¬straight

13 told then to·him the ⁼lord of·me knows ¬that the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ ⁼¬tender⁺ and the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬oxes⁺ they·¬give·birth·themselves upon °me* ifᵮ therefore I·should·¬seek °them °day ⁼one they·will·die·off·themselves all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺

14 ꜝlet·them·¬go·before the ⁼lord of·me ¬before of·the ⁼¬child I* then I·will·¬strengthen in to·the ⁼¬road ¬according·to °¬lecture·hall of·the ⁼¬journey ⁼the·one ¬in·front·of of·me and ¬according·to °foot of·the⁺ ⁼¬boys⁺ ¬until of·the·one °me to·come unto °the ⁼lord of·me to Sēir

15 told then ¬Esau I·will·¬leave·behind with of·you off of·the ⁼people ⁼the·one with myˊ the·one then told so·that what ⁼this ⁼¬sufficient ¬that they·found °¬grace ¬in·front·of of·you lord

16 ¬turned·away then ¬Esau in to·the ⁼day ⁼that to °the ⁼¬road of·him to Sēir

17 and Ya‘aqob ¬takes·away to °¬tents⁺ and did to·himself there °houses⁺ and to·the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ of·him did °¬tents⁺ through °this called °the ⁼name of·the ⁼¬place ⁼that ¬tents⁺

18 and came Ya‘aqob to °¬Salem °city of·¬Shechems⁺ which is in to·earth ¬Canaan when came out of·the ⁼¬Mesopotamia ⁼¬Syria and ¬inserted·against ¬according·to °¬face of·the ⁼city

19 and ¬possessed·himself °the ⁼¬part of·the ⁼field ¬whither stood there °the ⁼¬tent of·him ¬from to·¬Hamor of·father ⁼¬Shechem hundred of·¬lambs⁺

20 and stood there °¬altar and ¬called·himself °the ⁼God of·Yisra’el

34 came·out then Dina ⁼the ⁼daughter Leias °which ¬gave·birth·to to·the ⁼Ya‘aqob to·¬consider °the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬native·inhabitant⁺

2 and ¬saw °her ¬Shechem ⁼the ⁼son of·¬Hamor the Chorraios ⁼the ⁼¬ruler of·the ⁼earth and taking °her was·¬slept with of·her and ¬humbled °her

3 and ¬watched·out to·the ⁼soul Dinas ⁼the ⁼daughter of·Ya‘aqob and loved °the ⁼virgin and spoke ¬according·to °the ⁼¬mind of·the ⁼virgin to·her

4 told then ¬Shechem unto °¬Hamor ⁼the ⁼father of·him saying ꜝtake to·me °the ⁼¬maidservant ⁼this to °woman

5 Ya‘aqob then heard ¬that ¬stained the ⁼son of·¬Hamor Dinan ⁼the ⁼daughter of·him then the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him they·were with of·the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ of·him in to·the ⁼¬plain ¬remained·silent then Ya‘aqob ¬until of·the·one to·come °them

6 came·out then ¬Hamor ⁼the ⁼father of·¬Shechem unto °Ya‘aqob to·speak to·him

7 then the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Ya‘aqob they·came out of·the ⁼¬plain as then they·heard they·were·¬pierced the⁺ ⁼men⁺ and ¬distressing was to·them ¬very ¬that °¬indecent did in to·Yisra’el ¬slept with of·the ⁼daughter of·Ya‘aqob and not thus will·be·himself

8 and spoke ¬Hamor to·them saying ⁼¬Shechem ⁼the ⁼son of·me ¬predetermined·himself to·the ⁼soul °the ⁼daughter of·you⁺ ꜝgive⁺ therefore °her to·him °woman

9 you⁺·¬married·yourselves⁺ to·us °the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·you⁺ ꜝgive⁺ to·us and °the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·us ꜝtake⁺ to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·you⁺

10 and in to·us you⁺·¬dwell and the ⁼earth ¬¡see! ¬street ¬in·front·of of·you⁺ ꜝ¬dwell⁺ and ꜝ¬traffic·in⁺·yourselves⁺ upon of·her and ¬??? in to·her

11 told then ¬Shechem unto °the ⁼father of·her and unto °the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·her may·I·find °¬grace ¬in·front·of of·you⁺ and °which ifᵮ you⁺·should·tell we·will·give

12 ꜝ¬multiply⁺ °the ⁼¬dowry ¬very and I·will·give ¬as iᵮ you⁺·should·tell to·me and you⁺·will·give to·me °the·one °¬child °this to °woman

13 they·were·¬answered then the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Ya‘aqob to·the ⁼¬Shechem and to·¬Hamor ⁼the ⁼father of·him with of·¬deceit and they·spoke to·them ¬that they·¬stained Dinan ⁼the ⁼sister of·them

14 and they·told to·them ¬Simeon and ¬Levi the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ Dinas sons⁺ then Leias not we·will·be·able·ourselves to·do °the ⁼¬declaration ⁼this to·give °the ⁼sister of·us to·human which has °¬uncircumcision is for ¬disgrace to·us

15 in to·this we·will·be·¬likened to·you⁺ and we·will·¬dwell in to·you⁺ ifᵮ you⁺·should·be·generated·yourselves⁺ as we and you⁺ in to·the·one to·be·¬circumcised of·you⁺ °all ⁼¬male

16 and we·will·give °the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·us to·you⁺ and off of·the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·you⁺ we·will·take·ourselves to·us °women⁺ and we·will·¬dwell ¬from to·you⁺ and we·will·be·ourselves as ¬gens ⁼one

17 ifᵮ then ńot you⁺·should·¬listen·to of·us of·the·one to·self-¬circumcise taking °the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·us we·will·come·off·ourselves

18 and they·¬pleased the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ ¬in·front·of of·¬Hamor and ¬in·front·of of·¬Shechem ⁼the ⁼son ⁼¬Hamor

19 and not ¬delayed the ⁼youth of·the·one to·do °the ⁼¬declaration ⁼this ¬clinged·himself for to·the ⁼daughter of·Ya‘aqob he then was ¬honored of·all⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ in to·the ⁼house of·the ⁼father of·him

20 came then ¬Hamor and ¬Shechem ⁼the ⁼son of·him unto °the ⁼gate of·the ⁼city of·them and they·spoke unto °the⁺ ⁼men⁺ of·the ⁼city of·them saying

21 ⁼the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ ⁼these⁺ ⁼peaceful⁺ they·are with of·us ꜝlet·¬dwell⁺ upon of·the ⁼earth and ꜝlet·¬traffic·in⁺·themselves °her then the ⁼earth ¬¡see! ¬street ¬in·front·of of·them °the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·them we·will·take·ourselves to·us °women⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·us we·will·give to·them

22 ¬only in to·this they·will·be·¬likened to·us the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ of·the·one to·¬dwell with of·us ¬so to·be °people ⁼one in to·the·one to·self-¬circumcise of·us °all ⁼¬male ¬as and they they·have·¬circumcised·themselves

23 and the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ of·them and the⁺ ⁼¬possessioning of·them and the⁺ ⁼four-footed⁺ not of·us will·be·himself ¬only in to·this we·should·be·¬likened to·them and they·will·¬dwell with of·us

24 and they·¬listened·to of·¬Hamor and of·¬Shechem ⁼the ⁼son of·him all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼self-¬departing °the ⁼gate of·the ⁼city of·them and they·¬circumcised·themselves °the ⁼flesh of·the ⁼¬uncircumcision of·them all ⁼virulent

25 was·generated·himself then in to·the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼third when they·were in to·the ⁼¬travail they·took the·ones⁺ two sons⁺ of·Ya‘aqob ¬Simeon and ¬Levi the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ Dinas ¬each °the ⁼¬sword of·him and they·came·to to °the ⁼city ¬securely and they·killed·off °all ⁼¬male

26 °the·one also °¬Hamor and °¬Shechem ⁼the ⁼son of·him they·killed·off in to·mouth of·¬sword and they·took °the Dinan out of·the ⁼house ⁼the ⁼¬Shechem and they·came·out

27 then the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Ya‘aqob they·came·to upon °the⁺ ⁼trauma-deads⁺ and they·¬robbed °the ⁼city in to·which they·¬stained Dinan ⁼the ⁼sister of·them

28 and °the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ of·them and °the⁺ ⁼¬oxes⁺ of·them and °the⁺ ⁼donkeys⁺ of·them whatever⁺ also was in to·the ⁼city and whatever⁺ was in to·the ⁼¬plain they·took

29 and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼bodies⁺ of·them and °all ⁼the ⁼¬accoutrements of·them and °the⁺ ⁼women⁺ of·them they·¬took·captive and they·¬robbed °whatever⁺ also was in to·the ⁼city and °whatever⁺ was in to·the⁺ ⁼houses⁺

30 told then Ya‘aqob to·¬Simeon and to·¬Levi °¬detested °me you⁺·have·done ¬so °¬evil °me to·be to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling °the ⁼earth in also to·the⁺ ⁼¬Canaanites⁺ and to·the⁺ Ferezaiois I* then ¬very·few I·am in to·¬number and ¬assembled upon °me* they·will·¬cut·down °me and I·will·be·¬obliterated I* and the ⁼house of·me

31 the·ones⁺ then they·told but ¬like to·fornicator they·should·¬lend·themselves to·the ⁼sister of·us

35 told then the ⁼God unto °Ya‘aqob ¬arising ꜝ¬ascend to °the ⁼¬place Baithēl and ꜝ¬dwell there and ꜝdo there °¬altar to·the ⁼God ⁼the ⁼¬beheld to·you in to·the·one to·¬run·away °you off of·¬face of·¬Esau ⁼the ⁼brother of·you

2 told then Ya‘aqob to·the ⁼house of·him and to·all⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ with of·him ꜝ¬take·up⁺ °the⁺ ⁼Gods⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬another's⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ with of·you⁺ out of·¬midst of·you⁺ and ꜝ¬clean⁺·yourselves⁺ and ꜝ¬change⁺ °the⁺ ⁼robes⁺ of·you⁺

3 and ¬arising we·should·¬ascend to Baithēl and we·should·do there °¬altar to·the ⁼God ⁼the ⁼¬listening·to to·me in to·day of·¬pressure which was with myˊ and ¬saved °me in to·the ⁼¬road ⁼which I·was·¬travelled

4 and they·gave to·the ⁼Ya‘aqob °the⁺ ⁼Gods⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬another's⁺ which⁺ they·were in to·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·them and °the⁺ ⁼¬rings⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼ears⁺ of·them and ¬hid °them Ya‘aqob ¬by °the ⁼¬terebinth·resin ⁼the·one in to·¬Shechems⁺ and ¬destroyed °them ¬until of·the·one today of·day

5 and ¬expelled Yisra’el out to·¬Shechems⁺ and was·generated·himself ¬fear of·God upon °the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ ¬surrounding of·them and not they·¬sought ¬after of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

6 came then Ya‘aqob to Louza which is in to·earth ¬Canaan which is Baithēl he and all ⁼the ⁼people ⁼which was with of·him

7 and ¬built there °¬altar and called °the ⁼name of·the ⁼¬place Baithēl there for was·¬appeared to·him the ⁼God in to·the·one to·¬run·away °him off of·¬face of·¬Esau ⁼the ⁼brother of·him

8 died·off then Debbōra ⁼the ⁼¬nursing·mother of·¬Rebekah ¬under Baithēl ¬by °the ⁼¬pin and called Ya‘aqob °the ⁼name of·her ¬pin of·¬grief

9 was·¬beheld then the ⁼God to·Ya‘aqob ¬still in Louza when ¬came·himself out of·¬Mesopotamia ⁼the ⁼¬Syria and ¬praised °him the ⁼God

10 and told to·him the ⁼God the ⁼name of·you Ya‘aqob not will·be·called ¬still Ya‘aqob but Yisra’el will·be·himself the ⁼name of·you

11 told then to·him the ⁼God I* the ⁼God of·you ꜝ¬grow·yourself and ꜝ¬multiply·yourself nations⁺ and ¬synagogues⁺ of·nations⁺ they·will·be·themselves out of·you and kings⁺ out of·the ⁼¬loins of·you they·will·come·out·themselves

12 and °the ⁼earth ⁼which I·have·given to·Abraham and to·Yitzchaq to·you I·have·given °her to·you will·be·himself and to·the ⁼seed of·you with °you I·will·give °the ⁼earth ⁼this

13 ¬ascended then the ⁼God off of·him out of·the ⁼¬place ¬whither spoke with of·him

14 and stood Ya‘aqob °¬monument in to·the ⁼¬place ⁼which spoke with of·him °¬monument ⁼stone and ¬poured·a·libation upon °her ⁼¬libation and ¬poured·on upon °her °¬olive·oil

15 and called Ya‘aqob °the ⁼name of·the ⁼¬place in to·which spoke with of·him there the ⁼God Baithēl

16 ¬taking·away then Ya‘aqob out Baithēl ¬set·up °the ⁼¬tent of·him ¬beyond of·the ⁼tower Gader was·generated·himself then ¬when ¬came·near Chabratha to °earth to·come Efratha ¬gave·birth·to ¬Rachel and ¬suffered·birth·pangs in to·the·one ¬???

17 was·generated·himself then in to·the·one ¬harshly °her to·¬give·birth·to told to·her the ⁼¬midwife ꜝ¬take·heart and for this to·you is son

18 was·generated·himself then in to·the·one to·¬release °her ⁼the ⁼soul died·off for called °the ⁼name of·him son of·¬anguish of·me then the ⁼father called °him ⁼¬Benjamin

19 died·off then ¬Rachel and was·¬buried in to·the ⁼¬road Efratha this is Bet-Lechem

20 and stood Ya‘aqob °¬monument upon of·the ⁼¬grave of·her this is ¬monument of·¬grave of·¬Rachel ¬until of·the·one today of·day

22 was·generated·himself then ¬when ¬dwelled Yisra’el in to·the ⁼earth ⁼that was·¬travelled ¬Reuben and was·¬slept with Ballas ⁼the ⁼¬concubine of·the ⁼father of·him and heard Yisra’el and ¬evil was·¬shined ¬in·front·of of·him they·were then the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Ya‘aqob twelve

23 sons⁺ Leias ¬firstborn of·Ya‘aqob ¬Reuben ⁼¬Simeon ⁼¬Levi ⁼Yudah ⁼¬Issachar ⁼¬Zebulun

24 sons⁺ then of·¬Rachel Yosef and ¬Benjamin

25 sons⁺ then Ballas ⁼¬maidservant ⁼¬Rachel Dan and ¬Naphtali

26 sons⁺ then Zelfas ⁼¬maidservant Leias ¬Gad and ¬Asher these⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Ya‘aqob which⁺ they·were·generated·themselves to·him in to·¬Mesopotamia of·the ⁼¬Syria

27 came then Ya‘aqob unto °Yitzchaq ⁼the ⁼father of·him to Mambrē to °city of·the ⁼¬plain this is Chebrōn in to·earth ¬Canaan ¬whither ¬was·a·stranger Abraham and Yitzchaq

28 they·were·generated·themselves then the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·Yitzchaq °which⁺ lived years⁺ hundred eighty

29 and ¬failing died·off and was·¬added unto °the ⁼¬gens of·him ¬elder and ¬full of·days⁺ and they·¬buried °him ¬Esau and Ya‘aqob the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him

36 these⁺ then the⁺ ⁼genesiss⁺ of·¬Esau he is Edōm

2 ⁼¬Esau then took °women⁺ to·himself off of·the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬Canaanites⁺ °the Ada ⁼daughter Ailōn ⁼the Chettaiou and °the Elibema ⁼daughter Ana ⁼the ⁼son Sebegōn ⁼the Euaiou

3 and °the Basemmath ⁼daughter Ismaēl °sister Nabaiōth

4 ¬gave·birth·to then Ada to·the ⁼¬Esau °the Elifas and Basemmath ¬gave·birth·to °the Ragouēl

5 and Elibema ¬gave·birth·to °the Ieous and °the Ieglom and °the ⁼¬Korah these⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·¬Esau which⁺ they·were·generated·themselves to·him in to·earth ¬Canaan

6 took then ¬Esau °the⁺ ⁼women⁺ of·him and °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼bodies⁺ of·the ⁼house of·him and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬possessioning and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ and °all⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ ¬possessed·himself and °whatever⁺ ¬gained·himself in to·earth ¬Canaan and was·¬travelled out of·earth of·¬Canaan off of·¬face of·Ya‘aqob ⁼the ⁼brother of·him

7 was for of·them the⁺ ⁼¬possessioning °many⁺ of·the·one to·¬dwell ¬together and not was·able·himself the ⁼earth of·the ⁼¬sojourning of·them to·¬bear °them off of·the ⁼¬multitude of·the·ones⁺ of·¬possessioning of·them

8 ¬dwelled then ¬Esau in to·the ⁼mountain Sēir ¬Esau he is Edōm

9 these⁺ then the⁺ ⁼genesiss⁺ of·¬Esau ⁼father Edōm in to·the ⁼mountain Sēir

10 and these⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼names⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·¬Esau Elifas ⁼son Adas ⁼woman of·¬Esau and Ragouēl ⁼son Basemmath ⁼woman of·¬Esau

11 they·were·generated·themselves then sons⁺ Elifas Thaiman Ōmar Sōfar Gothom and Kenez

12 Thamna then was ¬concubine Elifas ⁼the ⁼son ⁼¬Esau and ¬gave·birth·to to·the Elifas °the Amalēk these⁺ ⁼sons⁺ Adas ⁼woman of·¬Esau

13 these⁺ then sons⁺ Ragouēl Nachoth ⁼¬Zerah Some and Moze these⁺ they·were sons⁺ Basemmath ⁼woman of·¬Esau

14 these⁺ then they·were sons⁺ Elibemas ⁼daughter Ana ⁼the ⁼son Sebegōn of·woman of·¬Esau ¬gave·birth·to then to·the ⁼¬Esau °the Ieous and °the Ieglom and °the ⁼¬Korah

15 these⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·¬Esau sons⁺ Elifas ⁼¬firstborn ⁼¬Esau ¬ruler Thaiman ⁼¬ruler Ōmar ⁼¬ruler Sōfar ⁼¬ruler Kenez

16 ⁼¬ruler ⁼¬Korah ⁼¬ruler Gothom ⁼¬ruler Amalēk these⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ Elifas in to·earth ⁼¬Idumea these⁺ ⁼sons⁺ Adas

17 and these⁺ ⁼sons⁺ Ragouēl ⁼son ⁼¬Esau ¬ruler Nachoth ⁼¬ruler ⁼¬Zerah ⁼¬ruler Some ⁼¬ruler Moze these⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ Ragouēl in to·earth Edōm these⁺ ⁼sons⁺ Basemmath ⁼woman of·¬Esau

18 these⁺ then sons⁺ Elibemas ⁼woman of·¬Esau ¬ruler Ieous ⁼¬ruler Ieglom ⁼¬ruler ⁼¬Korah these⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ Elibemas

19 these⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·¬Esau and these⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·them these⁺ they·are sons⁺ Edōm

20 these⁺ then sons⁺ Sēir ⁼the Chorraiou ⁼the ⁼¬dwelling °the ⁼earth Lōtan Sōbal Sebegōn Ana

21 and Dēsōn and Asar and Risōn these⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·the Chorraiou ⁼the ⁼son Sēir in to·the ⁼earth Edōm

22 they·were·generated·themselves then sons⁺ Lōtan Chorri and Aiman sister then Lōtan Thamna

23 these⁺ then sons⁺ Sōbal ¬??? and Manachath and Gaibēl Sōf and Ōman

24 and these⁺ ⁼sons⁺ Sebegōn Aie and ¬??? this is the·one ¬??? which found °the ⁼¬mules in to·the ⁼¬deserted when ¬feeded °the⁺ ⁼¬donkeys⁺ Sebegōn ⁼the ⁼father of·him

25 these⁺ then sons⁺ Ana Dēsōn and Elibema ⁼daughter Ana

26 these⁺ then sons⁺ Dēsōn Amada and Asban and Iethran and ¬Haran

27 these⁺ then sons⁺ Asar ¬Balaam and Zoukam and ¬??? and Oukan

28 these⁺ then sons⁺ Risōn Ōs and ¬Ram

29 these⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ Chorri ¬ruler Lōtan ⁼¬ruler Sōbal ⁼¬ruler Sebegōn ⁼¬ruler Ana

30 ⁼¬ruler Dēsōn ⁼¬ruler Asar ⁼¬ruler Risōn these⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ Chorri in to·the⁺ ⁼¬reigns⁺ of·them in to·earth Edōm

31 and these⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼kings⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼becoming·king in Edōm ¬before of·the·one to·become·king °king in to·Yisra’el

32 and became·king in Edōm ¬Balak ⁼son of·the ⁼¬Beor and name to·the ⁼city of·him Dennaba

33 died·off then ¬Balak and became·king anti of·him Iōbab ⁼son of·¬Zerah out Bosorras

34 died·off then Iōbab and became·king anti of·him Asom out of·the ⁼earth Thaimanōn

35 died·off then Asom and became·king anti of·him Adad ⁼son Barad the ⁼¬preventing °¬Midian in to·the ⁼¬plain Mōab and name to·the ⁼city of·him Geththaim

36 died·off then Adad and became·king anti of·him ¬??? out Masekkas

37 died·off then ¬??? and became·king anti of·him Sha’ul out Roōbōth ⁼the·one ¬from °¬river

38 died·off then Sha’ul and became·king anti of·him Balaennōn ⁼son Achobōr

39 died·off then Balaennōn ⁼son Achobōr and became·king anti of·him Arad ⁼son Barad and name to·the ⁼city of·him Fogōr ⁼name then to·the ⁼woman of·him Maitebeēl ⁼daughter Matraith ⁼son Maizoob

40 these⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼names⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·¬Esau in to·the⁺ ⁼¬tribes⁺ of·them ¬according·to °¬place of·them in to·the⁺ ⁼¬countries⁺ of·them and in to·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ of·them ¬ruler Thamna ⁼¬ruler Gōla ⁼¬ruler Iether

41 ⁼¬ruler Elibemas ⁼¬ruler Ēlas ⁼¬ruler Finōn

42 ⁼¬ruler Kenez ⁼¬ruler Thaiman ⁼¬ruler Mazar

43 ⁼¬ruler Megediēl ⁼¬ruler Zafōim these⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ Edōm in to·the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬built in to·the ⁼earth of·the ⁼¬possession of·them this ⁼¬Esau ⁼father Edōm

37 ¬dwelled then Ya‘aqob in to·the ⁼earth ¬whither ¬was·a·stranger the ⁼father of·him in to·earth ¬Canaan

2 these⁺ then the⁺ ⁼genesiss⁺ of·Ya‘aqob Yosef ten seven of·years⁺ was ¬flocksmaning with of·the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·him °the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ being ⁼young with of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ Ballas and with of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ Zelfas of·the·ones⁺ of·women⁺ of·the ⁼father of·him ¬voted·against then Yosef °¬fault ⁼¬evil unto °Yisra’el ⁼the ⁼father of·them

3 Ya‘aqob then loved °the ⁼Yosef ¬from °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him ¬that son of·¬old·age was to·him did then to·him °tunic ⁼¬various

4 ¬seeing then the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·him ¬that °him the ⁼father ¬befriends out of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him they·¬hated °him and not they·were·able·themselves to·speak to·him °no·one ⁼peaceful

5 ¬dreamed then Yosef °¬dream ¬announced °it to·the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·him

6 and told to·them ꜝhear⁺ of·the ⁼¬dream ⁼this ⁼which I·was·¬dreamed

7 I·¬supposed·myself °us to·¬bind °¬sheafs⁺ in to·¬midst ⁼the ⁼¬plain and ¬arose the·one myˊ ¬sheaf and was·¬been·straight·up ¬moved·around then the⁺ ⁼¬sheafs⁺ of·you⁺ they·¬worshipped °the·one myˊ °¬sheaf

8 they·told then to·him the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ ńot becoming·king you·will·become·king upon °us or lord you·will·be·lord of·us and they·¬added·themselves ¬still to·¬hate °him ¬because·of of·the⁺ ⁼¬dreams⁺ of·him and ¬because·of of·the⁺ ⁼¬declarations⁺ of·him

9 ¬saw then °¬dream ⁼óther and ¬related·fully·himself °it to·the ⁼father of·him and to·the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·him and told ¬¡see! I·¬dreamed·myself °¬dream ⁼óther ¬just·as the ⁼sun and the ⁼luna and eleven stars⁺ they·¬worshipped °me

10 and ¬rebuked to·him the ⁼father of·him and told to·him what ⁼the ⁼¬dream ⁼this °which you·were·¬dreamed ¬no? ¬indeed coming we·will·come·ourselves I* also and the ⁼mother of·you and the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·you to·¬worship to·you upon °the ⁼earth

11 they·were·zealous then °him the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·him then the ⁼father of·him ¬kept °the ⁼¬declaration

12 they·were·¬travelled then the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·him to·¬feed °the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ of·the ⁼father of·them to °¬Shechem

13 and told Yisra’el unto °Yosef not the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·you they·¬flocksman in to·¬Shechem ¬come I·should·mission·off °you unto °them told then to·him ¬¡see! I*

14 told then to·him Yisra’el ⁼¬travelled ꜝ¬see if they·¬are·healthy the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·you and the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ and ꜝ¬announce to·me and missioned·off °him out of·the ⁼¬cavity ⁼the Chebrōn and came to °¬Shechem

15 and found °him human °self-¬leading·astray in to·the ⁼¬plain ¬asked then °him the ⁼human ⁼saying °what you·¬seek

16 the·one then told °the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·me I·¬seek ꜝ¬announce to·me ¬where? they·¬feed

17 told then to·him the ⁼human they·have·¬taken·away ¬from·here I·heard for of·them ⁼saying we·should·be·¬travelled to Dōthaim and was·¬travelled Yosef ¬after of·the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·him and found °them in Dōthaim

18 they·¬foreseed then °him ¬from·afar ¬before of·the·one to·¬come·near °him unto °them and they·¬acted·wickedly·themselves of·the·one to·kill·off °him

19 they·told then ¬each unto °the ⁼brother of·him ¬¡see! the ⁼¬dreamer ⁼that comes·himself

20 now therefore ¬come we·should·kill·off °him and we·should·¬throw °him to °one of·the⁺ ⁼¬pits⁺ and we·will·¬say ¬wild·animal ⁼¬evil ¬devoured °him and we·will·¬see·ourselves what will·be·himself the⁺ ⁼¬dreams⁺ of·him

21 hearing then ¬Reuben ¬took·out·himself °him out of·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·them and told not we·will·¬strike °him to °soul

22 told then to·them ¬Reuben ńot you⁺·should·¬pour·out °blood ꜝthrow·in⁺ °him to °the ⁼¬pit ⁼this ⁼the·one in to·the ⁼¬deserted °hand then ńot you⁺·should·¬inflict to·him ¬that should·¬take·out·himself °him out of·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·them and should·¬pay °him to·the ⁼father of·him

23 was·generated·himself then ¬when came Yosef unto °the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·him they·¬stripped °the ⁼Yosef ⁼the ⁼tunic ⁼the ⁼¬various ⁼the·one about °him

24 and taking °him they·¬threw to °the ⁼¬pit then the ⁼¬pit ⁼¬empty °water not had

25 they·¬seated then to·¬eat °bread and ¬looking·up to·the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ they·¬saw and ¬¡see! ¬travelers⁺ Ismaēlitai they·came·themselves out Galaad and the⁺ ⁼camels⁺ of·them they·¬were·full of·¬incenses⁺ and of·¬balm and of·¬balsam they·¬travelled·themselves then to·¬bring·down to °Egypt

26 told then Yudah unto °the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·him what ⁼¬profitable ifᵮ we·should·kill·off °the ⁼brother of·us and we·should·¬hide °the ⁼blood of·him

27 ¬come we·should·¬pay·ourselves °him to·the⁺ Ismaēlitais ⁼these⁺ then the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·us ńot ꜝlet·be⁺ upon °him ¬that brother of·us and flesh of·us is they·heard then the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·him

28 and they·¬passed·by·themselves the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬Midians⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬traders⁺ and they·¬dragged·out and they·¬pulled·up °the ⁼Yosef out of·the ⁼¬pit and they·¬payed·themselves °the ⁼Yosef to·the⁺ Ismaēlitais twenty of·golden⁺ and they·¬brought·down °the ⁼Yosef to °Egypt

29 ¬lived then ¬Reuben upon °the ⁼¬pit and not ¬sees °the ⁼Yosef in to·the ⁼¬pit and ¬tore °the⁺ ⁼cloaks⁺ of·him

30 and ¬lived unto °the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·him and told the ⁼¬boy not is I* then ¬where? I·¬travel·myself ¬still

31 taking then °the ⁼tunic of·the ⁼Yosef they·¬slaughtered °¬goat of·¬goats⁺ and they·¬defiled °the ⁼tunic to·the ⁼blood

32 and they·missioned·off °the ⁼tunic ⁼the ⁼¬various and they·¬brought·in to·the ⁼father of·them and they·told °this we·found ꜝ¬come·to·know if tunic of·the ⁼son of·you is or not

33 and ¬came·to·know °him and told tunic of·the ⁼son of·me is ¬wild·animal ⁼¬evil ¬devoured °him ¬wild·animal ¬seized °the ⁼Yosef

34 ¬tore then Ya‘aqob °the⁺ ⁼cloaks⁺ of·him and ¬put·himself °¬sackcloth upon °the ⁼¬loins of·him and ¬mourned °the ⁼son of·him °days⁺ ⁼many⁺

35 they·were·¬assembled then all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him and the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ and they·came to·¬plead °him and not ¬willed to·self-¬plead saying ¬that I·will·¬come·myself unto °the ⁼son of·me ¬mourning to of·¬hell and ¬wept °him the ⁼father of·him

36 then the⁺ ⁼¬Midians⁺ they·¬payed·themselves °the ⁼Yosef to °Egypt to·the Petefrē ⁼the ⁼¬castrato of·¬Pharaoh to·¬chief·guard

38 was·generated·himself then in to·the ⁼¬time ⁼that ¬came Yudah off of·the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·him and ¬reached·himself ¬until unto °human ⁼whatever Odollamitēn to·which name Iras

2 and ¬saw there Yudah °daughter of·human ⁼¬Canaanite to·which name Saua and took °her and came·to unto °her

3 and ¬seizing ¬gave·birth·to °son and called °the ⁼name of·him °¬Er

4 and ¬seizing ¬still ¬gave·birth·to °son and called °the ⁼name of·him Aunan

5 and ¬adding ¬still ¬gave·birth·to °son and called °the ⁼name of·him Sēlōm she then was in Chasbi ¬when ¬gave·birth·to °them

6 and took Yudah °woman to·¬Er ⁼the ⁼¬firstborn of·him to·which name ¬Tamar

7 was·generated·himself then ¬Er ⁼¬firstborn of·Yudah ¬evil ¬in·front·of of·lord and killed·off °him the ⁼God

8 told then Yudah to·the Aunan ꜝcome·to unto °the ⁼woman of·the ⁼brother of·you and ¬??? °her and ꜝ¬arise °seed to·the ⁼brother of·you

9 knowing then Aunan ¬that not to·him will·be·himself the ⁼seed was·generated·himself ¬when came·to·himself unto °the ⁼woman of·the ⁼brother of·him ¬poured·out upon °the ⁼earth of·the·one ńot to·give °seed to·the ⁼brother of·him

10 ¬evil then was·¬shined ¬in·front·of of·the ⁼God ¬that did °this and put·to·death and °this

11 told then Yudah to·¬Tamar ⁼the ⁼bride of·him ꜝ¬sit·yourself widow in to·the ⁼house of·the ⁼father of·you ¬until great should·be·generated·himself Sēlōm ⁼the ⁼son of·me told for ¬lest should·die·off and this ¬just·as the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·him coming·off then ¬Tamar ¬sat·himself in to·the ⁼house of·the ⁼father of·her

12 they·were·¬multiplied then the⁺ ⁼days⁺ and died·off Saua ⁼the ⁼woman of·Yudah and ¬pleaded ⁼Yudah ¬ascended upon °the⁺ ⁼¬shearing °the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ of·him he and Iras ⁼the ⁼¬flocksman of·him the Odollamitēs to Thamna

13 and was·¬announced to·¬Tamar ⁼the ⁼bride of·him saying ¬¡see! the ⁼¬father-in-law of·you ¬ascends to Thamna to·¬shear °the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ of·him

14 and self-¬taking·away °the⁺ ⁼cloaks⁺ of·the ⁼widowhood off of·herself ¬clothed·himself °¬reaping·hook and ¬bedecked·himself and ¬seated unto to·the⁺ ⁼gates⁺ Ainan which is in to·¬passing·by Thamna ¬saw for ¬that great has·been·generated Sēlōm he then not gave °her to·him °woman

15 and ¬seeing °her Yudah ¬thought °her ⁼fornicator to·be ¬covered·himself for °the ⁼¬face of·her and not ¬came·to·know °her

16 ¬turned·from then unto °her ⁼the ⁼¬road and told to·her ꜝ¬allow °me to·come·to unto °you not for knew ¬that the ⁼bride of·him is the·one then told °what to·me you·will·give ifᵮ you·should·come·to unto °me

17 the·one then told I* to·you I·will·mission·off °¬goat of·¬goats⁺ out of·the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ the·one then told ifᵮ you·should·give °¬guarantee ¬until of·the·one to·mission·off °you

18 the·one then told °what ⁼the ⁼¬guarantee to·you I·will·give the·one then told °the ⁼¬ring of·you and °the ⁼¬pendant and °the ⁼¬rod ⁼the·one in to·the ⁼hand of·you and gave to·her and came·to unto °her and in to·¬belly took out of·him

19 and ¬arising came·off and ¬took·away·himself °the ⁼¬reaping·hook off of·herself and ¬put·on·himself °the⁺ ⁼cloaks⁺ of·the ⁼widowhood of·her

20 missioned·off then Yudah °the ⁼¬goat out of·¬goats⁺ in to·hand of·the ⁼¬flocksman of·him ⁼the Odollamitou to·self-¬receive °the ⁼¬guarantee ¬from of·the ⁼woman and not found °her

21 ¬questioned then °the⁺ ⁼men⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ out of·the ⁼¬place ¬where? is the ⁼fornicator ⁼the ⁼self-generated in Ainan upon of·the ⁼¬road and they·told not was ¬here fornicator

22 and was·¬turned·away unto °Yudah and told not I·found and the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ out of·the ⁼¬place they·say ńot to·be ¬here °fornicator

23 told then Yudah ꜝlet·them·have °them but ¬lest we·should·be·¬mocked I* ¬on·the·other·hand I·have·missioned·off °the ⁼¬goat ⁼this you then not you·have·found

24 was·generated·himself then with °three·months was·¬announced to·the ⁼Yudah saying has·fornicated·out ¬Tamar ⁼the ⁼bride of·you and ¬¡see! in to·¬belly has out of·fornication told then Yudah ꜝ¬lead·out⁺ °her and ꜝlet·them·be·¬burned

25 she then self-¬bringing missioned·off unto °the ⁼¬father-in-law of·her saying out of·the ⁼human ⁼what these⁺ is I* in to·¬belly I·have and told ꜝ¬come·to·know of·what the ⁼¬ring and the ⁼¬pendant and the ⁼¬rod ⁼this

26 ¬came·to·know then Yudah and told has·¬justified·himself ¬Tamar or I* of·which ¬because·of not I·gave °her Sēlōm ⁼the ⁼son of·me and not ¬added·himself ¬still of·the·one to·know °her

27 was·generated·himself then ¬when ¬gave·birth·to and to·¬this was ¬Twin⁺ in to·the ⁼¬belly of·her

28 was·generated·himself then in to·the·one to·¬give·birth·to °her the ⁼one ¬put·forth·first °the ⁼hand taking then the ⁼¬midwife ¬bound upon °the ⁼hand of·him °¬scarlet saying this will·come·out·himself ¬before

29 as then ¬gathered °the ⁼hand and ¬straightaway came·out the ⁼brother of·him the·one then told °what was·¬cut·through through °you ¬fence and called °the ⁼name of·him °¬Perez

30 and with °this came·out the ⁼brother of·him upon to·which was upon to·the ⁼hand of·him the ⁼¬scarlet and called °the ⁼name of·him ¬Zerah

39 ⁼Yosef then was·¬brought·down to °Egypt and ¬possessed·himself °him Petefrēs ⁼the ⁼¬eunuch of·¬Pharaoh ¬chief·guard ⁼man ⁼Egyptian out of·hand Ismaēlitōn which⁺ they·¬brought·down °him there

2 and was lord with of·Yosef and was man ⁼¬obtaining and was·generated·himself in to·the ⁼house ¬from to·the ⁼lord ⁼the ⁼Egyptian

3 had·¬seen then the ⁼lord of·him ¬that lord with of·him and °whatever⁺ iᵮ should·do lord ¬gets·along·well in to·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·him

4 and found Yosef °¬grace ¬in·front·of of·the ⁼lord of·him ¬pleased then to·him and ¬appointed °him upon of·the ⁼house of·him and °all⁺ whatever⁺ was to·him gave through of·hand of·Yosef

5 was·generated·himself then with °the·one to·be·¬appointed °him upon of·the ⁼house of·him and upon °all⁺ whatever⁺ was to·him and ¬praised lord °the ⁼house of·the ⁼Egyptian through °Yosef and was·been·generated ¬praise of·lord in to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬·already to·him in to·the ⁼house and in to·the ⁼field

6 and ¬permitted °all⁺ whatever⁺ was to·him to °hands⁺ of·Yosef and not had·¬seen of·the·ones⁺ ¬according·to °himself °no·one ¬but of·the ⁼bread ⁼which ¬ate he and was Yosef ⁼beautiful to·the ⁼¬appearance and ¬Beautiful to·the ⁼¬face ¬very

7 and was·generated·himself with °the⁺ ⁼¬declarations⁺ ⁼these⁺ and ¬put·on the ⁼woman of·the ⁼lord of·him °the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ of·her upon to·Yosef and told ꜝbe·¬slept with myˊ

8 the·one then not ¬willed told then to·the ⁼woman of·the ⁼lord of·him if the ⁼lord of·me not knows through °me* °no·one in to·the ⁼house of·him and °all⁺ whatever⁺ is to·him gave to °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·me

9 and not ¬is·higher in to·the ⁼house ⁼this °no·one myˊ not·then has·¬removed·secretly·himself off myˊ °no·one ¬but of·you through °the·one °you °woman of·him to·be and ¬how?! I·should·do °the ⁼¬declaration ⁼the ⁼¬evil ⁼this and I·will·sin·myself ¬in·front·of of·the ⁼God

10 ¬when then spoke to·the ⁼Yosef °day out of·day and not ¬obeyed to·her to·¬sleep with of·her of·the·one to·self-¬be·intimate·with to·her

11 was·generated·himself then ¬such·as·this ⁼whatever ⁼day came·to Yosef to °the ⁼house to·do °the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·him and no·one was of·the·ones⁺ in to·the ⁼house ¬in

12 and ¬uncircumcised·himself °him of·the⁺ ⁼cloaks⁺ saying ꜝbe·¬slept with myˊ and ¬leaving·behind °the⁺ ⁼cloaks⁺ of·him in to·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·her ¬fled and came·out out

13 and was·generated·himself as ¬saw ¬that ¬left·behind °the⁺ ⁼cloaks⁺ of·him in to·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·her and ¬fled and came·out out

14 and called °the⁺ ⁼being in to·the ⁼house and told to·them saying ꜝ¬see⁺ ¬brought·in to·us °¬child ⁼¬Hebrew to·¬mock to·us came·to unto °me saying ꜝbe·¬slept with myˊ and I·¬cried·out to·voice ⁼great

15 in then to·the·one to·hear °him ¬that I·¬lifted·up °the ⁼voice of·me and I·¬cried·out ¬leaving·behind °the⁺ ⁼cloaks⁺ of·him ¬from to·me* ¬fled and came·out out

16 and ¬leaves·behind °the⁺ ⁼cloaks⁺ ¬from to·¬self ¬until came the ⁼lord to °the ⁼house of·him

17 and spoke to·him ¬according·to °the⁺ ⁼¬declarations⁺ ⁼these⁺ saying came·to unto °me the ⁼¬child ⁼the ⁼¬Hebrew °which you·¬brought·in unto °us to·¬mock to·me and told to·me I·will·be·¬slept with of·you

18 as then heard ¬that I·¬lifted·up °the ⁼voice of·me and I·¬cried·out ¬left·behind °the⁺ ⁼cloaks⁺ of·him ¬from to·me* and ¬fled and came·out out

19 was·generated·himself then as heard the ⁼lord of·him °the⁺ ⁼¬declarations⁺ of·the ⁼woman of·him °whatever⁺ spoke unto °him saying thus did to·me the ⁼¬child of·you and was·¬angered to·¬wrath

20 and taking ⁼the ⁼lord °Yosef threw·in °him to °the ⁼¬stronghold to °the ⁼¬place in to·which the⁺ ⁼¬prisoners⁺ of·the ⁼king they·¬hold·back·themselves there in to·the ⁼¬stronghold

21 and was lord with of·Yosef and ¬poured of·him °mercy and gave to·him °¬grace ¬in·front·of of·the ⁼¬chief·jailer

22 and gave the ⁼¬chief·jailer °the ⁼¬prison through of·hand of·Yosef and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬led·away whatever⁺ in to·the ⁼¬prison and °all⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ they·do there

23 not was the ⁼¬chief·jailer of·the ⁼¬prison knowing through °him °no·one °all⁺ for was through of·hand of·Yosef through °the·one °the ⁼lord with of·him to·be and °whatever⁺ he did lord ¬got·along·well in to·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·him

40 was·generated·himself then with °the⁺ ⁼¬declarations⁺ ⁼these⁺ sinned the ⁼¬chief·wine·taster of·the ⁼king of·Egypt and the ⁼¬chief·baker to·the ⁼lord of·them to·king of·Egypt

2 and was·¬angered ¬Pharaoh upon to·the⁺ ⁼two⁺ ⁼¬eunuches⁺ of·him upon to·the ⁼¬chief·wine·taster and upon to·the ⁼¬chief·baker

3 and ¬placed·himself °them in to·¬prison ¬from to·the ⁼¬jailer to °the ⁼¬prison to °the ⁼¬place ¬whither Yosef had·¬led·away·himself there

4 and ¬commended the ⁼¬chief·jailer to·the ⁼Yosef °them and ¬stood·by to·them they·were then °days⁺ in to·the ⁼¬prison

5 and they·¬saw ¬both⁺ °¬dream ¬??? °¬dream in to·one ⁼night ¬appearance of·the ⁼¬dream of·him the ⁼¬chief·wine·taster and the ⁼¬chief·baker which⁺ they·were to·the ⁼king of·Egypt the⁺ ⁼being in to·the ⁼¬prison

6 came·to then unto °them Yosef °the·one ¬early and ¬saw °them and they·were having·been·¬troubled

7 and ¬asked °the⁺ ⁼¬eunuches⁺ °¬Pharaoh which⁺ they·were with of·him in to·the ⁼¬prison ¬from to·the ⁼lord of·him saying °what ¬that °the⁺ ⁼¬faces⁺ of·you⁺ °¬sad⁺ today

8 the·ones⁺ then they·told to·him °¬dream we·¬saw and the ⁼¬comparing not is °it told then to·them Yosef ¬not! through of·the ⁼God the ⁼¬explanation of·them is ꜝ¬relate·fully⁺·yourselves⁺ therefore to·me

9 and ¬related·fully·himself the ⁼¬chief·wine·taster °the ⁼¬dream of·him to·the ⁼Yosef and told in to·the ⁼¬sleep of·me was vine ¬in·front·of of·me

10 in then to·the ⁼vine three⁺ ⁼¬lower·branches⁺ and she ⁼¬flourishing ⁼having·¬carried·up °¬sprouts⁺ ¬matures⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬bunch·of·grapeses⁺ of·¬grape

11 and the ⁼¬cup of·¬Pharaoh in to·the ⁼hand of·me and I·took °the ⁼¬grape and I·¬squeezed·out °her to °the ⁼¬cup and I·gave °the ⁼¬cup to °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·¬Pharaoh

12 and told to·him Yosef this the ⁼¬amalgamation of·him the⁺ ⁼three⁺ ⁼¬lower·branches⁺ ⁼three⁺ days⁺ they·are

13 ¬still three⁺ days⁺ and will·be·¬remembered of·¬Pharaoh of·the ⁼¬beginning of·you and will·¬restore °you upon °the ⁼¬chief·wine·taster of·you and you·will·give °the ⁼¬cup of·¬Pharaoh to °the ⁼hand of·him ¬according·to °the ⁼¬beginning of·you °the ⁼¬before as you·were of·¬male·wine·servers⁺

14 but ꜝbe·¬remembered of·me through of·yourself ¬when ¬well to·you should·be·generated·himself and you·will·do in to·me* °mercy and you·will·be·¬remembered about myˊ to·¬Pharaoh and you·will·¬lead·out °me out of·the ⁼¬stronghold of·this

15 ¬that to·theft I·was·thieved out of·earth of·¬Hebrews⁺ and ¬here not I·did °no·one but they·threw·in °me to °the ⁼¬pit ⁼this

20 was·generated·himself then in to·the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼third day of·genesis was of·¬Pharaoh and did °¬carousing to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·him and was·¬remembered of·the ⁼¬beginning of·the ⁼¬chief·wine·taster and of·the ⁼¬beginning of·the ⁼¬chief·baker in to·¬midst of·the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·him

41 was·generated·himself then with two °years⁺ of·days⁺ ¬Pharaoh ¬saw °¬dream ¬supposed·himself to·have·stood upon of·the ⁼¬river

2 and ¬¡see! ¬just·as out of·the ⁼¬river they·¬ascended seven ¬oxes⁺ beautiful⁺ to·the ⁼¬appearance and ¬select⁺ to·the⁺ ⁼fleshes⁺ and they·¬feeded·themselves in to·the ⁼¬reed-grass

50 then to·the ⁼Yosef they·were·generated·themselves sons⁺ two ¬before of·the·one to·come °the·ones⁺ seven °years⁺ of·the ⁼¬famine °which⁺ ¬gave·birth·to to·him Asenneth ⁼daughter Petefrē ⁼priest ⁼sun of·city

42 ¬seeing then Ya‘aqob ¬that is ¬sale in to·Egypt told to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him so·that °what you⁺·¬are·lazy

2 ¬¡see! I·have·heard ¬that is ¬grain in to·Egypt ꜝ¬come⁺ there and ꜝ¬buy⁺·yourselves⁺ to·us °¬small⁺ ⁼¬foods⁺ so·that we·live and ńot we·should·die·off

3 they·¬came then the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·Yosef the·ones⁺ ten to·self-¬buy °¬grain out of·Egypt

4 then °the ⁼¬Benjamin ⁼the ⁼brother of·Yosef not missioned·off with of·the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·him told for ¬lest should·¬happen to·him ¬sickness

5 they·came then the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el to·¬buy with of·the⁺ ⁼self-coming was for the ⁼¬famine in to·earth ¬Canaan

6 Yosef then was ¬ruler of·the ⁼earth this ¬sold to·all ⁼the ⁼people of·the ⁼earth coming then the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·Yosef they·¬worshipped to·him upon °¬face upon °the ⁼earth

17 and ¬placed·himself °them in to·¬prison °days⁺ ⁼three⁺

18 told then to·them to·the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼third °this ꜝdo⁺ and you⁺·will·live·yourselves⁺ °the ⁼God for I* I·¬fear·myself

19 if peaceful⁺ you⁺·are brother of·you⁺ one ꜝlet·them·be·¬held·back in to·the ⁼¬prison they then ꜝ¬proceed⁺ and ꜝ¬lead·away⁺ °the ⁼¬purchase of·the ⁼¬provision of·you⁺

20 and °the ⁼brother of·you⁺ °the ⁼young ꜝ¬bring⁺ unto °me and they·will·be·trusted the⁺ ⁼¬declarations⁺ of·you⁺ if then ńot you⁺·will·die·off·yourselves⁺ they·did then thus

21 and told ¬each unto °the ⁼brother of·him ¬yes in to·sin for we·are about of·the ⁼brother of·us ¬that we·¬overlooked °the ⁼¬pressure of·the ⁼soul of·him when ¬bandaged·himself of·us and not we·¬listened·to of·him ¬because·of of·this ¬arrived upon °us the ⁼¬pressure ⁼this

22 ¬answered then ¬Reuben told to·them not I·spoke to·you⁺ saying ńot you⁺·should·¬harm °the ⁼¬boy and not you⁺·¬listened·to of·me and ¬¡see! the ⁼blood of·him ¬seeks·out·himself

23 they then not they·had·¬seen ¬that hears Yosef ⁼the·one for ¬translator ¬each °¬midst of·them was

24 ¬turned·away then off of·them ¬wept Yosef and ¬again came·unto unto °them and told to·them and took °the ⁼¬Simeon off of·them and ¬bound °him ¬in·front·of of·them

25 ¬ordered·himself then Yosef to·¬fill·up °the⁺ ⁼¬jars⁺ of·them of·¬grain and to·¬pay °the ⁼silver of·¬each to °the ⁼¬sackcloth of·him and to·give to·them °¬food to °the ⁼¬road and was·been·generated to·them thus

26 and ¬putting °the ⁼¬grain upon °the⁺ ⁼donkeys⁺ of·them they·came·off ¬from·there

27 ¬loosing then one °the ⁼¬bag of·him to·give °¬foods⁺ to·the⁺ ⁼donkeys⁺ of·him ¬whither they·¬destroyed ¬saw °the ⁼¬chain of·the ⁼silver of·him and was ¬above of·the ⁼mouth of·the ⁼¬bag

28 and told to·the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·him was·¬payed to·me the ⁼silver and ¬¡see! this in to·the ⁼¬bag of·me and ¬amazed the ⁼heart of·them and they·were·¬troubled unto °one·another⁺ saying °what ⁼this did the ⁼God to·us

29 they·came then unto °Ya‘aqob ⁼the ⁼father of·them to °earth ¬Canaan and they·¬announced to·him °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬happening to·them saying

30 has·spoken the ⁼human ⁼the ⁼lord of·the ⁼earth unto °us °¬hard⁺ and ¬placed·himself °us in to·¬prison as °¬spying °the ⁼earth

31 we·told then to·him peaceful⁺ we·are not we·are ¬spies⁺

32 twelve brothers⁺ we·are sons⁺ of·the ⁼father of·us the ⁼one not ¬is·already then the ⁼¬small with of·the ⁼father of·us today in to·earth ¬Canaan

33 told then to·us the ⁼human ⁼the ⁼lord of·the ⁼earth in to·this I·will·know·myself ¬that peaceful⁺ you⁺·are °brother ⁼one ꜝ¬release⁺ ¬here with myˊ then °the ⁼¬purchase of·the ⁼¬provision of·the ⁼house of·you⁺ taking ꜝcome·off⁺

34 and ꜝ¬bring⁺ unto °me °the ⁼brother of·you⁺ °the ⁼young and I·will·know·myself ¬that not ¬spies⁺ you⁺·are but ¬that peaceful⁺ you⁺·are and °the ⁼brother of·you⁺ I·will·¬pay to·you⁺ and to·the ⁼earth you⁺·¬traffic·in·yourselves⁺

35 was·generated·himself then in to·the·one to·¬empty °them ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬sackcloths⁺ of·them and was of·¬each the ⁼¬chain of·the ⁼silver in to·the ⁼¬sackcloth of·them and they·¬saw °the⁺ ⁼¬chains⁺ of·the ⁼silver of·them they and the ⁼father of·them and they·were·¬feared

36 told then to·them Ya‘aqob ⁼the ⁼father of·them °me* you⁺·¬were·barren Yosef not is ¬Simeon not is and °the ⁼¬Benjamin you⁺·will·take·yourselves⁺ upon °me* was·generated·himself all⁺ ⁼these⁺

37 told then ¬Reuben to·the ⁼father of·him saying °the·ones⁺ two °sons⁺ of·me ꜝkill·off ifᵮ ńot I·should·¬bring °him unto °you ꜝgive °him to °the ⁼hand of·me and I* I·will·¬lead °him unto °you

38 the·one then told not will·¬come·himself the ⁼son of·me with of·you⁺ ¬that the ⁼brother of·him died·off and he ⁼¬alone has·¬left·behind·himself and will·¬happen·himself °him to·be·¬been·infirm in to·the ⁼¬road ⁼which iᵮ you⁺·should·¬travel·yourselves⁺ and you⁺·will·¬bring·down of·me °the ⁼¬old·age with of·¬grief to of·¬hell

43 then the ⁼¬famine ¬strengthened upon of·the ⁼earth

2 was·generated·himself then ¬when they·¬completed to·¬devour °the ⁼¬grain ⁼which they·¬bore out of·Egypt and told to·them the ⁼father of·them ¬again ¬travelled ꜝ¬buy⁺·yourselves⁺ to·us °¬small⁺ ⁼¬foods⁺

3 told then to·him Yudah ⁼saying °¬bearing·witness ¬??? to·us the ⁼human ⁼saying not you⁺·will·¬see·yourselves⁺ °the ⁼¬face of·me ifᵮ ńot the ⁼brother of·you⁺ the ⁼young with of·you⁺ should·be

4 if ¬on·the·other·hand therefore you·mission·off °the ⁼brother of·us with of·us we·will·¬come·ourselves and we·should·¬buy to·you °¬foods⁺

5 if then ńot you·mission·off °the ⁼brother of·us with of·us not we·will·¬travel·ourselves the·one for human told to·us saying not you⁺·will·¬see·yourselves⁺ of·me °the ⁼¬face ifᵮ ńot the ⁼brother of·you⁺ the ⁼young with of·you⁺ should·be

6 told then Yisra’el °what you⁺·did·evil °me ¬announcing to·the ⁼human if is to·you⁺ brother

7 the·ones⁺ then they·told ¬asking ¬questioned °us the ⁼human and °the ⁼generation of·us saying if ¬still the ⁼father of·you⁺ lives if is to·you⁺ brother and we·¬announced to·him ¬according·to °the ⁼¬questioning ⁼this ńot we·had·¬seen if will·¬say to·us ꜝ¬bring⁺ °the ⁼brother of·you⁺

8 told then Yudah unto °Yisra’el ⁼the ⁼father of·him ꜝmission·off °the ⁼¬boy with myˊ and ¬arising we·will·¬travel·ourselves so·that we·live and ńot we·should·die·off and we and you and the ⁼¬accoutrements of·us

9 I* then I·¬wait·for·myself °him out of·hand of·me ꜝ¬seek °him ifᵮ ńot I·should·¬bring °him unto °you and I·should·stand °him ¬in·front·of of·you having·sinned I·will·be·myself unto °you °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼days⁺

10 if ńot for we·¬delayed ¬already iᵮ we·¬returned ¬twice

11 told then to·them Yisra’el ⁼the ⁼father of·them if thus is °this ꜝdo⁺ ꜝtake⁺ off of·the⁺ ⁼fruits⁺ of·the ⁼earth in to·the⁺ ⁼¬jars⁺ of·you⁺ and ꜝ¬bring·down⁺ to·the ⁼human °¬gifts⁺ of·the ⁼¬balm and of·the ⁼honey °¬incense and °¬balsam and °¬terebinth·resin and °¬walnuts⁺

12 and °the ⁼silver ⁼¬double ꜝtake⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·you⁺ °the ⁼silver ⁼the ⁼¬turned·away in to·the⁺ ⁼¬bags⁺ of·you⁺ ꜝ¬turn·away⁺ with of·you⁺ ¬lest ¬error is

13 and °the ⁼brother of·you⁺ ꜝtake⁺ and ¬arising ꜝ¬come⁺ unto °the ⁼human

14 then the ⁼God of·me may·give to·you⁺ °¬grace ¬in·front·of of·the ⁼human and may·mission·off °the ⁼brother of·you⁺ °the ⁼one and °the ⁼¬Benjamin I* ¬on·the·other·hand for ¬as I·have·¬been·barren·myself I·have·¬been·barren·myself

15 taking then the⁺ ⁼men⁺ °the⁺ ⁼¬gifts⁺ ⁼these⁺ and °the ⁼silver ⁼¬double they·took in to·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·them and °the ⁼¬Benjamin and ¬arising they·¬came to °Egypt and they·stood ¬in·front·of of·Yosef

16 ¬saw then °Yosef °them and °the ⁼¬Benjamin ⁼the ⁼brother of·him °the ⁼¬born·of·the·same·mother and told to·the·one upon of·the ⁼house of·him ꜝ¬bring·in °the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ to °the ⁼house and ꜝ¬slaughter °¬offerings⁺ and ꜝ¬make·ready with myˊ for they·will·¬eat·themselves the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ °breads⁺ °the ⁼¬noon

17 did then the ⁼human ¬as told Yosef and ¬brought·in °the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ to °the ⁼house of·Yosef

18 ¬seeing then the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ ¬that they·were·¬brought·in to °the ⁼house of·Yosef they·told through °the ⁼silver ⁼the ⁼¬turned·away in to·the⁺ ⁼¬bags⁺ of·us °the ⁼¬beginning we we·¬bring·in·ourselves of·the·one to·¬extort °us and to·self-¬put to·us of·the·one to·take °us to °¬children⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼donkeys⁺ of·us

19 coming·unto then unto °the ⁼human ⁼the·one upon of·the ⁼house ⁼Yosef they·spoke to·him in to·the ⁼gate of·the ⁼house

20 saying we·¬pray·ourselves lord we·¬came °the ⁼¬beginning to·self-¬buy °¬foods⁺

21 was·generated·himself then ¬when we·came to °the·one to·¬destroy and we·¬opened °the⁺ ⁼¬bags⁺ of·us and ¬this ⁼the ⁼silver of·¬each in to·the ⁼¬bag of·him °the ⁼silver of·us in to·¬doorpost we·¬turned·away now in to·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·us

22 and °silver ⁼óther we·¬bore with of·¬selves⁺ to·¬buy °¬foods⁺ not we·have·¬seen what threw·in °the ⁼silver to °the⁺ ⁼¬bags⁺ of·us

23 told then to·them ¬propitious to·you⁺ ńot you⁺·¬fear·yourselves⁺ the ⁼God of·you⁺ and the ⁼God of·the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·you⁺ gave to·you⁺ °treasures⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼¬bags⁺ of·you⁺ then °the ⁼silver of·you⁺ °¬·approved I·¬have·in·full and ¬led·out unto °them °the ⁼¬Simeon

24 and ¬bore °water to·¬wash °the⁺ ⁼feet⁺ of·them and gave °¬foods⁺ to·the⁺ ⁼donkeys⁺ of·them

25 they·¬made·ready then °the⁺ ⁼¬gifts⁺ ¬until of·the·one to·come °Yosef of·¬noon they·heard for ¬that there ¬ensues to·¬eat·early·meal

26 came·to then Yosef to °the ⁼house and they·¬brought·to to·him °the⁺ ⁼¬gifts⁺ ⁼which⁺ they·had in to·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·them to °the ⁼house and they·¬worshipped to·him upon °¬face upon °the ⁼earth

27 ¬asked then °them ¬how?! you⁺·have and told to·them if ¬is·healthy the ⁼father of·you⁺ the ⁼¬elder °which you⁺·told ¬still lives

28 the·ones⁺ then they·told ¬is·healthy the ⁼¬child of·you the ⁼father of·us ¬still lives and told ¬praiseworthy ⁼the ⁼human ⁼that to·the ⁼God and ¬stooping they·¬worshipped to·him

29 ¬looking·up then to·the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ Yosef ¬saw °¬Benjamin ⁼the ⁼brother of·him °the ⁼¬born·of·the·same·mother and told this ⁼the ⁼brother of·you⁺ the ⁼young °which you⁺·told unto °me to·¬bring and told the ⁼God may·¬have·mercy °you ¬child

30 was·¬troubled then Yosef ¬gathered·himself for the⁺ ⁼¬innardses⁺ of·him upon to·the ⁼brother of·him and ¬sought to·¬weep coming·to then to °the ⁼¬inner·room ¬wept there

31 and self-¬washing °the ⁼¬face coming·out ¬self-controlled·himself and told ꜝ¬set·before⁺ °breads⁺

32 and they·¬set·before to·him ⁼¬alone and to·them ¬according·to °¬selves⁺ and to·the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬dining·with with of·him ¬according·to °¬selves⁺ not for they·were·able·themselves the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ to·¬eat·with with of·the⁺ ⁼¬Hebrews⁺ °breads⁺ ¬abomination for is to·the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺

33 they·¬seated then ¬in·front·of of·him the ⁼¬firstborn ¬according·to °the⁺ ⁼¬seniors⁺ of·him and the ⁼young ¬according·to °the ⁼youth of·him they·¬amazed·themselves then the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ ¬each unto °the ⁼brother of·him

34 they·¬took·up then °¬parts⁺ ¬from of·him unto °them was·¬magnified then the ⁼¬part of·¬Benjamin ¬from °the⁺ ⁼¬parts⁺ of·all⁺ ¬five-fold unto °the·ones⁺ of·those⁺ they·drank then and they·were·¬gotten·drunk with of·him

44 and ¬ordered·himself Yosef to·the ⁼being upon of·the ⁼house of·him saying ꜝ¬fill⁺ °the⁺ ⁼¬bags⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ of·¬foods⁺ °whatever⁺ ifᵮ they·should·be·able·themselves to·¬take·up and ꜝthrow·in⁺ of·¬each °the ⁼silver upon of·the ⁼mouth of·the ⁼¬bag

2 and °the ⁼¬drinking·cup of·me °the ⁼silver ꜝthrow·in⁺ to °the ⁼¬bag of·the ⁼young and °the ⁼¬honor of·the ⁼¬grain of·him was·been·generated then ¬according·to °the ⁼¬declaration of·Yosef ¬as told

3 °the·one ¬early ¬showed·light·through and the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ they·were·missioned·off they and the⁺ ⁼donkeys⁺ of·them

4 ⁼coming·out then of·them °the ⁼city not they·¬clinged·to ¬far and Yosef told to·the·one upon of·the ⁼house of·him ¬arising ꜝ¬pursue·after ¬after of·the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ and you·will·¬grasp·yourself °them and you·will·¬say to·them °what ¬that you⁺·¬repayed °¬evil⁺ anti of·beautiful⁺

5 so·that °what you⁺·thieved of·me °the ⁼¬drinking·cup ⁼the ⁼silver not this is in to·which drinks the ⁼lord of·me he then to·¬omen ¬foretells·himself in to·him °¬evil⁺ you⁺·have·¬completed·yourselves⁺ °which⁺ you⁺·have·done

6 finding then °them told to·them ¬according·to °the⁺ ⁼¬declarations⁺ ⁼these⁺

7 the·ones⁺ then they·told to·him so·that °what speaks the ⁼lord ¬according·to °the⁺ ⁼¬declarations⁺ ⁼these⁺ ńot may·be·generated·himself to·the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·you to·do ¬according·to °the ⁼¬declaration ⁼this

8 if °the·one ¬on·the·other·hand °silver ⁼which we·found in to·the⁺ ⁼¬bags⁺ of·us we·¬turned·away unto °you out of·earth of·¬Canaan ¬how?! iᵮ may·we·thieve out of·the ⁼house ⁼the ⁼lord of·you °silver or °gold

10 the·one then told and now as you⁺·say thus will·be·himself the ⁼human ¬from to·which iᵮ should·be·found the ⁼¬drinking·cup he will·be·himself of·me ¬child you⁺ then you⁺·will·be·yourselves⁺ ¬clean⁺

11 and they·¬hastened and they·¬took·down ¬each °the ⁼¬bag of·him upon °the ⁼earth and they·¬opened ¬each °the ⁼¬bag of·him

12 ¬looked·for then off of·the ⁼¬elder self-¬·first ¬until came upon °the ⁼young and found °the ⁼¬drinking·cup in to·the ⁼¬bag ⁼the·one of·¬Benjamin

13 and they·¬tore °the⁺ ⁼cloaks⁺ of·them and they·¬put ¬each °the ⁼¬bag of·him upon °the ⁼donkey of·him and they·¬turned to °the ⁼city

17 told then Yosef ńot to·me may·be·generated·himself to·do °the ⁼¬declaration ⁼this the ⁼human ¬from to·which was·found the ⁼¬drinking·cup he will·be·himself of·me ¬child you⁺ then ꜝ¬ascend⁺ with of·¬salvation unto °the ⁼father of·you⁺

18 ¬coming·near then to·him Yudah told I·¬pray·myself lord ꜝlet·them·speak the ⁼¬child of·you °¬declaration ¬in·front·of of·you and ńot you·should·be·¬angered to·the ⁼¬child of·you ¬that you you·are with of·¬Pharaoh

19 lord you you·¬asked °the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·you saying if you⁺·have °father or °brother

20 and we·told to·the ⁼lord is to·us father ⁼¬elder and ¬child of·¬old·age young to·him and the ⁼brother of·him died·off he then ¬alone was·¬left to·the ⁼mother of·him then the ⁼father °him loved

21 you·told then to·the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·you ꜝ¬bring·down⁺ °him unto °me and I·¬care·myself of·him

22 and we·told to·the ⁼lord not will·be·able·himself the ⁼¬child to·¬leave·behind °the ⁼father ifᵮ then should·¬leave·behind °the ⁼father will·die·off·himself

23 you then you·told to·the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·you ifᵮ ńot should·¬come the ⁼brother of·you⁺ the ⁼young with of·you⁺ not you⁺·will·¬add·yourselves⁺ ¬still to·¬see °the ⁼¬face of·me
