28 and came·out the ⁼one off myˊ and you⁺·told ¬that ¬eaten·by·wild·beasts has·been·generated and not they·¬saw °him ¬still and now

29 ifᵮ therefore you⁺·should·take and °this out of·¬face of·me and should·¬happen to·him ¬sickness in to·the ⁼¬road and you⁺·will·¬bring·down of·me °the ⁼¬old·age with of·¬grief to of·¬hell

30 now therefore ifᵮ I·should·¬enter·myself unto °the ⁼¬child of·you °father then of·us and °the ⁼¬boy ńot should·be with of·us then the ⁼soul of·him ¬hangs·upon·himself out of·the·one of·this of·soul

31 and will·be·himself in to·the·one to·¬see °him ńot °being ⁼the ⁼¬boy with of·us will·¬decease and they·will·¬bring·down the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·you °the ⁼¬old·age of·the ⁼¬child of·you of·father then of·us with of·¬anguish to of·¬hell

32 the·one for ¬child of·you has·¬waited·for·himself °the ⁼¬child ¬from of·the ⁼father saying ifᵮ ńot I·should·¬bring °him unto °you and I·should·stand °him ¬in·front·of of·you having·sinned I·will·be·myself unto °the ⁼father °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼days⁺

33 now therefore I·will·¬continue to·you ¬child anti of·the ⁼¬child ¬slave of·the ⁼lord then the ⁼¬child ꜝlet·them·¬ascend with of·the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺

34 ¬how?! for I·will·¬ascend·myself unto °the ⁼father of·the ⁼¬child ńot of·being with of·us so·that ńot I·should·¬see °the⁺ ⁼evil⁺ which⁺ will·find °the ⁼father of·me

45 and not was·able·himself Yosef to·self-¬endure of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼having·¬stood·by to·him but told ꜝ¬send·out⁺ °all⁺ off myˊ and not had·¬stood·by no·one ¬still to·the ⁼Yosef ¬when ¬recognized·himself to·the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·him

2 and ¬released °voice with of·¬weeping they·heard then all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ and ¬audible was·generated·himself to °the ⁼house of·¬Pharaoh

3 told then Yosef unto °the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·him I* I·am Yosef ¬still the ⁼father of·me lives and not they·were·able·themselves the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ to·be·¬answered to·him they·were·¬troubled for

4 told then Yosef unto °the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·him ꜝ¬come·near⁺ unto °me and they·¬came·near and told I* I·am Yosef ⁼the ⁼brother of·you⁺ °which you⁺·¬payed·yourselves⁺ to °Egypt

5 now therefore ńot ꜝ¬grieve⁺·yourselves⁺ ńot·then ¬hard to·you⁺ ꜝlet·them·be·¬shined ¬that you⁺·¬payed·yourselves⁺ °me ¬here to for °life missioned·off °me the ⁼God ¬before of·you⁺

6 °this for °second ⁼year ¬famine upon of·the ⁼earth and ¬still °¬remaining⁺ five °years⁺ in to·which⁺ not will·be·himself ¬plowing not·then ¬harvest

7 missioned·off for °me the ⁼God ¬before of·you⁺ to·self-¬leave of·you⁺ °¬remnant upon of·the ⁼earth and to·¬nourish of·you⁺ °¬remnant ⁼great

8 now therefore not you⁺ °me you⁺·have·missioned·off ¬here but or the ⁼God and did °me as °father to·¬Pharaoh and °lord of·all ⁼the ⁼house of·him and °¬ruler of·all ⁼earth ⁼Egypt

9 ¬hastening therefore ꜝ¬ascend⁺ unto °the ⁼father of·me and ꜝtell⁺ to·him °¬these⁺ says the ⁼son of·you Yosef did °me the ⁼God °lord of·all ⁼earth ⁼Egypt ꜝ¬come therefore unto °me and ńot you·should·¬stay

10 and you·will·¬dwell in to·earth Gesem of·¬Arabia and you·will·be·yourself ¬near of·me you and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·you and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·you the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ of·you and the⁺ ⁼¬oxes⁺ of·you and whatever⁺ to·you is

11 and I·will·¬nourish °you there ¬still for five °years⁺ ¬famine so·that ńot you·should·be·¬obliterated you and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·you and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬possessioning of·you

12 ¬¡see! the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ of·you⁺ they·look and the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ of·¬Benjamin ⁼the ⁼brother of·me ¬that the ⁼mouth of·me the ⁼speaking unto °you⁺

13 ꜝ¬announce⁺ therefore to·the ⁼father of·me °all ⁼the ⁼¬glory of·me °the·one in to·Egypt and °whatever⁺ you⁺·¬saw and ¬hastening ꜝ¬bring·down⁺ °the ⁼father of·me ¬here

14 and ¬falling upon °the ⁼neck of·¬Benjamin ⁼the ⁼brother of·him ¬wept upon to·him and ¬Benjamin ¬wept upon to·the ⁼neck of·him

15 and ¬kissing °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·him ¬wept upon to·them and with °these⁺ they·spoke the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·him unto °him

16 and was·¬proclaimed·forth the ⁼voice to °the ⁼house of·¬Pharaoh saying they·have·¬come the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·Yosef was·¬rejoiced then ¬Pharaoh and the ⁼¬service of·him

17 told then ¬Pharaoh unto °Yosef ꜝtell to·the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·you °this ꜝdo⁺ ꜝ¬fill⁺ °the⁺ ⁼¬journeys⁺ of·you⁺ and ꜝcome·off⁺ to °earth ¬Canaan

18 and ¬taking °the ⁼father of·you⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬possessioning of·you⁺ ꜝ¬come⁺ unto °me and I·will·give to·you⁺ of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼good⁺ of·Egypt and you⁺·will·¬eat·yourselves⁺ °the ⁼¬marrow of·the ⁼earth

19 you then ꜝ¬order·yourself °these⁺ to·take to·them °¬wagons⁺ out of·earth ⁼Egypt to·the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·you⁺ and to·the⁺ ⁼women⁺ and ¬taking·up °the ⁼father of·you⁺ ꜝ¬come⁺·yourselves⁺

20 and ńot you⁺·should·¬spare·yourselves⁺ to·the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬vessels⁺ of·you⁺ the·ones⁺ for all⁺ ⁼good⁺ of·Egypt to·you⁺ will·be·himself

21 they·did then thus the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el gave then Yosef to·them °¬wagons⁺ ¬according·to °the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬said ¬by of·¬Pharaoh ⁼the ⁼king and gave to·them °¬food to °the ⁼¬road

22 and to·all⁺ gave °¬double⁺ ⁼robes⁺ then to·the ⁼¬Benjamin gave °three·hundred⁺ ⁼golden⁺ and five °¬changing ⁼robes⁺

23 and to·the ⁼father of·him missioned·off ¬according·to °the⁺ °them and ten °donkeys⁺ ⁼¬taking·up off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼good⁺ of·Egypt and ten °¬half-donkeys⁺ ⁼¬taking·up °breads⁺ to·the ⁼father of·him to °¬road

24 ¬sended·out then °the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·him and they·were·¬travelled and told to·them ńot ꜝ¬anger⁺·yourselves⁺ in to·the ⁼¬road

25 and they·¬ascended out of·Egypt and they·came to °earth ¬Canaan unto °Ya‘aqob ⁼the ⁼father of·them

26 and they·¬announced to·him saying ¬that the ⁼son of·you Yosef lives and he ¬is·first of·all ⁼earth ⁼Egypt and ¬amazed the ⁼¬mind of·Ya‘aqob not for trusted to·them

27 they·spoke then to·him °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬said ¬by of·Yosef °whatever⁺ told to·them ¬seeing then °the⁺ ⁼¬wagons⁺ ⁼which⁺ missioned·off Yosef ¬so to·¬take·up °him ¬rekindled the ⁼breath of·Ya‘aqob ⁼the ⁼father of·them

28 told then Yisra’el great⁺ to·me is if ¬still Yosef ⁼the ⁼son of·me lives ¬travelled I·will·¬behold·myself °him ¬before of·the·one to·die·off °me

46 ¬taking·away then Yisra’el he and all⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ of·him came upon °the ⁼¬well of·the ⁼¬oath and ¬sacrificed °¬sacrifice to·the ⁼God of·the ⁼father of·him ⁼Yitzchaq

2 told then the ⁼God to·Yisra’el in to·¬vision of·the ⁼night telling Ya‘aqob ⁼Ya‘aqob the·one then told what is

3 saying I* I·am the ⁼God of·the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·you ńot ꜝ¬fear·yourself to·¬come to °Egypt to for °nation ⁼great I·will·do °you there

4 and I* I·will·¬come·myself with of·you to °Egypt and I* I·will·¬pull·up °you to °¬goal and Yosef will·¬put·on °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ upon °the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ of·you

5 ¬arose then Ya‘aqob off of·the ⁼¬well of·the ⁼¬oath and they·¬took·up the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el °the ⁼father of·them and °the ⁼¬accoutrements and °the⁺ ⁼women⁺ of·them upon °the⁺ ⁼¬wagons⁺ ⁼which⁺ missioned·off Yosef to·¬take·up °him

6 and ¬taking·up °the⁺ ⁼¬possessioning of·them and °all ⁼the ⁼¬possession ⁼which they·¬possessed·themselves in to·earth ¬Canaan they·came·to to °Egypt Ya‘aqob and all ⁼the ⁼seed of·him with of·him

7 sons⁺ and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him with of·him daughters⁺ and daughters⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him and °all ⁼the ⁼seed of·him ¬brought to °Egypt

8 these⁺ then the⁺ ⁼names⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el of·the⁺ ⁼coming·to to °Egypt Ya‘aqob and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him ¬firstborn of·Ya‘aqob ¬Reuben

9 sons⁺ then of·¬Reuben ¬Enoch and Fallous ⁼¬Hezron and Charmi

10 sons⁺ then of·¬Simeon Iemouēl and Iamin and Aōd and Iachin and Saar and Sha’ul ⁼son of·the ⁼¬Canaan

11 sons⁺ then of·¬Levi Gērsōn Kaath and Merari

12 sons⁺ then of·Yudah ¬Er and Aunan and Sēlōm and ¬Perez and ¬Zerah died·off then ¬Er and Aunan in to·earth ¬Canaan they·were·generated·themselves then sons⁺ of·¬Perez ¬Hezron and Iemouēl

13 sons⁺ then of·¬Issachar Thōla and Foua and Iasoub and ¬???

14 sons⁺ then of·¬Zebulun Sered and Allōn and Aloēl

15 these⁺ ⁼sons⁺ Leias °which⁺ ¬gave·birth·to to·the ⁼Ya‘aqob in to·¬Mesopotamia of·the ⁼¬Syria and Dinan ⁼the ⁼daughter of·him all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼souls⁺ sons⁺ and daughters⁺ thirty three⁺

16 ⁼sons⁺ then of·¬Gad Safōn and Aggis and Saunis and Thasoban and Aēdis and ¬??? and Aroēlis

17 sons⁺ then of·¬Asher Iemna and Iesoua and Ieoul and Baria and Sara ⁼sister of·them sons⁺ then Baria Chobor and Melchiēl

18 these⁺ ⁼sons⁺ Zelfas °which gave Laban Leia ⁼the ⁼daughter of·him which ¬gave·birth·to °these⁺ to·the ⁼Ya‘aqob ten six °souls⁺

19 sons⁺ then of·¬Rachel ⁼woman of·Ya‘aqob Yosef and ¬Benjamin

20 they·were·generated·themselves then sons⁺ of·Yosef in to·earth ⁼Egypt °which⁺ ¬gave·birth·to to·him Asenneth ⁼daughter Petefrē ⁼priest ⁼sun of·city °the ⁼¬Manasseh and °the ⁼¬Ephraim they·were·generated·themselves then sons⁺ of·¬Manasseh °which⁺ ¬gave·birth·to to·him the ⁼¬concubine ⁼the ⁼¬Syrian °the Machir Machir then engendered °the Galaad sons⁺ then of·¬Ephraim ⁼brother ⁼¬Manasseh ¬Sutalaam and ¬Tam sons⁺ then of·¬Sutalaam ¬Edem

21 sons⁺ then of·¬Benjamin Bala and Chobōr and Asbēl they·were·generated·themselves then sons⁺ Bala Gēra and ¬Naaman and Agchis and Rōs and Mamfin and Ofimin Gēra then engendered °the Arad

22 these⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·¬Rachel °which⁺ ¬gave·birth·to to·the ⁼Ya‘aqob all⁺ ⁼souls⁺ ten eight

23 sons⁺ then Dan Asom

24 and sons⁺ of·¬Naphtali Asiēl and Gōuni and Issaar and Sullēm

25 these⁺ ⁼sons⁺ Ballas °which gave Laban to·¬Rachel ⁼the ⁼daughter of·him which ¬gave·birth·to °these⁺ to·the ⁼Ya‘aqob all⁺ ⁼souls⁺ seven

26 all⁺ then souls⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼coming·to with of·Ya‘aqob to °Egypt the⁺ ⁼coming·out out of·the⁺ ⁼¬thighs⁺ of·him ¬without of·the⁺ ⁼women⁺ of·sons⁺ of·Ya‘aqob all⁺ ⁼souls⁺ sixty six

27 sons⁺ then of·Yosef the⁺ ⁼self-generated to·him in to·earth ⁼Egypt souls⁺ nine all⁺ ⁼souls⁺ of·house ⁼Ya‘aqob the⁺ ⁼coming·to to °Egypt seventy five

28 then °the ⁼Yudah missioned·off ¬before of·him unto °Yosef to·¬meet to·him ¬according·to of·¬heros⁺ °city to °earth Ramessē

29 ¬harnessing then Yosef °the⁺ ⁼¬chariots⁺ of·him ¬ascended to °¬meeting to·Yisra’el ⁼the ⁼father of·him ¬according·to of·¬heros⁺ °city and ¬seen to·him ¬fell upon °the ⁼neck of·him and ¬wept to·¬weeping ⁼much

30 and told Yisra’el unto °Yosef I·will·die·off·myself off of·the·one now ¬since I·have·¬seen °the ⁼¬face of·you ¬still for you you·live

31 told then Yosef unto °the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·him ¬ascending I·will·¬announce to·the ⁼¬Pharaoh and I·will·¬say to·him the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·me and the ⁼house of·the ⁼father of·me which⁺ they·were in to·earth ¬Canaan they·have·¬come unto °me

32 then the⁺ ⁼men⁺ they·are ¬flocksmans⁺ ⁼men⁺ for ¬grazing·cattle⁺ they·were and °the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬oxes⁺ and °all⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ of·them they·have·¬brought

33 ifᵮ therefore should·call °you⁺ ¬Pharaoh and should·tell to·you⁺ what ⁼the ⁼work of·you⁺ is

34 you⁺·will·¬say men⁺ ⁼¬grazing·cattle⁺ we·are the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·you out of·¬child ¬until of·the·one now and we and the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·us so·that you⁺·should·¬dwell in to·earth Gesem to·¬Arabia ¬abomination for is to·Egyptians⁺ all ⁼¬flocksman of·sheep⁺

47 coming then Yosef ¬announced to·the ⁼¬Pharaoh saying ⁼the ⁼father of·me and the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·me and the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬oxes⁺ of·them and all⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ of·them they·came out of·earth of·¬Canaan and ¬¡see! they·are in to·earth Gesem

2 off then of·the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·him ¬took five °men⁺ and stood °them ¬in·front·of of·¬Pharaoh

3 and told ¬Pharaoh to·the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·Yosef what ⁼the ⁼work of·you⁺ the·ones⁺ then they·told to·the ⁼¬Pharaoh ¬flocksmans⁺ of·sheep⁺ the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·you and we and the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·us

4 they·told then to·the ⁼¬Pharaoh to·¬be·a·stranger in to·the ⁼earth we·have·¬come not for is ¬pasture to·the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·you ¬strengthened for the ⁼¬famine in to·earth ¬Canaan now therefore we·will·¬dwell the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·you in to·earth Gesem

5 told then ¬Pharaoh to·the·one ¬??? ꜝlet·¬dwell⁺ in to·earth Gesem if then you·¬know·yourself ¬that they·are in to·them men⁺ ⁼able⁺ ꜝ¬appoint °them ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·the·ones⁺ my of·¬animals⁺ they·came then to °Egypt unto °Yosef Ya‘aqob and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him and heard ¬Pharaoh ⁼king of·Egypt and told ¬Pharaoh unto °Yosef saying ⁼the ⁼father of·you and the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·you they·have·¬come unto °you

6 ¬¡see! the ⁼earth of·Egypt ¬in·front·of of·you is in to·the ⁼¬better ⁼earth ꜝ¬settle °the ⁼father of·you and °the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·you

7 ¬brought·in then Yosef °Ya‘aqob ⁼the ⁼father of·him and stood °him ¬in·front·of of·¬Pharaoh and ¬praised Ya‘aqob °the ⁼¬Pharaoh

9 and told Ya‘aqob to·the ⁼¬Pharaoh the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼years⁺ of·the ⁼life of·me °which⁺ I·¬am·a·stranger hundred thirty years⁺ ¬small⁺ and ¬evil⁺ they·have·been·generated the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼years⁺ of·the ⁼life of·me not they·¬reached·themselves to °the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼years⁺ of·the ⁼life of·the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·me °which⁺ ⁼days⁺ they·¬were·a·stranger

10 and ¬praising ⁼Ya‘aqob °the ⁼¬Pharaoh came·out off of·him

12 and ¬measured·out·grain Yosef to·the ⁼father and to·the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·him and to·all ⁼the ⁼house of·the ⁼father of·him °¬grain ¬according·to °body

13 ¬grain then not was in to·all ⁼the ⁼earth ¬strengthened for the ⁼¬famine ¬very ¬failed then the ⁼earth of·Egypt and the ⁼earth ¬Canaan off of·the ⁼¬famine

14 ¬assembled then Yosef °all ⁼the ⁼silver ⁼the ⁼found in to·earth of·Egypt and in to·earth ¬Canaan of·the ⁼¬grain ¬whither they·¬buyed and ¬measured·out·grain to·them and ¬brought·in Yosef °all ⁼the ⁼silver to °the ⁼house of·¬Pharaoh

15 and ¬failed all ⁼the ⁼silver out of·earth ⁼Egypt and out of·earth of·¬Canaan they·came then all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ unto °Yosef saying ꜝgive to·us °breads⁺ and so·that °what we·die·off ¬in·front·of of·you has·¬failed for the ⁼silver of·us

16 told then to·them Yosef ꜝ¬bear⁺ °the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ of·you⁺ and I·will·give to·you⁺ °breads⁺ anti of·the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ of·you⁺ if has·¬failed the ⁼silver

17 they·¬brought then °the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ unto °Yosef and gave to·them Yosef °breads⁺ anti of·the⁺ ⁼horses⁺ and anti of·the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ and anti of·the⁺ ⁼¬oxes⁺ and anti of·the⁺ ⁼donkeys⁺ and ¬nourished °them in to·breads⁺ anti of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ of·them in to·the ⁼¬year ⁼that

18 came·out then the ⁼year ⁼that and they·came unto °him in to·the ⁼year ⁼the ⁼second and they·told to·him ¬lest we·should·be·¬obliterated off of·the ⁼lord of·us if for has·¬failed the ⁼silver and the⁺ ⁼¬possessioning and the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ unto °you °the ⁼lord and not is·¬left to·us ¬in·front·of of·the ⁼lord of·us but or the ⁼¬one's·own ⁼body and the ⁼earth of·us

19 so·that therefore ńot we·should·die·off ¬in·front·of of·you and the ⁼earth should·be·¬layed·waste ꜝ¬possess·yourself °us and °the ⁼earth of·us anti of·breads⁺ and we·will·be·ourselves we and the ⁼earth of·us ¬children⁺ of·¬Pharaoh ꜝgive °seed so·that we·should·seed and we·live and ńot we·should·die·off and the ⁼earth not will·be·¬layed·waste

20 and ¬possessed·himself Yosef °all ⁼the ⁼earth of·the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ to·the ⁼¬Pharaoh they·¬payed·themselves for the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ °the ⁼earth of·them to·the ⁼¬Pharaoh ¬prevailed for of·them the ⁼¬famine and was·generated·himself the ⁼earth to·¬Pharaoh

21 and °the ⁼people ¬enslaved·himself to·him to °¬children⁺ off of·¬end⁺ ⁼¬regions⁺ of·Egypt ¬until of·the⁺ ⁼¬end⁺

22 ¬without of·the ⁼earth of·the⁺ ⁼priests⁺ ¬only not ¬possessed·himself °this Yosef in to·¬gift for gave °¬gift to·the⁺ ⁼priests⁺ of·¬Pharaoh and they·¬ate °the ⁼¬gift ⁼which gave to·them ¬Pharaoh through °this not they·¬payed·themselves °the ⁼earth of·them

23 told then Yosef to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ ¬¡see! I·have·¬possessed·myself °you⁺ and °the ⁼earth of·you⁺ today to·the ⁼¬Pharaoh ꜝtake⁺ to·¬selves⁺ °seed and ꜝseed⁺ °the ⁼earth

24 and will·be·himself the⁺ ⁼¬offsprings⁺ of·her you⁺·will·give °the ⁼fifth ⁼¬part to·the ⁼¬Pharaoh then the⁺ ⁼four⁺ ⁼¬parts⁺ will·be·himself to·you⁺ to·them to °seed to·the ⁼earth and to °¬eating to·you⁺ and to·all⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼houses⁺ of·you⁺

25 and they·told you·have·¬saved °us we·found °¬grace ¬in·front·of of·the ⁼lord of·us and we·will·be·ourselves ¬children⁺ of·¬Pharaoh

26 and ¬placed·himself to·them Yosef to °¬order ¬until of·the ⁼day ⁼this upon °earth of·Egypt to·the ⁼¬Pharaoh ¬taking·a·fifth·part ¬without of·the ⁼earth of·the⁺ ⁼priests⁺ ¬only not was to·the ⁼¬Pharaoh

27 ¬dwelled then Yisra’el in to·earth ⁼Egypt upon of·the ⁼earth Gesem and they·¬inherited upon of·her and they·were·¬grown and they·were·¬multiplied ¬very

28 ¬outlived then Ya‘aqob in to·earth ⁼Egypt ten seven °years⁺ they·were·generated·themselves then the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·Ya‘aqob of·¬years⁺ of·the ⁼life of·him hundred forty seven °years⁺

29 they·¬came·near then the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·Yisra’el of·the·one to·die·off and called °the ⁼son of·him °Yosef and told to·him if I·have·found °¬grace ¬in·front·of of·you ꜝ¬lay °the ⁼hand of·you ¬by °the ⁼¬thigh of·me and you·will·do upon °me* °¬charity and °¬truth of·the·one ńot °me to·¬bury in to·Egypt

30 but I·will·be·¬slept with of·the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·me and you·will·¬take·up °me out of·Egypt and you·will·¬bury °me in to·the ⁼¬grave of·them the·one then told I* I·should·do ¬according·to °the ⁼¬declaration of·you

31 told then ꜝ¬swear to·me and ¬sweared to·him and ¬worshipped Yisra’el upon °the ⁼¬end of·the ⁼¬rod of·him

48 was·generated·himself then with °the⁺ ⁼¬declarations⁺ ⁼these⁺ and was·¬announced to·the ⁼Yosef ¬that the ⁼father of·you ¬troubles·himself and ¬taking·up °the·ones⁺ two °sons⁺ of·him °the ⁼¬Manasseh and °the ⁼¬Ephraim came unto °Ya‘aqob

2 was·¬announced then to·the ⁼Ya‘aqob saying ¬¡see! the ⁼son of·you Yosef comes·himself unto °you and ¬strengthening ⁼Yisra’el ¬seated upon °the ⁼¬bed

3 and told Ya‘aqob to·the ⁼Yosef the ⁼God of·me was·¬seen to·me in Louza in to·earth ¬Canaan and ¬praised °me

4 and told to·me ¬¡see! I* I·will·¬grow °you and I·will·¬multiply °you and I·will·do °you to °¬synagogues⁺ of·nations⁺ and I·will·give to·you °the ⁼earth ⁼this and to·the ⁼seed of·you with °you to °¬possession ⁼eternal

5 now therefore the·ones⁺ two sons⁺ of·you the⁺ ⁼self-generated to·you in to·Egypt ¬before of·the·one °me to·come unto °you to °Egypt to·me* they·are ¬Ephraim and ¬Manasseh as ¬Reuben and ¬Simeon they·will·be·themselves to·me

6 then the⁺ ⁼¬descendant⁺ ⁼which⁺ ifᵮ you·should·engender with °these⁺ to·you they·will·be·themselves upon to·the ⁼name of·the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·them they·will·be·called in to·the·ones⁺ of·those⁺ to·¬lots⁺

7 I* then ¬when I·¬was·first·myself out of·¬Mesopotamia ⁼the ⁼¬Syria died·off ¬Rachel ⁼the ⁼mother of·you in to·earth ¬Canaan of·¬coming·near of·me ¬according·to °the ⁼¬course·of·horses ¬??? of·the ⁼earth of·the·one to·come Efratha and I·¬buried °her in to·the ⁼¬road of·the ⁼¬course·of·horses this is Bet-Lechem

8 ¬seeing then Yisra’el °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yosef told what⁺ to·you these⁺

9 told then Yosef to·the ⁼father of·him sons⁺ of·me they·are °which⁺ gave to·me the ⁼God ¬here and told Ya‘aqob ꜝ¬bring·near to·me °them so·that I·should·¬praise °them

10 then the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ of·Yisra’el ¬??? off of·the ⁼¬old·age and not was·able·himself to·look and ¬came·near °them unto °him and ¬befriended °them and ¬embraced °them

11 and told Yisra’el unto °Yosef ¬¡see! of·the ⁼¬face of·you not I·was·¬strengthened and ¬¡see! ¬showed to·me the ⁼God and °the ⁼seed of·you

12 and ¬led·out Yosef °them off of·the⁺ ⁼knees⁺ of·him and they·¬worshipped to·him upon °¬face upon of·the ⁼earth

13 taking then Yosef °the·ones⁺ two °sons⁺ of·him °the·one also °¬Ephraim in to·the ⁼¬right out of·¬left⁺ then of·Yisra’el then °the ⁼¬Manasseh in to·the ⁼¬left out of·¬right⁺ then of·Yisra’el ¬came·near °them to·him

14 ¬stretching·out then Yisra’el °the ⁼hand ⁼the ⁼¬right ¬put·on upon °the ⁼head of·¬Ephraim this then was the ⁼young and °the ⁼¬left upon °the ⁼head of·¬Manasseh ¬crosswise °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺

15 and ¬praised °them and told the ⁼God to·which they·¬pleased the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·me ¬in·front·of of·him Abraham and Yitzchaq ⁼the ⁼God ⁼the ⁼¬feeding °me out of·youth ¬until of·the ⁼day ⁼this

16 the ⁼¬announcer ⁼the ⁼self-¬rescuing °me out of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼evil⁺ may·¬praise °the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ ⁼these⁺ and will·be·¬called in to·them the ⁼name of·me and the ⁼name of·the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·me Abraham and Yitzchaq and may·they·be·¬multiplied to °¬multitude ⁼much upon of·the ⁼earth

17 ¬seeing then Yosef ¬that ¬put·on the ⁼father °the ⁼¬right of·him upon °the ⁼head of·¬Ephraim ¬weighty to·him was·¬appeared and ¬helped·himself Yosef of·the ⁼hand of·the ⁼father of·him to·¬remove °her off of·the ⁼head of·¬Ephraim upon °the ⁼head of·¬Manasseh

18 told then Yosef to·the ⁼father of·him not thus father this for the ⁼¬firstborn ꜝ¬put °the ⁼¬right of·you upon °the ⁼head of·him

19 and not ¬willed but told I·have·¬seen ¬child I·have·¬seen and this will·be·himself to °people and this will·be·¬lifted·up but the ⁼brother of·him the ⁼young ⁼¬greater of·him will·be·himself and the ⁼seed of·him will·be·himself to °¬multitude of·nations⁺

20 and ¬praised °them in to·the ⁼day ⁼that saying in to·you⁺ will·be·¬praised Yisra’el saying may·do °you the ⁼God as ¬Ephraim and as ¬Manasseh and ¬placed °the ⁼¬Ephraim ¬before of·the ⁼¬Manasseh

21 told then Yisra’el to·the ⁼Yosef ¬¡see! I* I·die·off and will·be·himself the ⁼God with of·you⁺ and will·¬turn·away °you⁺ to °the ⁼earth of·the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·you⁺

22 I* then I·give to·you °¬portion ⁼¬chosen·out·of ¬above °the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·you °which I·took out of·hand Amorraiōn in to·¬sword of·me and to·¬bow

49 called then Ya‘aqob °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him and told you⁺·should·be·¬assembled so·that I·should·¬announce to·you⁺ what will·¬meet to·you⁺ upon of·¬last⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ of·days⁺

2 ¬??? and ꜝhear⁺ sons⁺ of·Ya‘aqob ꜝhear⁺ of·Yisra’el ⁼the ⁼father of·you⁺

3 ¬Reuben ¬firstborn of·me you ¬strength of·me and ¬beginning of·¬children⁺ of·me ¬hard to·be·¬borne and ¬hard ⁼¬self-willed

4 ⁼¬overflowing as water ńot you·should·¬erupt you·¬ascended for upon °the ⁼¬bed of·the ⁼father of·you ŧhen you·¬stained °the ⁼¬strewn·bed ¬whither you·¬ascended

5 ¬Simeon and ¬Levi brothers⁺ they·¬completed °¬unrighteousness out of·¬sect of·them

6 to °¬plan of·them ńot may·come the ⁼soul of·me and upon to·the ⁼¬joint-conspiracy of·them ńot may·¬immobilise °the⁺ ⁼¬livers⁺ of·me ¬that in to·the ⁼¬wrath of·them they·killed·off °humans⁺ and in to·the ⁼¬desire of·them they·¬hamstringed °¬bull

7 ¬cursed ⁼the ⁼¬wrath of·them ¬that ¬self-willed and the ⁼¬vehement·anger of·them ¬that was·¬hardened I·will·¬divide °them in to·Ya‘aqob and I·will·¬scatter °them in to·Yisra’el

8 Yudah °you may·they·¬praise the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·you the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·you upon of·¬back of·the⁺ ⁼¬enemies⁺ of·you they·will·¬worship to·you the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·the ⁼father of·you

9 ¬cub of·lion Yudah out of·¬sprout son of·me you·¬ascended ¬reclining you·were·¬slept as lion and as ¬cub ⁼what will·¬arise °him

10 not will·¬fail ¬ruler out of·Yudah and self-¬governing out of·the⁺ ⁼¬thighs⁺ of·him ¬until iᵮ should·come the⁺ ⁼self-¬laying·up to·him and he ¬expectation of·nations⁺

11 ¬binding unto °vine °the ⁼¬colt of·him and to·the ⁼¬fetter °the ⁼¬colt of·the ⁼donkey of·him will·¬wash in to·wine °the ⁼robe of·him and in to·blood of·¬grape °the ⁼¬wrap-around of·him

12 ¬??? the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ of·him off of·wine and white⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼teeth⁺ of·him or milk

13 ¬Zebulun ⁼¬seaside will·¬dwell and he ¬from °¬mooring of·¬boats⁺ and will·¬prolong ¬until of·¬Sidon

14 ¬Issachar °the ⁼beautiful ¬longed·for self-¬giving·rest ¬each °¬midst of·the⁺ ⁼¬lots⁺

15 and ¬seeing °the ⁼¬rest ¬that beautiful and °the ⁼earth ¬that ¬plenty ¬layed °the ⁼shoulder of·him to °the·one to·¬suffer·pain and was·been·generated man ⁼¬farmer

16 Dan will·judge °the·one of·himself °people ¬like and one ⁼¬tribe in to·Yisra’el

17 and ꜝlet·them·be·been·generated Dan ⁼¬snake upon of·¬road self-¬lying·in·wait upon of·¬path ¬biting °¬heel of·horse and will·¬collapse·himself the ⁼horseman to °the·ones⁺ ¬after

18 °the ⁼¬salvation I·¬await of·lord

19 ¬Gad pirate·band will·pirate °him he then will·pirate of·them ¬according·to °feet⁺

20 ¬Asher ⁼¬plenty of·him the ⁼bread and he will·give °¬self-indulgence to·¬rulers⁺

21 ¬Naphtali ¬stick ⁼having·self-¬loosened ¬giving in to·the ⁼¬offspring ¬beauty

22 son ⁼having·been·¬grown ⁼Yosef ⁼son ⁼having·been·¬grown ⁼¬zealous ⁼son of·me young unto °me ꜝ¬live

23 to °which self-¬deliberating·upon they·¬reviled and they·¬opposed to·him lords⁺ of·¬bows⁺

24 and was·¬broken with of·¬power °the⁺ ⁼¬bows⁺ of·them and was·¬fainted the⁺ ⁼¬nerves⁺ of·arms⁺ of·hands⁺ of·them through °hand of·¬ruler ⁼Ya‘aqob ¬from·there the ⁼¬prevailing °Yisra’el

25 ¬from of·God ⁼the ⁼father of·you and ¬helped to·you the ⁼God ⁼the·one myˊ and ¬praised °you °¬praise of·heaven ¬from·above and °¬praise of·earth ⁼having °all⁺ ¬because·of of·¬praise of·¬breasts⁺ and of·motherhood

26 ⁼¬praise of·father of·you and of·mother of·you ¬excelled·in·strength upon to·¬praises⁺ of·mountains⁺ ⁼¬stable⁺ and upon to·¬praises⁺ of·¬hills⁺ ⁼¬everlasting⁺ they·will·be·themselves upon °head of·Yosef and upon of·¬head of·which⁺ ¬governed·himself of·brothers⁺

27 ¬Benjamin ⁼wolf ⁼¬rapacious °the ⁼¬morning will·¬eat·himself ¬still and to °the·one of·¬evening will·¬distribute °¬food

28 all⁺ ⁼these⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Ya‘aqob twelve and °these⁺ spoke to·them the ⁼father of·them and ¬praised °them °¬each ¬according·to °the ⁼¬praise of·him ¬praised °them

29 and told to·them I* I·¬add·myself unto °the·one myˊ °people ꜝ¬bury⁺ °me with of·the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·me in to·the ⁼cave which is in to·the ⁼field Efrōn ⁼the Chettaiou

30 in to·the ⁼cave ⁼the ⁼¬double ⁼the·one ¬opposite Mambrē in to·the ⁼earth ¬Canaan °which ¬possessed·himself Abraham °the ⁼cave ¬from Efrōn ⁼the Chettaiou in to·¬possession of·¬grave

31 there they·¬buried °Abraham and °¬Sarah ⁼the ⁼woman of·him there they·¬buried °Yitzchaq and °¬Rebekah ⁼the ⁼woman of·him and there I·¬buried Leian

32 in to·¬possession of·the ⁼field and of·the ⁼cave ⁼the ⁼being in to·him ¬from of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ Chet

33 and ¬kept·from Ya‘aqob ⁼¬commanding to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him and ¬expelling °the⁺ ⁼feet⁺ of·him upon °the ⁼¬bed ¬failed and was·¬added unto °the ⁼people of·him

50 and ¬falling ⁼Yosef upon °the ⁼¬face of·the ⁼father of·him ¬wept upon °him and ¬befriended °him

2 and ¬ordered Yosef to·the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·him to·the⁺ ⁼¬embalmers⁺ to·¬prepare·burial °the ⁼father of·him and they·¬prepared·burial the⁺ ⁼¬embalmers⁺ °the ⁼Yisra’el

3 and they·¬fulfilled of·him forty °days⁺ thus for they·¬number·themselves the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·the·one °¬burial and ¬mourned °him Egypt seventy °days⁺

4 ¬since then they·¬passed·by the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·the ⁼¬grief spoke Yosef unto °the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·¬Pharaoh saying if I·found °¬grace ¬in·front·of of·you⁺ ꜝspeak⁺ about myˊ to °the⁺ ⁼ears⁺ of·¬Pharaoh saying

5 the ⁼father of·me ¬adjured °me saying in to·the ⁼¬grave ⁼which I·¬dug to·myself in to·earth ¬Canaan there °me you·will·¬bury now therefore ¬ascending I·will·¬bury °the ⁼father of·me and I·will·¬return·myself

6 and told ¬Pharaoh ꜝ¬ascend ꜝ¬bury °the ⁼father of·you ¬just·as ¬adjured °you

7 and ¬ascended Yosef to·¬bury °the ⁼father of·him and they·¬ascended·with with of·him all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·¬Pharaoh and the⁺ ⁼¬elder⁺ of·the ⁼house of·him and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬elder⁺ of·the ⁼earth ⁼Egypt

8 and all ⁼the ⁼¬whole·family of·Yosef and the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·him and all ⁼the ⁼house ⁼the ⁼¬paternal of·him and °the ⁼¬kindred and °the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬oxes⁺ they·¬left·themselves in to·earth Gesem

9 and they·¬ascended·with with of·him and ¬chariots⁺ and horsemen⁺ and was·generated·himself the ⁼¬barracks ⁼great ¬very

10 and they·¬came·themselves upon °¬threshing-floor Atad which is ¬other·side of·the ⁼¬Jordan and they·chopped·themselves °him ⁼¬lamentation ⁼great and °¬strong ¬very and did °the ⁼¬grief to·the ⁼father of·him seven °days⁺

11 and they·¬saw the⁺ ⁼¬inhabitants⁺ of·the ⁼earth of·¬Canaan °the ⁼¬grief in to·¬threshing-floor Atad and they·told ¬grief ⁼great ⁼this is to·the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ through °this called °the ⁼name of·him ¬grief of·Egypt which is ¬other·side of·the ⁼¬Jordan

12 and they·did to·him thus the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him and they·¬buried °him there

13 and they·¬took·up °him the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him to °earth ¬Canaan and they·¬buried °him to °the ⁼cave ⁼the ⁼¬double ⁼which ¬possessed·himself Abraham °the ⁼cave in to·¬possession of·¬grave ¬from Efrōn ⁼the Chettaiou ¬before Mambrē

14 and ¬turned·away Yosef to °Egypt he and the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·him and the⁺ ⁼¬ascending·with to·¬bury °the ⁼father of·him

15 ¬seeing then the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·Yosef ¬that has·died the ⁼father of·them they·told ¬lest should·¬resent to·us Yosef and °¬repayment should·¬repay to·us °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼evil⁺ ⁼which⁺ we·¬showed·ourselves to·him

16 and they·¬came·themselves unto °Yosef saying the ⁼father of·you ¬adjured ¬before of·the·one to·¬decease °him saying

17 thus you⁺·told to·Yosef ꜝ¬release to·them °the ⁼¬unrighteousness and °the ⁼sin of·them ¬that °¬evil⁺ to·you they·¬showed·themselves and now ꜝ¬receive·yourself °the ⁼¬unrighteousness of·the⁺ ⁼¬servants⁺ of·the ⁼God ⁼the ⁼father of·you and ¬wept Yosef of·speaking of·them unto °him

18 and coming unto °him they·told ¬these⁺ we to·you ¬slaves⁺

19 and told to·them Yosef ńot you⁺·¬fear·yourselves⁺ of·the·one for of·God I·am I*

20 you⁺ you⁺·¬planed·yourselves⁺ ¬according·to myˊ to °¬evil⁺ then the ⁼God ¬planed·himself about myˊ to °good⁺ ¬that iᵮ should·be·been·generated as today so·that should·be·¬maintained people ⁼much

21 and told to·them ńot you⁺·¬fear·yourselves⁺ I* I·will·¬maintain °you⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼houses⁺ of·you⁺ and ¬pleaded °them and spoke of·them to °the ⁼heart

22 and ¬dwelled Yosef in to·Egypt he and the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·him and all ⁼the ⁼¬whole·family of·the ⁼father of·him and lived Yosef °years⁺ hundred ten

23 and ¬saw Yosef of·¬Ephraim °¬children⁺ ¬until of·third ⁼generation and sons⁺ Machir ⁼the ⁼son ⁼¬Manasseh they·were·¬given·birth·to upon of·¬thighs⁺ of·Yosef

24 and told Yosef to·the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·him saying I* I·die·off to·¬oversight then will·¬visit·himself °you⁺ the ⁼God and will·¬lead °you⁺ out of·the ⁼earth ⁼this to °the ⁼earth ⁼which ¬sweared the ⁼God to·the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·us to·Abraham and to·Yitzchaq and to·Ya‘aqob

25 and ¬adjured Yosef °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el saying in to·the ⁼¬oversight ⁼which will·¬visit·himself °you⁺ the ⁼God and you⁺·will·¬join·in·carrying·off °the⁺ ⁼bones⁺ of·me ¬from·here with of·you⁺

26 and ¬deceased Yosef of·years⁺ hundred ten and they·¬buried °him and they·¬placed in to·the ⁼¬bier in to·Egypt
